title: 1 'Mochenu Omochenu
content:
# 1 'Mochenu Omochenu

 1. 'Mochenu Omochenu or' Omonguru,Ekero bogokia tokobake Aye;'Mochenu 'Monyamabera bw'echinguru,Nay'omogambi kare na kare.
2. 'Mochenu malaika bagosasima,Babek' egutw'as'enyancha y'ekerore;'Megand' emeganda bakogosasima,Naye oreo kare na kare.
3'Mochenu nony'omosunt'ogontuba,Nonya titokoror'obonene bwao;Nay'or' omochenu kobua bonsi,'S'obwanchani, 'nguru n'obochenu.

title: 2 Tobake Nyasae
content:
# 2 Tobake Nyasae

 1. Tobake Nyasae, As'Omwan' Omwanchwa,Ase Yes'okwete bon'ore Igoro.
Haleluya tokobake, Haleluy'abe bo;Haleluya tokobake, toboki emioyo.
2. Tobake Nyasae, As'omoik Omuya;Otworokirie Yeso Omotoria.
3. 'Gotogigw'ase, 'Manw'eria yakwete;Kabogorl' ebibe na gotosibia.
4. Atogigw'ere Nyasae bw'obuya;Oy'otogorire na gotoraa.
5. Toboki'emioyo, toichori' Obwanchani;Morero lgoro okune chinkoro.

title: 3 Motogie Tat'Okorir' Amanene
content:
# 3 Motogie Tat'Okorir' Amanene

 1. Motogie Tat'okorir' amanene,Agancha'ens agato' Omwan'oye,Akerua gokwa atosibi' ebibe,Oyoranche anyore Obogima.
Mobake 'Monene, Ense emoigwe,Mobake 'Monene, Abanto bagoke;Inchwo ase Tata Yes'abarete,Momotogie okorir' amanene.
2. Okoborigwa ogoikeranu,oyobwanchire nare na eiraMosari'onde bwensi oramwegene,Kegim'ere nanyore okwaberwa.
3. Okorire na kwegeri'amanene,Twagokire ime y'Omwana Yeso,Nkob'ogokumia 'bochenu, 'bonene,Tomoroche gator'as' orogendo.

title: 4 Togi' Okobua Kwa Yeso
content:
# 4 Togi' Okobua Kwa Yeso

 1. Togi'okobua kwa YesoMalaika sasima,Ret'egutwa y'obogambi,mobekere Yeso;Ret'egutwa y'obogambi,mobekere Yeso.
2. 'Nw'abachore b'Omonene,mwaborigwe nere,Moiogi'OyobatotitieAs'Obuya bwaye;Motogi'Oyobatoririe'As'Obuya bwaye.
3. Na inwe abanto bonsimor' ase ense eye,'Howse hwonsi nobwaye,mobeker'egutwa;'Bonene hwonsi nobwaye,mobeker'egutwa.
4. Amo n'omoganda'gigoro,Natomosasime,Ntosange am'ogotera,Komoa 'bonene;Ntosange am'ogotera,Komoa 'bonene.

title: 5 'Ba Igoro Mosasim' Omogambi
content:
# 5 'Ba Igoro Mosasim' Omogambi

 1. Aba Igoro sasim' Omogambi,Tera Obwanchani bw'ogokumia;Enguba Embingwa nere botambe.Y'oichire n'obuya n'ogotogigwa.
2. Ter'obobui n'obuya bwaye,Ere bwenisetie Oborabu;'Ndamwamu yaye yareta rirumbe,Nabuet'obotindi bwemerindo.
3. Borendi bwao mbogokwaneka,Bwarosi'embeo bwarabi'omobaso;Bwaika korw'ebitunwa gochi'omweya,Bwatoerer'ase rime n'embura.
4. Ntw'ab'eriroba ntor'abareu,Twagosemeri'aye n'omobui;'Maber'ao y'obworor'a botambe,'Motongi, Omoboria, n'Omosani'oito.

title: 6 Tata Twagochera
content:
# 6 Tata Twagochera

 1. Tata twagocheire, Intwe twaremeirwe;Nay'obotamero, Twasoroire.'Nse'ger'omosunte, Eker'otario;Kab'Omoremi'oito, Tat'o'bonsi.
Tata twagocheire, totoombia'Gw'ogosaba gwaito ntw'abareu.
2. Totorie Korw'as' ababisa n'obobe;Nay'obotimok'as' okogania.'Se chitang'utang'u n'obwor'otoremie;'Se chinguru chiao otokong'ie.
3. Toe 'buya bwao tob'abao bori;Tami'amagor'aito korw'ebibe.Twasoroire torae goika tobue;Tomeny'amo nay'eng'umbu engiya.

title: 7 Nyasaye 'Motoria Oito
content:
# 7 Nyasaye 'Motoria Oito

 1. Nyasae 'Motoria oito,Korw'emiaka yonsi;Ekiriri'as'emechando,Enka ya botambe.
2. Inse y'ekiriri kiao,natomenye buya;'Koboko kwao ngoisainegotorenda twensi.
3. Otaratonga ens'eye,Tikiarenge gento;Nyasae kwareo nay'orab'emiaka yonsi.
4. 'Biare elfu 's'orebing'e mogorob'eyemo;'Bieng'e bun'ensa ya mambiaKo bogokiamoka.
5. Nyasae 'Motoria oito,As'emiak'egocha;Torae gatore moyo,'S'enka ya Igoro.

title: 8 'Gw' Ekerero Nyoroki' Amabera
content:
# 8 'Gw' Ekerero Nyoroki' Amabera

 1. 'Gw' ekerero nyoroki'amaberaOmotoria inchuo;Moy'orosire nkogania ocheOmotoria inchuo.
Natarire ense eye embe,Natarir'are korwa nka,Nyoyi'ong'iranie ase obweri,Omotoria inchuo.
2. Tindi n'ase ndebise botukoOmotoria inchuo;Nay'obogim'okong'omobasoOmotoria inchuo.
3. Inche bweka narosir'enchera,Omotoria inchuo;Narora omosasoko as'ore,Omotoria inchuo.
4. Tori kwanga Omoyo bwerure,Omotoria inchuo;'Gwa'gosaba n'okorera kwane,Omotoria inchuo.

title: 9 Omotongi One
content:
# 9 Omotongi One

 1. Omotongi one,bionsi pi nebiao;Naye bweka kwabing'eteNay'ogonsesenia,Naye bweka kwabing'eteNay'ogonsesenia.
2. Egetongwa kiao,Ing'a obogima,Nyasae one ngotogieomoy'ogotogie,Nyasae one ngotogieomoy'ogotogie.
3. Ninki ndakoe kobionsi bir'ebiao,Nkeri keegwa keraisan'obwanchani bwao,Nkeri keegwa keraisan'obwanchani bwao.
4. 'Buya bwao bombeke'nguru chia' igoro,Kera ring'ana n'okoganiabib'ebiao pi,Kera ring'ana n'okoganiabib'ebiao pi.

title: 10 Nchw' Ensoko
content:
# 10 Nchw' Ensoko

 1. Nchw' Ensoko ya Ker'egesio,Ninter'obuya bwao,Maber'amang'ataere,Agere tokobake.Nyegerie kogosasima,Nyorok'obuya bwao,'Gosemeria Kw'Obonene,Nkor'eichorw'obwanchani.
2. Nateneniri 'Ebenesa*,kwandendire goik'aa,Nasemeirie as'obuyabwao ning'ike inka,Yes'akandigi'omosiru,Konareng'are nere,Gonkonya korw'emechando,Gaiter'amanying'aye.
3. Botambe nd'omonyasira's'obuya bwa Nyasae,'Buya buna chingatarebombwaterani' as'ore.Mbetereirie ntayayentige Nyasae nyanchete,Ir'enkoro yane tatayegach'agwo igoro.

title: 11 Yes 'Omonyaira
content:
# 11 Yes 'Omonyaira

 1. Yes' omonyaira, nonya nabakeBachire gosaba, nobe aroro;Twanchire ring'ana togosasime,Yeso tosesenie, natokorore.
Yeso tosesenie, nao toraa;Inchuo tosesenie, mono botambe.
2. Nkwabete na intwe korw'agwo kare,Ko ntokoganetie goika oche;Inchuo Omoboria, toe obuya,Toigwe otwanche, otosesenie.
3. Yeso otokonye, natogotogie,Totere as'ore, igw' ogosaba;Buna togosaba, erio twegene,Erio tosemerie, twanche kobua.

title: 12 'Mariogi Onsi Tig 'Atare
content:
# 12 'Mariogi Onsi Tig 'Atare

 1. Mariogi onsi tigatere,'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya;'Kobakwa kwa Nyasae oito,'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya.
Rieta rigiya, 'Rieta rigiya,Rieta ria Yeso rigiya;Rieta rigiya, 'Rieta rigiya,Rieta ria Yeso rigiya
2. Nigo rikorusi 'obwoba,'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya;'Monyene ebib' amwanche,'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya.
3. Riasaria nguru chi'ebibe,'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya;Amanyinga yogosibia,'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya.

title: 13 Baka Tat' Ogesesenia
content:
# 13 Baka Tat' Ogesesenia

 Baka Nyasae 'Mosesenia,Bitongwa bi'ense mobake,Mogand' o Igoro mobake,Tata, Omwana n'Omoika.Amen.

title: 14 Nyasae Nintare N' Aye
content:
# 14 Nyasae Nintare N' Aye

 1. Nyasae nintare Naye,Bun' Enoku atarete;Mbwate okoboko kwane,Inkwane n' Aye boronge;Nintaror' enchera buya;Yeso, ntare amo Naye.
2. Tingotara inche bweka,Mwaga nomotindi bori;Amatemwa abuchire,Ababisa nabange bo;Kiria emerindo nyancha,Omonene! ntare Naye.
3. Korambwate okoboko,Ense tekombera kende;Nintare nde omoremu,Goika ng'ik' Omoerio;Ndore omochie Zayoni,Omotoria, ntare Naye.

title: 15 Kwana N'enkoro Yane
content:
# 15 Kwana N'enkoro Yane

 1. Kwana nenkoro yane,Ontebi' amangana;Nyigwe enkoro ime,"Tori aye bweka";Igor' cnkoro yane,Nyigwe riogi riao;Erio ngotogie aye,Nchenge ime yao.
Omonyerere ngoraN'obwanchani bwao;Mbe omobui boriotari n'ebibe;Kwana nainch' OmoneneN'Obwanchani bwao;Omonyerere ng'ora"Tori aye bweka".
2. Kwana n'abana bao,Enchera enchenu;Baichorie Omogoko,Barende barabe,Baru' Obogim' as'orebonda bwao boche;Omonene oito nchuo,karansa na intwe.
3. Okwane buna karegwakwanete ense;Nindigetie nkomanye,Erio ntar' as'ore;Nyorokia ngosik' ayenkobake botambe;Mbwatie ayorigetie,'Matuko nde moyo.

title: 16 Ninkoganeti' Omonene!
content:
# 16 Ninkoganeti' Omonene!

 1. Ninkoganeti' Omonene!Igo inde n'ebibe;Mbwate okoboko ndae,Erio nyare korora.
Botambe, botambe,Ninkoganeti' Omonene!Botambe, botambe,Omotoria ondende.
2. Mbekere oboitongo,Ebibe biambuire;Nyoroki' oboreu bwane,Ing'a chinguru chiao.
3. Tinkoiroka as'ore,aye nondae buya;Tara na inch' Omotoria,Nay' obogima bwane.
4. Kende gionsi nagechicha,'Mogoko n'obororo;Omoyo nobe as'ore,Naye orantimokie.

title: 17 N'Yeso Tai Nche
content:
# 17 N'Yeso Tai Nche

 1. N'Yeso, tai nche, Kristo,Anchwe naend' asikwe;N'Yeso, tai nche,'Manywe, aigweke,N'Yeso, tai nche,As' ebikorwa bionsiN'Yeso, tai nche,'s'ebirengererio.
2. N'Yeso tai nche,Aremi' as'obororo;N'Yeso tai nche,Atinyi'amariga,N'Yeso tai nche,Aimokie egurube,N'Yeso tai nche,Aserie obwoba.
3. N'Kristo, bweka,Tinkwana ayar'amabe;N'Kristo, bweka,Tintera amabeN'Kristo, bweka,Tinyeimokia igoro,N'Kristo, bweka,Tinyetang'ania inche.
4. N'Kristo, bweka,Ner' 'okong'isanekia,N'Kristo, bweka,Obogima bwane,N'Kristo, bweka,Mobere nomoy'one,N'Kristo, bweka,'Ns'eye na Igoro.

title: 18 Omotoria Torae Ntwe
content:
# 18 Omotoria Torae Ntwe

 1. Omotoria torae ntwe,otorende kegima;Toe 'ndagera engiya,Tobe riicho riao.
Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,Aye gwatogorire;Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,Aye gwatogorire.
2. Intwe naba' omosani,Totang'ane enchera;Torende riicho riao,Torigie titosira.
Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,Toigwe ogosaba;Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,Toigwe ogosaba.
3. Kwarire eira twanche,Natoba abasaria;Nonyare gotwabera ntwe,tosibie n'amanyinga;
Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,Natokoiranere;Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,Natokoiranere.

title: 19 Mosalab' Omotori' Agakwa
content:
# 19 Mosalab' Omotori' Agakwa

 1. 'Mosalab' Omotori' agakwa,'Gwo nkarera nsibigw'ebibe,'Manying'ay' agansibi 'enkoro,moe 'bonene.
Moe 'bonene, 'Moe 'bonene,Manying'ay' agansibi'enkoro,Moe 'bonene.
2. Nchera y'ogokumi' antoririe,Yes'omenyete ime yane,Agw'omosalab'ombogoirie'moe bonene.
3. Ensok'engiya y'ogotoria,nagokire gosoa ime,Yeso antoria na gonchena,moe 'bonene.
4. Nchwo 's'ensok'entenenk' engiya,karu'enkoro ya' eyi'entakaSoa 'me rer'oikeranigwe'moe bonene.

title: 20 Nyasae Oito Negetare
content:
# 20 Nyasae Oito Negetare

 1. Nyasae oito, negetare,'Botamero emechando,'Gokonyeka kore ang'e,Emechando ende yonsi.
'Getare gototimokia,'Kiriri gokenderera,'Morai as'orogendo,'Botamero emechando.
2. Botuko, mobaso nere,'Botamero emechando,Igo titokoiroka,Ekiagera are naintwe.
3. 'Mechand' ende netonyora,'Botamero emechando,Twamanyire nomorendi,Oyore ang'e botambe.
4. Nyasae negekengano,'Botamero emechando,Amatuk' onsi norwaki,Oyore ang'e botambe.

title: 21 Ngwekane Buna Yeso
content:
# 21 Ngwekane Buna Yeso

 1. Ngwekane buna Yeso;Amenye ime yane,Ng'ichorie obwanchani,Nindabe omwororo,Ngwekane buna Yeso,kangotara as'ense,Mbe n'omoika oye,'Monene nchwo ase nde.
2. Gakoigwa chinyoni,Nagochirenda buya,Nanyigwe ekerero,n'ogochandeka kwane;Nanyorokie boronge,Anyabere 'komocha,Nchenek' enkoro yane'Monene nchwo ase nde.
3. Ngwekane buna Yeso;Amatuko onsi pi,Nintimoke as'are,Ninyw' amache amaya;Nimbe n'obuya bwaye,Nyor' obwanchani bwaye,Ninyegene kegima'Monene nchwo ase nde.

title: 22 Tong'etani' Omotori' One
content:
# 22 Tong'etani' Omotori' One

 1. Tong'etani' Omotori' one,'Gwa kangosaba;Gokorangeria abande,Takong'etania.
Yeso, Yeso,'Gwa kangosaba;Gokorangeria abande,Takong'etania.
2. 'S'ekerogo ki'amabera,Ntimokereo;Ntung'ame as' oboitongo,Nkonye nyegene.
3. Nsemereti' Obuya bwao;Nkoror' Obosio;Ngweni' omoy'osaregete,Ntori' as' obuya.
4. Naye ore omoremia,Kobua bionsi;Kai ar'oyomoreng'aine,Nse nonyaigoro.

title: 23 Ngwanchete
content:
# 23 Ngwanchete

 1. Ngwanchete, Ngwanchete,Ngwanchet' Omonda,Ngwanchet' Omotoria,Ngwanchete Nyasae.Ngwanchete, Ngwanchete,kwamanyir' Aye,Bikorwa biorokie,buna Ngwanchete.
2. Ngogete, Ngogete,Mono kobua,Ntenen' egetunwa,ngoke botambeNyerore enibo,agwo ndamenye,Yeso, malaika,n'abaya bonsi.
3. Yes' Omotori'one,'R'ogotoreka;Bogima, mogoko,n'ogotimoka;Ndiatore erieta,nter' obwanchani;Buya bwao bokunebogima bwane
4. Ning'o ogwekaine,'Mogamb' omuya;Anyancha, nsasoka,Ang'ogotera;Mobake mobake,goter'okuya;'Ndoche chi'omogoko,Enkor' etere.

title: 24 O Yes' Omobori' One
content:
# 24 O Yes' Omobori' One

 1. O Yes' Omobori' one,'Mogok' ogotera,'Motori' omosasoko,'Kero nchandegete.
O Yes' Omobori' one,Ninkobake aye,Mosani onde tari,Bw' amatuko onsi.
2. Nay'ore okoremia,As' emiaka yonsi,Mosunte korantube,'Marig' agotonya!
3. Ninkwegen' Omotoria,Mosani Omorai,Naki aye nomuya,Kobua bonsi pi.
4. Nintere nomogoko,Kond' ense y'ebibe,Nintere n'omogoko,Bisieri bia Igoro.

title: 25 Naye Obogima Bwane
content:
# 25 Naye Obogima Bwane

 1. Naye obogima bwane,bobuet' obwenseye,Orogendo rwane nseye,'Motoria ntare naye.
Mbe naye, mbe naye,mbe naye, mbe nayeOrogendo rwan' enseye,'Motoria ntare naye.
2. Tari mogoko ngosaba,tindigeti obonene,'Meremo as'emechando,bwanche intare naye.
Mbe naye, mbe naye,mbe naye, mbe nayeMeremo as'emechando,bwanche intare naye.
3. Ntang'ane ime yomosunte,'Nyimokie erio mbue,Omonene nsoe naye'bogima botaere.
Mbe naye, mbe naye,mbe naye mbe naye,Omonene nsoe naye'bogima botaere.

title: 26 Chimeme Chionsi Chitere
content:
# 26 Chimeme Chionsi Chitere

 1. Chimeme chionsi chitere;Kobak'Omoboria!Kobak'Omoboria!'Buya bwa Nyasa'Erwoti;(Bobui bw'obuya)Bobui bw'obuyaBobui bw'obuya,Bobui bw'obuya.
2. Omonene Nyasa'one;Onkony'erio ndarie!Onkony'erio ndarie!Ndari'Erieta riao ense;('Bonene bw'Erieta,)Bonene bw'ErietaBonene bw'Erieta,Bonene bw'Erieta.
3. Yeso n'Erieta ri'obobui;Riseria obwoba!Riseri'Omoichano!Goter' as'Omonyabibe;('Bogim'omorembe)'Bogim'omorembe'Bogim'omorembe'Bogim'omorembe
4. Abuna 'nguru chi'ebibe;'Sibor'omosibwa!sibor'omosibwa!Manying' ay'asibi' ababe;(Nainche nansibie bo)Nainche nansibie bo,Nainche nansibie bo,Nainche nansibie bo.

title: 27 Ning'ore?
content:
# 27 Ning'ore?

 1. Ning'ore ngu'mbu bweri'Barasia basasima?
N'Omotoria bw'ogokumia,N'Omogambi bw'oboneneTogw' as'amagor' ayeKae Yes' obogambi.
2. Ning'or' emechand' imeKweng'ata as'eroro?
3. Ning'o gosesenigwa'Samang'an' obwororo?
4. Ning'o bakoretera'Barwaire nebirema?
5. Ng'o 'teneine korera'S' embera ya Lazaro?
6. Ning' oyio emeganda'Gokwania nobobui?
7. Ning'o botuko gatiGosaba Gethsemane?
8. Ng'o ng'umb' omote goro'Gokwa as'obororo?
9. Ning'o 'yio korw' emberaGocha gotori' abanto?
10. Ng'o korw' as'ekerogo'Kogamba chinse chionsi?

title: 28 'Rieta Ria Yeso Rigiya
content:
# 28 'Rieta Ria Yeso Rigiya

 1. Rieta 'giya 'goro n'ensenkoro yan'emanyeteNyasae Tata arueteAs'Omwana Omwanchwa.
Richenu kobua rire riororo;Riarwete as'omonwa O Tata,'Karetwa n'abamalaika botuko;Rieta rigiya ria Yeso.
2. Risesenia im' enkoro,Ninditogie kobua,Nindiatore as'abanto,Mbwatore buya bwaye.
3. Nintere mbotogi' obwanchani,Bwaye bw'ogotoria,Ntogi' Eriet'erio botambe,Riyabuete onsi.

title: 29 Yes' Omwanchi Omorisi 'One
content:
# 29 Yes' Omwanchi Omorisi 'One

 1. Yes' omwanchi Omorisi' one'Obuya botaremeTinkonyara koremerwaNare nainche botambe.
2. Ngatig'enchera ngasira'Kandigia nobwanchaniKanyimoki' as 'egekubaKang'ira nka ngogete.
3. As'amache y'obogimaOndendire botambeOndisirie OndendireYes' Omorisi' Omuya.
4. Amakweri tinkwoboa'Kero Yes'are naincheOnkiriri' ontenenirieNere ogontang'ana.
5. Ong'ariganeiri' emesaOnkoreir'ekeng'wansoOngokiri' as'endagera'Manying'ay' ansibirie.
6. 'S'amatuko y'obogimaGonsesenia botambeOmorisia ninkobakeNyomba mwao botambe.

title: 30 Nter' Obwanchani Bwa Nyasae
content:
# 30 Nter' Obwanchani Bwa Nyasae

 1. Nter' obwanchani bwa Nyasae,'Moik' oy' omeny' ase ndeGoichan' ogokor' omogoko,Nyaber' ebibe biane.'Mosunte noba omonene,otebire nabe nainche'Ng' oborabu 's' ekiriri,'Kieni ribaga rie ribu.
Ongokirie (ongokirie)as' obororo ('s'obororo)'Ng' obwanchani ('ng'obwanchani)nseri' obwoba (nseri' obwoba)'Ng'a Borabu 's' ekiriri,Kieni ribaga rie ribu.
2. Nter' obwanchani bw'Omotoria,'chandeget' as' omote'Bobisi bw'okoba kwaye oo,Nche mbe omosibore'Gacha gotori' abanyaibibe,Chinkoro echi chiarosire'Ng'a 'mogoko 's'okweumia,Kieni ribaga rie ribu.
3. Nintere obuya bw'enchili,Ekoreta obuya'Kong'a mogoko n'oborabu,And' onsi ase ndabe'Mboyi' eyanga y'omogok' oye,Kero nde nobwob' obongeBong'a borabu, kiriri,Kieni ribaga rie ribu.

title: 31 'Binto Biakobak' Aye
content:
# 31 'Binto Biakobak' Aye 

 1. 'Binto biakobak' Aye;'Goro, n'ense, n'enyanchaBionsi kwabitongete,Bikorari' OmoneneBionsi bigosasime;'Monene tokobake.
2. Bikobaka botukoBitera bokiriru;Bikobaka mobasoBiatora 'nguru chiao;Chinsa n'ense mobake'Monene tokobake.
3. Bikobaka bionsi pi'Mbura, mokobinyongo'Mogoroba, amareChindoche, n'emerindo'Nsakia, bokendu; bionsi'Monene togotogie.
4. Bionsi bikobak' AyeOmotongi, Ring'anaOmoik'oyoreoTwatung'amir' as'oreTokoe nkoro chiaito'Monene; tokobake.

title: 32 Mbe N'Obosera Bwa Yeso
content:
# 32 Mbe N'Obosera Bwa Yeso

 1. Mbe n'obosera bwa Yeso ime yane,'Mabera n'obochenu bwaye bwonsi;Omoik' Omochenu Anchene kegima,Goika Yes'arorekane ime yane.
2. Mbe nobosera bwa Yeso ime yane,'Buya bwaye bororekan' asende;Tig'amang'an' ane Nebikorwa biane,Bioroki' obosera bwaye Yeso.
3. 'Ker'orogendo rwane rwaerire,Ntare na Yeso botamb' as'obuya;Nkoimokigwa igoro 'S'enka y'omorembe,Neb' omogok'one komenya Nere.

title: 33 Tata Tosibore Bono
content:
# 33 Tata Tosibore Bono

 1. Tata tosibore bono,N'ogwanchera okuyaToe omogoko oo,Torusie ebibe piToe gwancha, Toe gwanchaGatokogend' ens' eye.
2. Twagokire rero mono,As' amang'ana ao;Togwanch' ogochika kwao,Natogoke botambeNatoteme natotemeKogotokonya aye.
3. Gatokogenda ens'eye,mbuya togokorereGatogotunya enchera,Totokona tatigaObe ang'e, obe ang'eGoika Oirane.

title: 34 Motoria Twabak'Erieta Riao
content:
# 34 Motoria Twabak'Erieta Riao

 1. Motoria twabak'erieta riao,As'ogotera kw'ogotigana;Gatwakorire ogosasima,Twatung'ama kogany'omorembe.
2. Toe 'morembe gatokogenda,Twachaka twakora ituko naye;Rend'emenwa n'enchinkoro chiaito,Abwo bagwatoir'as'enyomb'eye
3. Toe' morembe gator'ens' eye,Riog' as 'obororo n'amatemwa;Ker'orachik'esegi eere,Toe 'moremb' okare na kare.

title: 35 Ira Erieta Ria Yeso
content:
# 35 Ira Erieta Ria Yeso

 1. Ira erieta ria Yeso,Oyore n'obororo;Rikoreter' omogoko,Rirarie ande onsi.
Erieta....... Rigiya.......Mogok'ense na'goro,(Erieta) (Rigiya)Erieta....... Rigiya.......Mogok'ense na'goro.(Erieta) (Rigiya)
2. Ira erieta ria Yeso,Ribe buna enguba;Goetanan' amatemwa,sab' Erieta richenu.
3. 'Rieta rigiya ria Yeso,Rikoremia chinkoro;Atoimokie n'amaboko,N'amatera motogie.
4. Orogendo rokoera,Twekanye gosasima;Tomobekere egutwa,Mogambi bwa'bagambi.

title: 36 Yeso Nagwanchire Aye Noyone
content:
# 36 Yeso Nagwanchire Aye Noyone

 1. Yeso nagwanchire, Aye noyone;Natigir' ebibe nchiche as'ore,'Moboria one, naye ogontoria;Onye nagwanchete, Rirorio mbono.
2. Nagwanchire bun'Aye kwanyanchete;'Kabogori' ebibe aria kalwari,Ngwanch'as'okobek'engata y'amagwa;Onye nagwanchete rirorio mbono.
3. Ngwanch'as'obogima, n'as'amakweri;Naende ngotogie, buna nde moyo,Nintebe komberete ang'e gokwa;Onye nagwanchete, Rirorio mbono.
4. 'Bomenyo bw'omogok' otakoera;Ngosasime botambe agwo Igoro,Nintere n'egutw' ekomekameka;Onye nagwanchete, Riririo mbono.

title: 37 Yes' Omwanchi Omoy'one
content:
# 37 Yes' Omwanchi Omoy'one

 1. Yes' omwanchi omoy'one, Ancha menye as'ore,Merindo nemenene, nomwaga nomotindi.Nyebise Omotoria, Goik' emechando eere,Rokoer' orogendo As'aya Kristo ng'ira.
2. Tindi n'ogokonyeka, Tig' aye Omonene;Tontiga inche bweka, obe ang'e botambe,Negenire as'ore, Nyor'ogokony' as'oreOtube omotw'one, Na orobaba rwao.
3. Kwang'isanire aye, Nas'ore bire bionsiAbororo n'ababe, Nkobakony' ore bonsiOmuy' ore Nyasae, Inche tindi n'obuyaOyore n'obochenu, Nabwatirwe n'obobe.
4. 'Buy'obonge nas'ore, korusi' ebibe bionsiAs'amache amaya, Norigetie onsibieKwabeire ase tore, Ensoko y'obogimaObe ime asende, Emiaka na emiaka.

title: 38 Nintere Obwanchani
content:
# 38 Nintere Obwanchani

 1. Nintere obwanchani,Motoria, Onyanchete,Agacha, gokwer'ense,S'omot' o Kalwari.
Nintere (Nintere) obwanchaniMogoko (Mogoko), as' omoyoAgakwa (agakwa) imbe moyo,Nter' obwanchani bwaye.
2. 'Mariga 'Omonene'gaiteka 'ngencho yane;Ng'inyore Ogosaba,Ere nanyanchete.
3. Bwanchani bwaye'bonge Ense tekobomanya;Ebibe bun' ebiane,Mbirabe kegima.
4. Tindarua kend' ekiya,Okang'a Obwanchani;'Moy'one ob'as'ore,Ng'orokie obwanchani.

title: 39 Ninde N'ogoter' Okuya
content:
# 39 Ninde N'ogoter' Okuya

 1. Ninde n'ogoter'okuya,Naki naborigwe;N' Omotoria one Yeso,Naki naborigwe.
Naki naborigwe,Naki naborigwe;Ntogie erieta riaye,Naki naborigweNintogi' Erieta ri'Omotoria.
2. Kristo ner' ong'isanire,Naki naborigwe;Nkore buna arigetie,Naki naborigwe.
3. Ninde na kirori omuya,Naki naborigwe;Oyogoseria obwoba,Naki naborigwe.
4. Naroserigwe omochie,Naki naborigwe;Ase ndamenye botambe,Naki naborigwe.

title: 40 'Karar' As 'Embera
content:
# 40 'Karar' As 'Embera

 1. 'Karar' as' embera,Yes' Omotoria;Kaganya Koboka,'Monen' one.
Kaboka korw' embera,Nobobui as' omobisaAkabok' akabua omosunteAmenyete n'abachenu kogambaKaboka, kaboka, Alleluy' akaboka.
2. Bakarend' embera,Yes' Omotoria;Bakarenda bosa,Monen' one.
3. Tabuetwe nogokwa,Yes' Omotoria;Kabu' ebisibo,Monen' one.

title: 41 'Se Kalvari
content:
# 41 'Se Kalvari

 1. 'Se Kalvari yes'agakwa,'Monen'one akabambwa;'S'amanying'ay' akangora,Erio nyore amabera.
O Kalvari y'omosunte,Ase Yeso ankwerete; (inche)O Kalvari 'sesenirie!Nao 'Motori'ankwerete.
2. 'Bitare bigatandoka,'Rioba rikab'omosunte;'Getambaa gotandokabikarag'ogotoreka.
3. 'Monen'one naki yare,Ay'okang'a obogima;'Kabogori' omosalaba,N'oboror'aria Kalwari.

title: 42 'Gwancha Tikogokwaneka
content:
# 42 'Gwancha Tikogokwaneka

 1. Bwanchani Yes'anyanchete,Agankwer'omosalaba;Erio nyaberwe ebibe,Tibogokwaneka.
Bwanchani mbogokwaneka(Gokwaneka),Bwanachani mbogokwaneka(Gokwaneka);Bwanchani Yes'anyanchete,Tibogokwaneka.
2. Boror' obong'anyorete,Gatwekw'engata y'amagwa;Erio mbe moyo botambe,Tibogokwaneka.
3. Morembe mbwate as'Are,Ansororera Nyasae;Bobui as'amanying'aye,Tibogokwaneka.
4. Mogoko mbwate Kar'ang'e,Ko ndaire tindi kwoboa;Gosemeria mbwate as'are,Tikogokwaneka.

title: 43 Ntebi' Amang'ana A Yeso
content:
# 43 Ntebi' Amang'ana A Yeso

 1. Ntebi' amangana a Yeso,Mbeke onsi omoyoNyorokereria boronge,Maya abuete onsiNtebie bun' Amalaika,Baterete kaiborwa"Obonen' ase Nyasae,'Moremb' obuy'as'ense".
Ntebi' emeremo ya Yeso,Mbeke onsi enkoroNyorokereria boronge,Maya abuete onsi.
2. 'Keng'ata bweka eroro,Ntebi'engak' akorete'S'ebibe biait' agatemwa,Omoeri'akabuaNtebi' engaki y'emeremo,N'oboror'anyoreteAchayetwe nagochandwa,'Motak' otari n'enka.
3. Ntebie ase abambetwe,Akaba n'obororoNtebi' ember' atindegetwe,Ntebie bun'are moyo'Bwanchani 'S'mang'an' ayio,Bore maiso maroreKarakira ndararera,'Bwanchani bwamboririe.

title: 44 Naborigwe, Naki Ndararie!
content:
# 44 Naborigwe, Naki Ndararie!

 1. Naborigwe naki ndararie!As'amanyinga y'engondiKoborigw' as' amaber' aye,Nabeir' omwan'oye bori.
Koborigwa!As'amanyinga y'eng'ondiKoborigwa!Nabeir'omwan' oye bori.
2. Koborigwa ngok' ase Yeso,Kobua buna ndakwaneOborabu bw'okoba kwaye,Nabomenye nainche bori.
3. Ndengereri' Omoboria one,Morengererie botambeNter' ekiagera tingokira,Eganga neb'obwanchani.
4. Nindore as' obuya bwaye,'ngokiri' as'amachik' aye'Yokondenda ker' ase ndabe,kong' amatera botuko.
5. Inche nagacheirwe egutwa,Yabekirwe ang'e igoro'Kero toraikeranigwe,Erio as'are nimbeo.

title: 45 E Rituko Riomogoko
content:
# 45 E Rituko Riomogoko

 1. E Rituko ri'omogoko,Nachoret' Omotori' oneTig'enkoro yan'echenge,Nakorari' obuya'onsi.
Rituko! mogoko!Kero Yeso ansibetie'Kanyegeria ogosaba,'Menye nomochengo rioka.Rituko! `mogoko!Kero Yeso ansibetie.
2. Okobwatana kwabeire,Nche n'oyoye, ner'oyoneAkang'usa nkamotunya,Nagokigwe komwatora
3. Enkoro yane timoka,Ase obotoereruGose torw' as' Omonene,Ere oyore n'obuya.
4. 'Gor'ekaigw' okobwatana,okoyia kera ritukoGoik' omoerio nyekanye,Goseseni' okobwatana.
5. 'Ker'omoganda o Igoro,Gotirimboka goch'enseEri Omonen'atenene,'Gambe nk'engiya botambe.

title: 46 Nkoro Nere N'Omogoko
content:
# 46 Nkoro Nere N'Omogoko

 1. Nkoro nere n'omogoko;Gankomotogi' OmoneneNing' orabotogie rende;Obwanchani 'obo bw' ogokumia?
Obwanchani bw'ogokumiaBw'ogokumia bwa YesoObwanchani, bw'ogokumiaBw'ogokumia bwa Yeso.
2. Nere okong'a' mogoko;Omorembe Oborabu'Riogo 'nguru ase enkoro;Obwanchani' obobw' ogokumia.
3. Onyigwe gankorangeria;Onyimokie, 'kero nkogwa'S'obogima, nas'ogokwa;N'obwanchani 'obo bw' ogokumia.

title: 47 Yeso Omotoria Bethlehemu
content:
# 47 Yeso Omotoria Bethlehemu

 1. Yes' Omotoria Bethlehemu,'S'obweri bw'ororo n'obosoku;Nakumirie buna antoririe,Agacha kondigia.Agatha kondigia,Agacha kondigiaNakumirie buna antoririe,Agacha kondigia.
2. Yes' Omotoria ase Kalwari,Agaakan' esir' akamboria;Naichanire ng'aki yabete bo,Ere agankweraEre agankwera,Ere agankweraNaichanire ng'aki yabete bo,Ere akandigia.
3. Yes' Omotori' one korwa kare,'Kandigia konare gotayayaAs' obwororo agansorora,Er' akandangeriaEr' akandangeria,Er' akandangeriaAs' obwororo agansorora,Er' akandangeria.
4. 'Motori'one nache korw' Igoro,Bun'eira yaye egotebaO nimorore ere kagocha,Gochicha konyoyiaGochicha konyoyia,Gochicha konyoyiaO nimorore ere kagocha,Gochicha konyoyia.

title: 48 Yeso Obeire Omosani
content:
# 48 Yeso Obeire Omosani

 1. Yes' obeire omosani,Obogima bwonsi;Ombekire omokia pi,Nere onkonyire.Kondemeire arangokie,onde tari omobueteChinsa chionsi arangokie,'Mosani.
2. Yes' obeire Omosani,Ase emechando;Ning'end' as'are botambe,Korigia ebisio.'Mobaso bwonsi n'embura,Bikorabia endagera;'Mobas' oye, otomire,'Mosani.
3. Yes' obeire Omosani,Tinkomotig' Ere;Naki ndamokanie bono,Gankonyire mono?Kondamotunyane Ere,Tingosira nonya ng'ake;Nimotunye, Kero gionsi,'Mosani.
4. Yes' obeire omosani,Tindigeti onde;Okwegena okonene,'mwegene botambe.'Bogima buya as'are,'Bogima botakoera;Obogima natokoe,'Mosani.

title: 49 Ng'usa Ang'e N'enkoro Yao
content:
# 49 Ng'usa Ang'e N'enkoro Yao

 1. Ngusa ang'e n'enkoro Yao;Ngusa 'Motoria aye omuya;Mbeke as'egekuba kiao,Onkenge ontimokie as'oreOnkenge ontimokie as'ore.
2. Ngusa ang'e, tindi na kende;Ndaretere Yeso Omogambi;Tatig' omoy' one omobe'Nsibie bono n'amanyinga ao'Nsibie bono n'amanying'a ao.
3. Ng'usa ang'e, imbe oyoo;Natigir' ebibe n'okomocha;'Mogoko bw'ense, n'ogwetogiaIng'a Yeso, oria onkwerete,Ing'a Yeso, oria onkwerete.
4. Ng'usa ang'e kond' omogima;Ntenene as' egetare kiane;Ase emiaka eria yonsi,Ong'use ang'e n'Aye 'Motoria,Ong'use ang'e n'Aye 'Motoria.

title: 50 'Motoria Bw'Ogokumia
content:
# 50 'Motoria Bw'Ogokumia

 1. Kristo bwerur' ekeng'wanso,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!Twaborigw' orur' esira,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!
'Motoria bw'ogokumianere Yeso one!'Motoria bw'ogokumianere Yes' one!
2. Nimobak' as' amanyinga,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!Ang'anchanetie na Nyasae,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!
3. Agansibi' enkoro yane,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!Ner'okogamba korwa ime,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!
4. Atara nainche botambe,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!Na gonkora omwegeni,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!
5. Ang'a nguru chi'obobui,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!Erio nabua ker'ensa,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!
6. Namoeir' enkoro yane,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!'Nse tekonyora getari,'Motoria bw'ogokumia!

title: 51 Nchiare Emerongo Kianda Na Kianda
content:
# 51 Nchiare Emerongo Kianda Na Kianda

 1. Nchiare emerongo, kianda na kiandaChiaraire egora ime,Eyemo egasirer' ebitunwaAre are n'egeita gi'enkaAre ase ebitunwa ebibeTeri ase omorisia omuyaTeri ase omorisia omuya.
2. "Monen' emerongo kianda na kiandaEchio tichigoisaini"?'Morisi' akairania: Eyemo yaneYasirire korwa ase nde-Nonya enchera ere embe monoNing'ende as'eroro koyerigiaNing'ende as'eroro koyerigia.
3. 'S' ababorigwa onde tamanyeteChindiba echi ambogeteGos' omosunte Yeso aeteteAtaranyor' engondi yayeAr' as' eroro akaigwa ekwana'Ndwair'etari kwenyar'er'ang'e gokwa'Ndwair'etari kwenyar'er'ange gokwa.
4. "Monene ng'ai amanying'aya arwa,'Nyororoget' egetunwa?"'Nigo aitekeret' omosiru,'Morisi' ataramoirania'"Ninki giasionoir' amabok'ao"Nigo asionorwa n'amagw' amangeNigo asionorwa n'amagw' amange'.
5. As 'ebitunwa chinkoba chigoaka,Korwa egetare 'goro'Riogi rikaigweka gochia igoro,'Goka nanyorire eng'ondi!Malaik' agater' as' ekerogo,"Monen' oiranirie egiasireteMonen' oiranirie egiasierete.

title: 52 Ar 'As' Egetunwa
content:
# 52 Ar 'As' Egetunwa

 1. Ar' as' egetunwanor' omosalaba,Bw' emechando n'obosoku;Naywanchir' Omote,S'omuy' Omosera,Gatokwer' abanyabibe.
Ngoker' omosalaba oria,bobui bwane mbeke inseNintarer' omosalab' oria,Kaa nyoonchoreri' egutwa.
2. Omosalab' oria,ochayire n'ense,Nore nomong'us' ase nde;Ng'ondi ya Nyasae,Gatig'obonene,Koyoira aria kalwari.
3. 'S' Omosalab' oria,Nimbe Omwegenwa,Nyimoki' obosoku bwaye,Erio nandangerie,gochia nka igoro,'Nsange obonene bwaye.

title: 53 Togi' Omonen' Omotoria
content:
# 53 Togi' Omonen' Omotoria

 1. Togi 'Omonen' Omotoria,'Moik' atobwatanie,Gatobwatanirie 'go,tobe n'omoy'oyomo.
2. 'Tochikire tober'aa,Tob'abam' as' are,Erio totere gator'amo,Gochi' enchera 'goro.
3. Abanchet'erieta riay'obaeir 'ebiegwa;Natworoki 'obuy'obonge,Gatwanchaine buya.
4. .Toigwanaine buy'as'ense,Togok'ase Yeso;Mogoko ki oyi'orabe,Gatwaikire Igoro.

title: 54 "Bw'emechando"
content:
# 54 "Bw'emechando"

 1. "Bw'emechando!" Ndietaki as'Omwana O Nyasae'Chete kobori' ababeHaleluya n'Omotoria!
2. 'Kabogori' obosoku,'Gaitwa ribaga riane'Kangora 'S' amanyinga,Haleluya n'Omotoria!
3. 'Bamochi ababe tware,'Re tare nakemoaEkeng'wanso ekiya,HaIeluya n'Omotoria!
4. 'Kaimokigwa agakwa,Karera "Yaerire!"Bono Igoro are,Haleluya n'Omotoria!
5. 'Ker 'arach' Omogambi,kwoyia ababorigweNtotere ogotera,Haleluya n'Omotoria!

title: 55 Nter' Okobua Kwa Nyasae
content:
# 55 Nter' Okobua Kwa Nyasae

 1. Nter' okobua kwa Nyasae,Gwatong' ebitunwa,Kwaara chinyancha chionsi,kwaagacha Igoro;Bong'aini bwaye bwachika,Risase kobara;Motienyi, ching'enang'eni,nkoigwera bire.
2. Nter' obuya bw'Omonene,Bwaret' endagera;'Kabitonga nering'ana,kabikor' ebiya,'Monen' a'makumia ao,Aichir' ense yonsi!Nonya nas'ense ngotacha,N'erioba igoro!
3. 'Mote tori ense aa,otagokobaka;'Mare aichora n'omwaga,Gokwayachikire;Bionsi bire moyoobo nay'okobirenda;Ense teri torebise,Nyasae otarore.

title: 56 Nere Embura Engiya
content:
# 56 Nere Embura Engiya

 1. Nere embura engiya'Gotwa koret' ebisio;Goisanekia ab'erang'o'Monene nainche ntwerie.
Nonya nche Nonya nche,Tig'amatoim' angwere.
2. Tong'etania Tat'omuya;nimba omonyabibeAmaber' ao botambe'Monene Onyorokie.
3. 'Natebanir'as'ebibenkogechia na gokwanga,Ense nigo ensibete,Nyaber' erind'onkonye!
4. Tong'etani' Omoik' omuya,'Nkoru'ore okorora,Ooroki' Obuya bwa Yeso,ntebie ay'Omorembe.

title: 57 Ichw' Omoik' Omochenu
content:
# 57 Ichw' Omoik' Omochenu

 1. Inchw' Omoik' OmochenuOnsibi' omoyo one,Onsibie enkoro yane,Inchuo ng'ichorie bono.
Ng'ichorie, Ng'ichorie,Yeso nchwo ong'ichorieN'okoboko kwao ogochenu,ng'ichorie bono.
2. Nong'ichori' Omoik' omuyaNonya tinkogotebiaKo ninkoganetie monoInchuo ng'ichorie bono.
3. Naichoirwe n'oboreuNekanyire as'oreOmoika OmochenuOmbekere chinguru.
4. Nchene, ndemie, nsesenienkony' osibie 'nkoro yaneN'ay' okoremia, gotoriaBono nkong'ichori' ore.

title: 58 Omoika Omochenu
content:
# 58 Omoika Omochenu

 1. Omoika Omochenu,Omorai 'Mwegenwa;Tobwate okoboko,Abator' abatari;Toche as'ore toigwe,Eriogi ri'obwororo,"'Motari, nchwo ase nde,Ningoikie Igoro."
2. Naye or'Omosani,'Gokonywa kore ang'e;Tototiga emechando,N'ase omosunt' ime;K'emerind' ekogusa,Chinkoro chikwoboa,Monyerere "'Motari,Inchuo ningotang'ane."
3. 'Meremo gekoera,Togany'ogotimoka;Totari n' okogania,Tatiga Igoro oka;Titori n'okogania,Manyinga a Yes'oka,Monyerere "'Motari,Notimoke Igoro."

title: 59 'Moika Igw' Ogobaba
content:
# 59 'Moika Igw' Ogobaba

 1. 'Moika igw' ogosaba,Omeny' as'enkoroNechinguru ochich' aye;Omoika inchuo.
2. Inchuo buna oborabu,'Keene twaganiaTworoki' enchera endonge,Tokor' emeremo.
3. Inchuo buna omorero,Tosibie chinkoroTochirw' ekengwans' ekiya,Ase obwanchani.
4. Bun' embura tosesenie,Kero 'ga twerureKer' enkoro yororobe,'Se chinguru chiao.
5. Bun' omwaga 'Moika nchuo,Buna PentekoteOtworoki' ogotorekaAs' abanto bonsi.

title: 60 Moik' Omochenu O Igoro
content:
# 60 Moik' Omochenu O Igoro

 1. 'Moik' Omochenu o igoroRab' as' enkoro yaneOserie OmosunteOyokor' Oborabu.
2. 'Moika 'nguru chia IgoroOchen' enkoro yaneEbibe biangambeireAs' engaki entambe.
3. 'Moik' omogok' oigoroEnkoro yane remiaSeri' emechand' emengeGwenia enkoro yane.
4. 'Moika, bionsi bia igoroOmenye omoy'oneNsererie chisanamuOngamber' aye bweka.

title: 61 Ngosanga Ki Mogok'o Igoro
content:
# 61 Ngosanga Ki Mogok'o Igoro

 1. Ngosanga ki, 'mogoko IgoroNyeegek' ase Yeso bwekaNgosesenigwa ki 'Morembe kiNyeegek' ase Yeso bweka.
Eegeke, Moremb' otari n'obobeEegeke, Eegek' ase Yeso bweka.
2. Ninyenyar' enchera enyerereNyeegek' ase Yeso bweka'Nchera nenyare koba enyangoNyeegek' ase Yeso bweka.
3. Tikeri kende gekonyirokiaNyeegek' ase Yeso bwekaNinde nomorembe bw'OmoneneNyeegek' ase Yeso bweka.

title: 62 Tari 'Mosani Obuete Yeso
content:
# 62 Tari 'Mosani Obuete Yeso

 1. Tari Omosani obuete Yeso,Tario kegima;Tari' oratogwenie chinkoro,keen', ekeene.
Omanyir' emechando yaito,Natorae goik' omoerioTari Omosani obuete Yeso,Tario kegima.
2. Tari' omosani 'mochenu o igoro,Tario kegimaTari' omoitongo buna Yeso,Tario kegima.
3. Tikeri ker'atari'ang'e naintwe,Tikeri, kegimaTibori botuk' atatoremie,Tibori kegima.
4. 'Mochenu tari omotigire,Tario kegimaMobe tari aranyare kwanga,Tario kegima.
5. Keegwa buna Yeso nkiaruetwe,Nkiareo kegimaTagotwanga gotoira bwoye,Takwanga kegima.

title: 63 'Masase As' Egetunwa
content:
# 63 'Masase As' Egetunwa

 1. Masase as' egetunwa,Masase ar' enyancha,Akobara ebirubo,As' oborisi' obuya;Korende mbor' oborabu,Bor' omoy' one ime,Omoboria nao ore,Oborabu mboreo.
Amasase amaya mono,Ayare omoy' oneYeso kare amo nainche,Namasase enkoro.
2. Nintugut' omoichano,buna eang' engotu;Kwamboyirie omogoko,Naichorw' ogotogia;Nor' omochie bw' oborabu,Agw'aye kwandoseirie'Moy' one orengererie,Nakobwatirie Yeso.
3. Omoboria kwangorire,Obogima n'obwao;Ekemore ki'abwanchani,Kemoreke boronge;Nor' omochie bw' oborabu,Agw' aye kwandoseirie'Moy' one orengerereirie,Nakobwatirie Yeso.

title: 64 Ko ndabe Amo Na Yeso
content:
# 64 Ko ndabe Amo Na Yeso

 1. Ko ndabe amo na Yeso,Nyigw' Amang'ana' Amaya!Aase agiya ndabe,Mbe aroro botambe!Kondabe amo na Yeso,Ning'inyore botambe;Bwanchani bwaye n'obuya,Bwankonyire kegima.
2. Kondabe amo na Yeso,Ase ndasesenigwe;'Bibe biane motigere,Anyare gontimokiaKondabe amo na Yeso,Ninyare komosaba,Ere nang' Obuya bwaye,Na kondemia botambe.
3. Onsesenie, Omotoria,Kondabe amo n'AyeNyoroki' obwanchani Bwao,Ndore obosio bwao'Monene ngwekane Yeso,Omochenu bun' EreKondabe amo na Yeso,Nere obuya bwane.

title: 65 Omonene Ningwanchete
content:
# 65 Omonene Ningwanchete

 1. Omonene ningwancheteKobua ebienseKwang'eire omoremb' ooKende getasarie.
Abange tibaramanya (bamanye)'Bwanchani obuya;Abange tibaramanya (bamanye)'Manying' ansibirie (nsibirie)
2. Namanyire nore ang'eKobua abenseAye n'omuya Kobua,Kobua bionsi pi.
3. Kwangokirie as'omoyo,Nsasoke KobuaNtware obwanchani bwao,Ting'ichana mono.
4. Omotori' omuya mono,Otar' amo naincheNatonyore omogoko,Gatorakorore.

title: 66 Nanyorire Omosani
content:
# 66 Nanyorire Omosani

 1. Nanyorire Omosani!'Kanyancha ntaramanya;Akang'usa n'obwanchani,Nabo inche ndamwanche.Ime as'enkoro yane,Ere, ong'eir' obuyaNind' oyoye ner'oyone,Igo kare na kare.
2. Nanyorire Omosani!Agakwa na gontoria;Tari ekeegwa goika,Akerua omonyene.Tindi gwetogeria gento,Bionsi nebiaye Yeso;'Nkoro, chinguru, 'bogima,Biaye kare na kare.
3. Nanyorire Omosani!Oeirwe okobua,Kondaa gochia Igoro,Na kong'ikia aroroBonene bwarorekana,Mboinyore botambeBono nkore emeremo,Nintimoke botambe.
4. Nanyorire Omosani!'Muya omoitongoAgonsemia na kondaa,OyokondwanereraEre akanyancha mono,Ninki kerandusie o?Ogokwa tigokondusia,Noyoye nde botambe.

title: 67 Nyasa' Abarende Botambe
content:
# 67 Nyasa' Abarende Botambe

 1. Nyasa' abarende botambe;Abateneni' abaraeBuna abanchani baye;Nyasa' abarende botambe.
Erio (erio) tororane,Tororan' omoerio (moerio)Erio (erio) tororane,Nyasa' abarende botambe.
2. Nyasa' abarende botambe,Ababise n'echimbabaEndagera ebaisane;Nyasa' abarende botambe.
3. Nyasa' abarende botambe,Ase emechando yonsiAbaagate kegima,Nyasa' abarende botambe.
4. Nyasa' abarende botambe,Mobe n'obwanchani mwensi'Siri' obwoba bw'amakweri,Nyasa' abarende botambe.

title: 68 Amaena Yeso N'Oyone
content:
# 68 Amaena Yeso N'Oyone

 1. Amaene 'Yeso n'oyone,Bwansu bw'obonene obochenuOmonyamwando O Nyasae,'Boirw' as' Omoika, n'amanyinga.
'Mogano n'ogotera kwane,Motogie 'Motoria botambe'Mogano n'ogotera kwane,Motogie 'Motoria botambe.
2. Koigwera n'omogok' omuya,'Ndoto chingiya chianchichera'Malaika barwa igoro,Baret' amaber' obwanchani.
3. Koigwera n'ogotimoka,Ningoke ime y'OmotoriaNdende, nganye, ntengere 'goro,Ng'ichorw' obuya n'obwanchani.

title: 69 Ntebi Omogano O Igoro
content:
# 69 Ntebi Omogano O Igoro 

 1. Ntebi' omogano o lgoro,otakororeka;O Yeso n'obonene,n'obwanchani bwayeNtebi na obwororo,buna as' omwana;Nch' omworo omorosu,otakonye kende.
Ntebi' omogan' okare,Ntebie mogan' okareNtebi' amang'an'a Yeso,N'obwanchani bwaye.
2. Ntebi' omogano ng'ora,Nario ndayomanye;Koborigw' okonene,kogwenia chinkoroOyontebie botambe,Nigo nkweba bwango;Mang'an'ayio nyamanye,Nyanche ekeene.
3. Ntebererie boronge,Neriogi rigiya;Narenge monyabibe,Yeso agantoriaOnyorokie Enjili,Gotokonya buya;Kobek' omonto buya,Kero ki'emechando.
4. Ntebi' Enjili kegima,'Mang'an' amaronge;Mogoko bw'ens' ong'ura,Bogima bw'enkoroEri' ens' enkiamokere,kondaike Igoro;Ntebi' Enjili kegima,Ya Yes' Omotoria.

title: 70 Seseni' Obwanchani
content:
# 70 Seseni' Obwanchani

 1. Seseni' obwanchaniBwe chinkoro chiato'Bomo bwe chinkoro chiato,Bonga bwa Igoro.
2. Obosio bwa Tata,Tosabe n'omoyo;Ogosemeria kwegeria,Bib' omoy'oyomo.
3. Sanger' emechando,Noborito bwonsi;Botambe tororerane,Amabera rioka.
4. Gatogotigana,Natwechande mono;Korende ntobwatanigwe,Tokoumerana

title: 71 Ng'a Ay' Ebuku
content:
# 71 Ng'a Ay' Ebuku

 1. Ng'a ay' Ebuku etaya engiya,Gokony' abanto bachandekire;Kende tikegotanga okwegena,Buna Yes' achete gototoria.
Ng'a ay' Ebuku amang'an' amaya,Amasas' aye nanyare kondaa;Gochika kwaye eir' obwanchani,Goik' omoerio bigenderere.
2. Ng'a ay' Ebuku konde nogoichana,Ker' omoyo oichoirwe n'ebibe;Ng'a ring'ana riakwanetwe na Yeso,Nyegene morore Yeso ang'e.
3. Ng'a ay' Ebuku inyare komanya,Mechando yonsi ere ens'eye;Amasas' aye aseri' omoichano,Ayerabi' enchera y'omorembe.
4. Ng'a ay' Ebuku 'taya y'obogima,Gokoiran' achiche komboria;Onyorokie etaya ya Igoro,Nindore obonene bwa Yeso.

title: 72 Nanchir' Eng'ana ya Nyasae
content:
# 72 Nanchir' Eng'ana ya Nyasae

 1. Nanchir' eng'an' ya Nyasae,Kende tigekoribuaRikonyoroki' obomenyo,Rintebia ntame korw' abe.
2. 'Mang'an' amay' anyorokia,'Monene, one ntarochiKorw' as'ore negeire,'Mogok' okoretwa nere.
3. Nobe ribaga Riay' aa,Ontebi' obwanchani Bwaye,Ningosome n'okwegena,Nsang' omogok' o Igoro.
4. 'Me yao nao nkonyora,'mwando bw'Omotongi one'S' enibo y'obong'aini ere,Goichori' ebirengererio.
5. Karu' amasase arabi' ense,Andae im' omosunteMorek' enkoro emwamu,Tinsira korwa as'ore.

title: 73 Nintebe Omogano
content:
# 73 Nintebe Omogano

 1. Nintebe omogano,Bw'ebinto bia lgoro,O Yeso n'obonene,Nobwanchani bwaye,Nintebe omogano,'Kiagera namaene,Nig'okong'isanekia,Kende getanyare.
Nintebe omogano,Nob'omogoko oneNteb' omogan' o kare,N'obwanchani bwaye.
2. Nintebe omogano,'Yore bw'ogokumia,Kobu'ebiens' ebiya,Nonya 'ndoto ngiyaNintebe omogano,Onkonyire mono,Nakio ekio kiagera,Nkogotebia bono
3. Nintebe omogano,N'omuya koirorwa,Ker' ekero ngoteba,'Mwansu bw'ogokumiaNintebe omogano,Bande mbarayoigwa,'Ng'ana y'ogotoreka,Ring'ana ria Nyasae.
4. Nintebe omogano,'S'abayomanyete,Bare nchara n'erang'o,Koigwa bun' abandeAs' obonene ntere,Gotera okoyia,Nob'omogan'o kare,oyio naganchire.

title: 74 Inchwo Abegeni
content:
# 74 Inchwo Abegeni

 1. Inchwo abegeni abamwabuire,'Nchwo Bethelehemu 'nw'ababui,Ror'Omogambi O'goro Oiboirwe.
Inchwo tomosasime,Inchwo tomosasime,'Nchwo tomosasime Omonene.
2. Ter'amalaika, tera n'omogoko,Ter'abanto bonsi bare igoro,'Bonene bwonsi ase Nyasae igoro.
3. Togochengere kwaiboirw' emambi'engiya,Yeso oegw' obonene bwonsi,'Ng'ana ya Tat' oboirw' as' omobere.

title: 75 Nindigetie Manye Yeso
content:
# 75 Nindigetie Manye Yeso

 1. Nindigetie manye Yeso,'Buya bwaye mboorokieNdor' ogotoreka kwaye,'Bwanchani bw'oy'onkwerete.
Kobua, kobua,nimomanye YesoNdor'ogotoreka kwaye,'Bwanchani bw'oy'onkwerete.
2. Ndigetie nyegere Yeso,N'obochenu bwaye manye'Moik' oye ab'omworokia,Konyoroki' onsi a Kristo.
3. Manye Yes' ase Ring'ana,Nkwane n'Omonene oneErio nyigw' eriogi riaye,'Mang'an' aye ab' ayane.
4. 'Manye Yes'as' obogambi,'Bonda, 'Bonene nebiayeBonda bwaye bomenteke,'Mogambi bw'omoremb' ache.

title: 76 Kobusura Mambia
content:
# 76 Kobusura Mambia

 1. Kobusura mambia,'mbusuro chingiya,Kobusura mobaso, mogorobaToganye rigesa n'ogosangereria,Natochenge tokoreta rigesa.
Reta rigesa, Reta rigesa;Natochenge tokoreta rigesaReta rigesa, Reta rigesa;Natochenge tokoreta rigesa.
2. Twabusur' ensakia nonya n'ekiriri,Titobugwa n'obokendu n'omwagaMbwango eraere emeremo yonsi,Natochenge tokoreta rigesa.
3. Busurera Yeso Ase amariga,Nase emechando n'omoichanoEro gekoera natoire bwoye,Natochenge tokoreta rigesa.

title: 77 Tori' Abagosiria
content:
# 77 Tori' Abagosiria

 1. Tori' abagosira, Gweni' abagokwa,Taboria korw' embera y'ebibeRer 'abakomocha, 'Moki' abakogwa,Batebie Yeso ner'Omotoria.Tori' abagosira, Gweni' abagokwaYes' omonyamaber' abatorie.
2. Nonya bachayete, Nabaganyete,'Ganyete oyom'ogoonchokaBakurere mono, Baebererie,Nababere kabaramwegene.
3. Motemi'osaririe, chinkoro chiabo,'Buya bokony' ebirengererio'Bwanchani, Bwororo, Bikun'enkoro,Nebe moyo ase Omonene.
4. Tori' abagosira, Nab'eganeirie,'Monene ere nakoe chinguru'S'oboremereria, obairanie,Batebi' Omotori' obakwereire.

title: 78 Korer'Omonen' Emerem'Emiya
content:
# 78 Korer'Omonen' Emerem'Emiya 

 1. Korer'Omonen' emerem'emiya n'ogwancha,Kabe n'oboremu kora motari koiroka.
2. Nonya Saitani nabek'emeribo y'obobe,Oy'otorangeirie n'omwegenwa natorende.
3. Eira yaye as'abasomba baye ner'eye'"'Meremo yao as'Omonene teri bola"

title: 79 Totamera Kende
content:
# 79 Totamera Kende

 1. Totamera kende, 'Meremo nereo,Kabe ang'ogende, Ase oratomweOkorangeirire, Botamb' as' obuya,Tibwang' emeremo, 'Miya ya Igoro.
Aye nchwo (bono) Totamera kende,Aye nchwo (bono) Kabe ang' ogendeTotamera kende, Ande notebigwe,"Aye gwanchayete, Togochia Igoro".
2. Totamera kende, 'Monen' orangeirie,Kwangir' aye mono, Igw' eriogi bwangoRigesa riamire, 'Bagesi nabake,Kabe n'omogoko, Korer' Omonene.
3. Totamera kende, Bono totebana,Tomochaya Ere, Ande nagotigeRibaga korire, Orore Igoro,Ngosororwa ore Inchuo nabwaberwe.

title: 80 Omonene Rigoro Nainyora
content:
# 80 Omonene Rigoro Nainyora

 1. Monen'one 'S'ogokumia nkoinyora;Bint'amabok'ao akorete,Ndora ng'enang'eni nyigwa chinkoba;Bioroki'ense okobua kwao.
Nkoro yan'eterer' Omotoria;Monen' Aye Bw'ogokumia!Nkoro yan'eterer' Omotoria;Monen' Aye Bw'ogokumia.
2. Kongoeta chinsana ime ng'ichana;Nyigwa chinyoni chikogotogiaGankorigereria korw'ebitunwa;Ndoche chioga mbeo engiy'egusa.
3. Nkoinyora buna kwaruet'Omwan' oo;Kamotom'ache gokwa ng'ichana,Kabogori'ebib'as' Omosalaba;Manying'aitek'eri'agansibia.
4. Kristo karache n'eriogi rinene;Kong'ira nka ng'ichorw'omogoko,Ntung'ame mosasime n'oboitongo;Ndari'agwo Nyasae Bw'ogokumia.

title: 81 Kor' Emeremo Mboire
content:
# 81 Kor' Emeremo Mboire

 1. Kor' emeremo mboire, oyekore mambia;Kora korime rire, As' ebisichaYekore kobogokia, Risase korireKora bwango naboire, Ker' otakore.
2. Kor' emeremo mboire, Yekore mobasoKera ensa yekore, Bwang' otimoke'Kero gi'ensakia nyora, Egent' okogachaKor' emeremo mboire, Ker' otakore.
3. Kor' emeremo mboire, kora kobokoira;Kamasas' akomesa, 'Tuko riaetaMasase akorima, Atabare rindeKer' omosunt' ogocha, Ker' otakore.

title: 82 Tekob' Egetunwa Igoro
content:
# 82 Tekob' Egetunwa Igoro

 1. Tekob' egetunwa Igoro,Gose ng'umbu y'enyancha,Gose tai oroari ime,Nyasa' Aranganerie;Gakorangeria ng'or' obwororo,Nintamany' enchera,Korambwat' okoboko ningende,As' origetie ngende.
Ningende as' origetie ngende,Bitunwa, 'birubo, 'nyancha;Nintebe bun' aganetie ntebe,Nimbe buna aganetie.
2. Nare amang'ana obwanchani,Yes' arigetie ntebe,Gose nab' omonto' 'as' ebibe,'Yongwenerete ndigie;'Motoria korab' Omorai one,'Nchera neb' embe,Ninkwan' amang'an' ao amaya,Bun' origetie nintebe.
3. Ase nare ens'achayire,ko rigesa ndireo,'Se ndakore emeremo yaYeso obambetwe;Kondegene as' oborai bwao,'Manyete nonyanchete,Ninkore obwanchani bwao obuya,Nimbe buna origetie.

title: 83  Nimbwate Omosani
content:
# 83  Nimbwate Omosani

 1. Nimbwate Omosani,Nimwanchete mono;Nigo anyanchete mono,Anchete kegima;Tinkoba moyo ataiyo,Mbuya kare ang'e,Erio twamenya amo:Ere nainche.
2. Kero kende narosa,Ere namanyete;Kagontebia mweegeke,Nanyor' ogokonywa;Nere okondaa nchera,Tinyara kogochwa;Erio twatara amo,Ere nainche.
3. Nigo nkomworoki' onsi;Omogoko one;Naende obororo bo,Nony' Omoichano;Antebia nkore amaya,Buna nche ndateme.Erio twakwana amo,Ere nainche.
4. Namanyet' okogania,Morete oyomo;Onchikire ntebie 'bande,Ring'ana rigiya,Ntebe obwanchani bwaye,'Kiageret' agakwa.Twakora emeremo,Ere nainche.

title: 84 Kondaror' Omosalaba
content:
# 84 Kondaror' Omosalaba

 1. Kondaror' Omosalaba,Ase Kristo ankwerete'Nibo yane yonsi mbosaNtig' oboenenu bwaye.
2. Rora omobere oyeObororo n'obwanchaniBiana koumerana rindeGos' amagwa kob' egutwa?
3. Nche omosiru nabeirwe'S' erieta, Ring'ana riayeTinyetogeria gent' enseTatig' omosalaba' oo.
4. Nintwar' obotongi bw'enseTibogoisan' Esadaka'S' Obwanchani bwogokumiaBonganetie nche na bionsi.

title: 85 Tokor' Emerem' Abasomba ba Yeso
content:
# 85 Tokor' Emerem' Abasomba ba Yeso

 1. Tokor' emerem' abasomba ba Yeso,Tobwatie enchera yaye aetete'S' ogosemia kwaye Tonyore chinguru,Tokore eki'amabok' aito akonyara.
Omokia, omokia, Omokia, omokiaTosabe. . . . Torende. . . .Tokore ach' Omonene.(mono) (rioka)
2. Tokore emeremo bonsi baigote,Amache abare n'erang'o bayanywe'Mosalab' ebendera yaito erabe,Baranderie "ogotoreka kwa bosa."
3. Tokor' emeremo amo toyekore,Obogima bw'omosunte n'abosireRieta ria Yehova rimokigwe Igoro,'S'Ogotera "Ogotoreka kwa bosa."
4. Tokore emeremo goik' omoerio,Rigesa ndiike bagesi bachicheOmochie bw'ababorigwe nobe seito,Natotere "Ogotoreka kwa bosa"!

title: 86 'S'Omogoko Natomokerere
content:
# 86 'S'Omogoko Natomokerere

 1. 'S'omogoko natomokorere,Omonen'emerem'emiya;Kende gionsi bun'Er'arachike,'S'okwegena natogekore.
Korera (Korera) Yeso,As'omogoko (ee) As'omogoko,Korera (Korera) Yeso,'S'omogond'oy'as'ense.
2. 'S'omogoko ntoteb'omogano,Bw'obwanchani bway'as'abanto;Krist' ore oborabu bwa Tata,Natoe ogosesenigwa.
3. 'S'oboitongo tomotunye Yeso,Totare chincher'atarete;Toirani' abasiru as'Omotoria,Baror' Emanwa ya Nyasae.

title: 87 O Ng'ai Abagesi
content:
# 87 O Ng'ai Abagesi

 1. Ong'ai abagesi bakogesa,Abant' abegeni korwa ense?'Merem' ekorek' as' ekeene,Onde tatimoka goika eere.
Ng'ai abagesi bare bache,Basang' obonen' enka y'erigesa'Ng' oratokonye, kobareta,Bant' abegeni korwa ense.
2. Gend' as'ebinchera mobarigie,Babe mbange k'abaya mbareoBarigie nchera timotig'onde,Basangererie kogenda 'goro.
3. Rigesa riarabire And'onsi,'Nse bono neganyete rigesaBagesi mbake, merem'emenge,Abange mbasire rikonyorwa.
4. Bono nchwo n'emeyio mwanyabanto,Mogese embusuro engiyaKor' omoki' Omonene nachiche,Twegokie ner as' enka yaye.

title: 88 'Ngegu Y'enyancha Ngu'mbu
content:
# 88 'Ngegu Y'enyancha Ngu'mbu

 1. Ngegu y'enyancha ng'umbu,'Kobara buya monoRiogi rikondangeria,Ng'ayerere ng'ikeo.
Ning'ende tintebana,Monene ondangeirieNingende inyigwere,Minto tigara buya.
2. 'Monene otebire,"Bagesi ayerera!"Mogondo ng'ar' okare,'Baminto tiga ng'ende.
3. Eng'umbu y' emerindo,'Koboko nkoimokirieEbisieri mbigoire,'Basiru bandageirie.
4. Tata, Baba, n'abana,Mwensi tigara buyaAria ng'umbu y'enyancha,'Meremo nenganyete.

title: 89 Gosimekr' Amarigo
content:
# 89 Gosimekr' Amarigo

 1. Gosimeker' amariga,'Mbusur'as' 'obwanchani;Takorosa na korara,Nonyor' obuya bwaye.
Rigereria ense yonsi,Rigesa ndire ang'e;Ror' endagera yamire,Rigesa ng'ang'e rire.
2. Ngotw' ere korwa Igoro,'Borabu bw'omobaso;Emete yonsi nayame,Ne chinguru chia Nyasae.
3. Toros' as'ogosimeka.Tobaisa koiroka;Nonyor' emechand' emenge,Nogese n'omochengo.

title: 90 igw' Omogano Bw'ogokumia
content:
# 90 igw' Omogano Bw'ogokumia

 1. Igw' omogano bw' ogokumia,Twamenyet' abasiruYes' agaika n'obonene,Gatorusi' egesibo.
Ng' otorusiri' omosunte?(Nere Yeso obambetwe)'Nki akorete? (Agankwera)Ng'ai akare? 'goro gotosabera(Egene Igoro gotosabera.)
2. Taiyo orenge gototoria,nonya namalaika'Kabambwa agachayw' akangwa,'Yomo ase Nyasae.
3. Mbwerue ase Omotori'oyo?Mbwanche bwekany 'as'are?Naye noror' obuya bwaye,Nagotori' ere bono.

title: 91 Korangerigwa Nkore Korwa Ng'umbu
content:
# 91 Korangerigwa Nkore Korwa Ng'umbu

 1. 'Korangerigwa nkore korwa ng'umbu,Toma oborabuChinkoro chiganetie ogokonywa,Toma oborabu.
Borabu 'nchili 'sesenirie,Borabe goik' engeguBotome masari' ayerabie,Ense yonsi botambe.
2. 'Korangerigwa korwa Makedonia,Toma oborabuTwerue intwe as' omot' abambetwe,Toma oborabu.
3. Tosabe buya boche ense yonsi,Toma oborabu'Koba buna Kristo kobe and' onsi,Toma oborabu.
4. Titorosa gokora obwanchani,Toma oborabuTosangererie baye as' egutwa,Toma oborabu.

title: 92 Nkorandi'ore Ring'ana Ri'obonda
content:
# 92 Nkorandi'ore Ring'ana Ri'obonda

 1. Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda'Yominto ko ribaga rire?Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda'Yominto k'omobaso ore?
Rigesa bono ng'ang'e rire ('ng'e rire);Meremo y'abagesi eere (kegima)Rigesa riao naki rirabe;'Monene kagosangereri' abanto.
2. Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda,'Botuko botoererete?Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda,Rigesa rigiya richenu?
3. Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda,'Ncher' eyi' abanto baraigwe?Nosangererie rigesa rigiya,Inchwo obwatane n'abande.

title: 93 Tiga Ker' Etaya Yoke
content:
# 93 Tiga Ker' Etaya Yoke

 1. Tiga ker' etaya yoke,Omosunte ngoch' ore'Mosunte bw'ens' Omonene,Omonen' ataracha.
Rosia chitay' abaminto,Mochirosie n'okoiroka.Gocha kwaye ng'ange kore,Kera etaya yoke.
2. Nony' abange mbasundoka,Bakwanga gwanch' enchiliKwegena gwaito ntobeke,'S' eira yokoirana.
3. 'Ng'ana riaye nari'etayaNtokonyara gosira'Mechando neba ker' ase,Titokonyara kwangwa.
4. 'Merem' emiy' eoroke,eyesokie ens'eye'Koigwera koret' ebisio,Gatore n'okwegena.

title: 94 Motori' Atotebia Torende
content:
# 94 Motori' Atotebia Torende

 1. Motori' atotebia torende,tosabe riokaAru' Omoika bwe chinguru'Se baria banchire.
2. 'Totebia torende tosabe,Tob' abarwaniTokonye toigw' eriogi riao,Koigwer 'obogima.
3. 'Totebia torende tosabe,Naki bwango ng'acheGototimokia atoire,Enka ya botambe.
4. 'Totebia torende, tosabe,'Mogambi ochireNa toigwere n'omogoko,Torende goik' ache.

title: 95 Bugia Engoma Y' Enchili
content:
# 95 Bugia Engoma Y' Enchili

 1. Bugia engoma y' enchili,Ker' omont' akurerwe;Oyokoigwa Ring'ana,Aonchok' abe moyo.
Bugi' engoma Omwegeni,Yebugi' ense n'enyancha;Nyasae ochikireker'omosibwa asiborwe.
2. Yebugie chinsinyo chionsi,'Se abasibwa bare;Teba "Bionsi ng'ang'e bire,Tata obarangeirie."
3. Yebugi' ebitunwa igoro,Ase chiroro chionsi;Chindiba chiiranerie,'Mogok' ogotoreka.
4. Yebugie 'S'abarosire'Ganetie batimoke;Omotori' obachikire,"Mbuya moche as'ende."

title: 96 Imok' Abakristo Bun' Abesegi
content:
# 96 Imok' Abakristo Bun' Abesegi

 1. Imok' Abakristo bun'abesegi,Mosalaba O Yes' otang'aine bosioKristo natang'aine ase esegi,Bosi' as'esegi ror' ebendera.
Imok' Abakristo bun'abesegiMosalaba 'O Yes'otang'aine bosio.
2. 'Riogi ri'obobui Saitani atama,'Bakrist' abarwani rwana mobueMakweri aiguswa koigw' okobaka,Abaminto tera 'moki'amariogi.
3. Kanisa ya Nyasae bun' abarwani,Toet' as'abegeni baetete;Titwatananeka, intwe nabamo,gosemeri', ogwancha, kwegeri'okomo.
4. 'Bagambi baeta, Magambi agwa,Kanisa ya Yeso nebeo rioka;'Nguru chi'amakweri, Nchikoyebua,Ntore n'eira ya Yes' etabugwe.
5. 'Nchwo abanto mwensi togende amo,Tera naintw' ogotera kwo'bobui;Gosik' ogotogia Kristo Erwoti,'Malaika, 'banto tera botambe.

title: 97 Enkoro Yane Imoka
content:
# 97 Enkoro Yane Imoka

 1. Enkoro yane imoka,Ne chinguru chionsi,Esegi n'ey' Omonene,Keegwa n'egutwa.
2. Eriogi n'eria Nyasae,Rigokorangeria,Ner' omonyene okorwa,'Gutwa y'obogima.
3. 'Barofi nabwo abange,Bakorigereria;Toinyora as' okorwa,Bwatia orogendo.
4. 'Monene gwatochakirie,Koamererania;Buna intwe tokobua,Kobua nokwao.

title: 98 'Bachenu More N'oboros' Obuya
content:
# 98 'Bachenu More N'oboros' Obuya

 1. Bachenu more n'oboros'obuyaase okwegena ring'ana riaye;Nkiaratebe Kebuet'egiatebete,Ning'onagotamera Omotoria?Ning'onagotamera Omotoria?
2. Timoiroka ninde amo nainwe,Naki Ninche Nyasae orabatorie;Nkoe 'nguru, ngotorie, ngotenenie,nkobwate n'okoboko gwe chinguru,Nkobwate nokoboko gwe chinguru.
3. Kondakorangerie korw' as'amache,Ndoche chi'obororo nchigokobua;Naki nimbe naye kogosesenia,Na kogochena korw'as'emechandoNa kogochena kortv'as'emechando.
4. Nonya kogoet'emechand'emenge,Obuya bwane obonge mboisaine;'Morerb' omong'orakobue,Nayobekir'ogochen' ogosibie'Nayobekir'ogochen' ogosibie.
5. Nkoro etimogete ase Yeso,Tinkoyetig'egend'as'ababisa;Nkor'eyio amakweri nayenyegeria,Tinkoyetiga yaya tinkoyetiga,Tinkoyetiga yaya tinkoyetiga.

title: 99 Enkoro Yane Renda
content:
# 99 Enkoro Yane Renda

 1. 'Nkoro yane renda;Babis' emeganda,B'ebibe babetereria;Gokorusia Igoro.
2. Renda rwana saba;Timotig'esegi,Rwan'as'oboyia botambe;Saba ogokonywa.
3. 'Segi teraera;Totig' amatimo'Segi eye tekoera;Goik'onyore egutwa.

title: 100 Tindi N'eki Nyegenete
content:
# 100 Tindi N'eki Nyegenete

 1. Tindi n'eki nyegenete;Tatig'amanying' a Yeso,Tinkonyara Omonyene;'Bibe biane kobisibia.
Yes'egetare nteneine,S'ande nigo nkorimera,S'ande nigo nkorimera.
2. Mosunte n'otub' amaiso;'Buya bwaye bong'isane,Emerindo kerang'ake;'Nguru chiaye ching'isane.
3. Amanying' Aye n'eira;Binkonye as' emechando,Onsi ense gekoera;'Monen' Ere nang'isane.
4. Karache n'ebitureri;Tiga ntoke nde ime yaye,Nyeboyetie oboronge;Ntari nakomocha konde.

title: 101 Tenena Bokong'u ase Nyasae
content:
# 101 Tenena Bokong'u ase Nyasae

 1. Tenena bokong'u ase Nyasae,Komwaga omonge okogusa;Ner' egetare, nere chinguru,'Bibe kobire ang'e.
Totenene bokong'u as' egetare,'Getare Kristo bweka;Gatoraremererie ntotenene,'S' ekerogo ki'obonene.
2. Tenena bokong'u s' oboronge,Nkoro y'ekeene y'okwegena;Nas' Egetare orabuere,Obonge bw' obosiru.
3. Tenena bokong'u s'ekeene,nonya kegotebana nkebue;'Getar' OmorembeMotimoko 'merindo keraete.

title: 102 Rend' Engaki Nenke
content:
# 102 Rend' Engaki Nenke

 1. Rend' engaki nenke, Ndero ibaga rire,Rend'ense tebua, Morende mosabeRenda ntw' abareu. mobisa mokong'u,Renda tari are, 'Monene bw'enyangi.
Renda, Saba, Renda, Saba,Rend' osabe obotuko na omobaso,Renda mosabe.
2. Oserie chitoro, Nechitang'utang'u,Eira Neyao, 'Mogoko botambe;'Monen' akarenda, As'engencho yao,Akagoiterera Amanyinga Aye.
3. Aye mwanche Yeso nenchinguru chiao,'Mobisa ng'ang" are, 'boyi' ebirwanero,Bono ribaga ndire, Tirieta bosa,Renda na gosaba, 'Bakristo renda.

title: 103 Aka Eriogi
content:
# 103 Aka Eriogi

 1. Aka eriogi! Ror' omobisa!'Moki' ebendera ya NyasaeBeka ebinto bi'esegi yaye,Mwegen' Amarik' Amachenu.
'Barwani etanan' ebendera!S'oboremu raria ring'anaGenda bwango Motere Hosana!'Sagini yaito nere Kristo.
2. Tob' abakong'u as' omobisa,Twensi twamanya ntobue'Nguba, 'bendera chimekameke,Rwaner' ekeene ntobue.
3. Nyasa' otoigwe gatogosaba,Tokonye n'obuya, bwaoSegi ekoera tob'ababui,Ntobek' egutwa bosio bwao.

title: 104 Toagach' Egetare Ke Moyo
content:
# 104 Toagach' Egetare Ke Moyo

 1. Toagach' Egetare Ke moyo,Yes' Egetare kiemiaka;Toremererie okogoswa,Omwaga gokogusa.
Natoagache As' egetareToagach' egetar' egekong'u'Se Krist' Egetare.
2. 'Bande baagach' amaroba,Korora kw'enibo y'enseAband' emerindo y'ebibe,'Megok' ogotogigwa.
3. Agach' egetar' ekeene,'Boroso botasareke;'Gosemeria kare na kare,Ogotoreka gwaito.

title: 105 Nkogenda Nde Bo Igoro
content:
# 105 Nkogenda Nde Bo Igoro

 1. Nkogenda nde bo igoro,Ngosukande gochia ang'e;Ngosaband' amatuk'onsi,"Yes' antenenie igoro.
Onyimokie Ontenenie,'Sokwegen' ense ya igoro'Ns' engiya kobua chionsi,Yes' antenenie igoro.
2. Tinkogoka komeny' as' obwoba,ne chitang'utang'u;'Bande mbancha komenyao,Gosaba kwane nchie igoro.
3. Nindigetie 'menye igoro,Nonya Saitani ogontema'S'okwegena naigur'ogotera kw' abachenu Igoro.
4. Ndigetie ng'ike igoro,Ndor' amasas' obonene;Ngosaba nde goika ng'ike,Yeso Ndae ng'ike igoro.

title: 106 Morendi Obonene Mboche
content:
# 106 Morendi Obonene Mboche

 1. 'Morendi obonene mboche,bwa Zayoni as'emambia?'Bimanyererio bi'ogochabiakorabeiri' enchera?Omotoria Oramokie,'Masase nkobar' are,Eboyie ase enyangi,Bwakire boka! boka!
2. Omorendi, amasaria'Mentekire kobua,'Bimanyererio as'ense,Biorokirie ogocha'Getureri gekobuga,geture abakure,Abachenu nababokebeboyeti ogotakwa.
3. 'Morendi rora bwakire,Rituko ri'Omonene;Natoake amariogi,Obonda ng'ang'e bore,Omotari ndora ng'umbuKanani ekoorokia,Yerusalemu omuyaboig' ororekanire.
4. 'Morendi nka yedhahabu'Karanset' Omogambi;Ochabeire buya mono,'S' omoremb' agamb'onsi'Borabu as'ebitunwaAmasaria akomesaChinsoko chingiya mono,Ebisicha ebiya.
5. 'Morendi, ror' ens'egocha,Yamete buya mono;Ere ng'umbu ang'e mono!omogond'o EdeniIgwa amater' amaya,Agoterwa Igoro,Ror' abange bagotera,Omotari nabeo.

title: 107 Omonyamwando Naki Ogosundoka?
content:
# 107 Omonyamwando Naki Ogosundoka?

 1. Omonyamwando naki ogosundoka?Naki okorara kogwaikire?Imoka bweboyi' ebinto bi'esegi;Matuko nkoer' ar' ayerera.
2. Omonyamwando naki ogotebana?Naki ogotiga eng'eria yaoEboyie Omotoria ngocha are;'Morototer' amare igoro.
3. 'Bisaku ebinene nkorwana bire;Bianyegerigwe na gokw' omoyoTegerera n'eriogi rie chimbunde;Omonyamwando tagotebana.
4. Tagoteban' as' omong'uso bw' ense!Buya bw' ense nigo bogosiraButora chingatare chia omobe;Omonyamwando onchoka tama.
5. China eris' origererie igoro;'Bonene bw'Omogambi kagocha;Ngokiamoka bore korw' ebitunwa;'Banyamwando chenga na gotera.

title: 108 Abarendi Ba Zayoni
content:
# 108 Abarendi Ba Zayoni

 1. Abarendi ba Zayoni,Teba ay' obotukoEng'enang'eni yachire?Nabokiamoke gose?Mwarorire,amasase agocha?Mwarorire,amasase agocha?
2. Ebimanyererio bi'ense,twabietire gose?'Ngoika tor' ekiambokero,nonya nengegu gose?Amaene,twarorir' obogambi?Amaene,twarorir' obogambi?
3. Oborabu bwachichire,Toake egeturi;Twarorir' eng'enang'eni,Igor' endabu mono!Chenga mwensi, 'Gotoreka gwachireChenga mwensi,'Gotoreka gwachire.
4. Twanyorire omorai;Ense ng'ang' eberete;Natogende bosio bwango,Tosoe as'agiya,Tera mono,na kogoka kegimaTera mono,na kogoka kegima.

title: 109 Tokob'Omosunte
content:
# 109 Tokob'Omosunte

 1. Tokob'Omosunte Yes'ogocha,Tokob'Omosunte Yes'ogocha;Tokob'Omosunte Yes'ogocha,Kobaira abanchwa nka.
Kobaira abanchwa nka ('ra nka),Kobaira abanchwa nka ('ra nka);Tokob' Omosunte Yes' Ogocha,Kobaira abanchwa nka.
2. Bororo mbokoba Yes' Ogocha,Bororo mbokoba Yes' Ogocha;Neb'emambi' engiya Yes'ogocha.Kobaira abanchwa nka.
3. Kweumia ngokaiy' Eker'agocha,Kweumia ngokaiy' Eker'agocha;Rigesa rigiya Yes'ogocha,Kobaira abanchwa nka.
4. 'Matera, makwania Yes'ogocha,'Matera, makwania Yes'ogocha;Koumer' abasani Yes'ogocha;Kobaira abanchwa nka.

title: 110 Krist' Omorai Oito
content:
# 110 Krist' Omorai Oito

 1. Krist' Omorai oito kogend' esegi,Titogokung'ia, karatorangerie:Natotamanya okogania kwaye;Ntobwati' enchera yonsi.
Bosio bosio! Yes' ochikire;Bosio bosio! Ense y'omwando;Bosio bosio! Tiga totere,Natobue na Yes' Omogambi.
2. Bendera yait' eramboke botambe,'S'ebibe biegachete mbitugutwe,Krist' Omorai oit' Obuire ense,Tobwati' e'nchera yonsi.
3. 'Segi nendoro ko tekoira geka,Nobobui tosoe omoganda;Totere ogotera kw' obobui,Gatorabwati' enchera.

title: 111 Twagosabire Chinguru
content:
# 111 Twagosabire Chinguru

 1. Twagosabire chinguru,Chiria chiare riria kareChiagerete bakerua pi,Bakabua emechando.
2. Ng'ai Omoika oria ore,'Koret' Abramu oyoo?'Kanyete Paul' enkoro,'Kaba na nguru chia Igoro.
3. Omoik' oria orandetie,'Bwanchani chinchera chiao'Karabi' amarik' a Isaya,N'amatera a Daudi.
4. Buya bwao mbori nguru,'Bun' ekero kia ElijaMus' akaror' obonene,Ayub' akaremereria?
5. Inyor' amatuko aria,Keror' emeremo yaoGatwakoeire chinkoro,Toiterere omoik' oo.

title: 112 Tenena Ase Yeso
content:
# 112 Tenena Ase Yeso

 1. Tenena ase Yeso,Abarwani baye,'Moki' ebendera igoro,Tebaisa kobugwa!Morae mogand' oye,Bobui as'obobuiMobabu' ababisaErio Krist' agambe.
2. Tenena ase Yeso,Igwera engoma,Esegi yarorire,'tuko ri' ObobuiAbaye mokorere,korwani' ababisaRemereri' emechando,Ogokwa nokoba
3. Tenena ase Yeso,'Se chinguru chiayeNaki amabok' aino,Takobaisana;Bek' enguba y'Enchili,Gesa mogosaba;'S'emerem' egotoka,Timoirana nyuma.
4. Tenena ase Yeso,Esegi neere;Rero nario esegi,ankio nobobuiEre Oyorabue,Gutwa y'obogimaEr'amo n'Omorwoti,Mbagambe botambe.

title: 113 Ong' Okwegen' Okonene
content:
# 113 Ong' Okwegen' Okonene

 1. Ong' okwegen'okonene,Babisa mbamiga;Gotaiguswe 'S'obotaka,nonya nemechando,Nonya n'emechando.
2. Ogotakwemurungania,'kero ki'emechando;Korende as' emechandonobororo Kwegeme Nyasae.
3. Okwegena gokobara,Komwag' okogusa;Nakoba ase aabe,tikwoboa kende,Korem' Omosunte.
4. Gotagoswe n'ab'ens'eye,Nagosekwa boriOgotabugwe n'ebibe,gosirigwe boriN'ebiya bi'ens'eye.
5. 'Monene ng'a okwegena,Erio kende ngechaNinyor' Omogok' omuyanonya nde as'enseBw'enka ya igoro.

title: 114 'Mokristo Boka
content:
# 114 'Mokristo Boka

 1. 'Mokristo boka, 'Monen' ochikire;'Gutwa n' enguba, N'omoro kobokoUmer' omotemi, Kor' omoremu;Bun' omoremu, Rora omobisa.
'B' omoremu, B' omoremu'B' omoremu, Rora omobisa
2. Mechando neba, renda otegesie;Toirana nyuma, Gokonywa tikoiyoMeganda y'omosunte noyebue;Bun' omoremu, Rora omobisa.
3. Meromo ya Yeso Yerende mono;Renda nomokia, Rwana goik'omoerioAs' arakorae Genda n'oboremu;Bun' omoremu, Rora omobisa.
4. Nore nomotang'ani tibwoboa;Nako' obuya, Akoremi' ogokeBwanchani bun' ensoko as' eroro;Bun' omoremu, Rora omobisa.

title: 115 'Morendi Bw'Omosalaba?
content:
# 115 'Morendi Bw'Omosalaba?

 1. 'Morendi bw' Omosalaba,'Motunyi bw' eng'ondiTinkwobo' emeremo yayenonya Nerieta gwatora.
Totang' e --------- MerindoErio taik' as'areTotang' e --------- MerindoErio toik' As'are
2. Ng'irwa igoro yamare,As' agiya monoBande korwanerera keegw'aeke as'obokong'u.
3. Bosi' ababisa tibaiyo?Nimbwatesie omorindo'Ns'eye mb' omosani bw'obuyakonyira 'se Nyasae?
4. Ndwane omoerio ngambe,Ondemi' OmoneneNdemererie obororo bwonsi,Nyore nguru 'se Yeso.

title: 116 Abanchete Nyasaye
content:
# 116 Abanchete Nyasaye

 1. Abanchete Nyasae,Moche nomogokoTer'ogotera okuya,Ter'ogotera okuyaAse ekerogo,Ase ekerogo.
Togende Zayoni,Omochi' omuya ZayoniTotire gochia Zayoni,'Mochi' omuya o Nyasae.
2. BatamomanyetiNyasae mbatera,Bana b'Erwoti ya igoro,'Bana b'Erwoti ya 'goroBoroki' Omogoko,Boroki 'Omogoko.
3. Rimisu rigiyarirw' ase ZayoniTotaraika igoro,As' ebitii bia IgoroGotara chincherachiria chiedhaabu.
4. 'Matera abuche,'Mariga asire,Bana b'Erwoti ens' eria,Ens'eria ya Imanueli!Gochia chinse chinde,chingiya chia Igoro.

title: 117 'Monene Nakwegene?
content:
# 117 'Monene Nakwegene?

 1. 'Segi yokorwanerera,'Keene noboronge'Segi ndoro yokorwania,chinguru chi'omosunteBaremu barigirie,Eri'ere nakwegene?
Monene Nakwegene,Nomoe, oboneneRem' okwane nomokia,Eri'ere nakwegene?
2. Rora bacha nendamwamu,Nechinguru chi'omobeNechinguru chi'omobisakorw' ense y'omosunte,'Baremu barigirie,Eri' ere nakwegene.
3. Tata igo atoroche,'Malaik' atotoriaYeso ner' Omorai oito,titokonyara kogwaBaremu nababua,Eri' ere nakwegene?

title: 118 Emeremo Yaerire
content:
# 118 Emeremo Yaerire

 1. Emeremo yaerire,Esabato yachakire;Esasoki' enkoro yane,Rirende n'amasikani.
2. Motogie obaeire,Abarosu 'gotimoka'Mioyo yabo etimoka;kobua amatuk' ande.
3. Omoiranerie mbuya,Buna rimisu rigiyaTonyore omotimoko,onde tari orayomanye.
4. 'Mogoko bw' enkoro ime,Nokogach' ogotimoka;Ogacheire ekanisa,Omoerio bw'emechando.

title: 119 'Sabato Enchenu
content:
# 119 'Sabato Enchenu

 1. 'Sabato enchenu,'Banto bagokeire,Toganyete koigw' eng'ana,Chinkoro chigoke. 
2. 'Tuk'erio Esabato,Neri'a'aye Tata,Naintwe otosesenieTokogosasima.
3. Seseni' abachenu,Kero togosaba,Togoker' ogotimoka,Torend' Esabato.
4. Chisabato chikoerainse aiga,Esabat'etakoeraNtotimoke Igoro.

title: 120 Tibweb' Esabato
content:
# 120 Tibweb' Esabato

 1. Tibweb' EsabatoMonen' asesenirieErituko rigiya,Goetania onsiRiret' ogotimoka,Nomogoko bori'Masari' ay' agoika,Nobuya bwa Igoro.
Ika Ang'e, ika ang'Esabat' enyansu;Ika ang'e, ika ang'Esabat' enyansu.
2. 'Yerend' Esabato,mosasime reroEre oyotebete;"Nche ninch' enchera"Gatoramotunyane,Omotoria oitoNatonyoinsie mono,Amach' Obogima.
3. Rituk' omogoko,Renda chinsa chiayeTotere ase Yeso,'Mosani Omuya;Omogweni' Omwanchwa,'Muya bw'Ogokumia!Omenye naintwe bori,chinkoro botambe.

title: 121 'Mochakano Nyasae
content:
# 121 'Mochakano Nyasae

 1. 'Mochakano Nyasae,'Gatonga EsabatoEri' akayesesenia,'Kayerwa as'abanto.
Twagokire, TwagokireTwagokire rituko,'Sabato ya Nyasae.
2. 'Ria gatano narimo,'Meremo ekaera'Sabato egachaka,Toigwere totimoke.
3. 'Bange bayeonchoire,'Timoka JumapiliRigi' Ebuku momanye,Teri kobatebia bo.
4. 'B'ekeene mbatebe,mwanyabant' onchooreteKorende as'ebuku,Goonchoka tikori oo.
5. Nkarigia na ekero,narora EsabatoNkayerera koigwera,hero yoka enchera.

title: 122 Rituko Ri' Omogoko
content:
# 122 Rituko Ri' Omogoko

 1. Rituko ri'omogoko,Rire ri'amasaseEriagi ri'omoichano,Ri'ekieni rigiya'S'ore', banene, 'bake,'Bacha gosasimaBatera Omochenu,O kare na kare.
2. Aye nekiambokero,'S' emerind' etache'Mogondo bwe chinsoko,Chingiya chia IgoroEnsoko y'ogokendia,Bogima bokong'u'S' ore negetengero,Gia ense y'omwando.
3. Rituko ri'okomesia,Naye bw'obwanchaniRikoboki' amaiga,Y'ebinto bia IgoroTonyor'obuy'oboyia,As' ogotimokaTorigi' ogotimoka,Ogosesenirie.

title: 123 Eskuru Y'Esabato
content:
# 123 Eskuru Y'Esabato

 1. Eskuru y' Esabato,Ngiya mon'ase nde;Moy'one okogokeire,Esabat enyansu.
Sabato (Sabato)Enyansu (enyansu)Sabato (Sabato)Enyansu (enyansu)Moy'one okogokeire,Esabat'enyansu.
2. Nkoro yane entayayi,'Karor'encher' enyia;Nkarigia aas'agiya,Enka y'esabato.
3. As'eriogi riobwanchani,Yeso ondangeire;Erio' mochor'erev bweka,'S'enka y'Esabato.

title: 124 Kegima Twaikire Omokubio Naende
content:
# 124 Kegima Twaikire Omokubio Naende

 1. Kegima twaikireOmokubio naende,Tiga torigi' ebisioToganyet' alga mwaye
E rituko rinene,'Gotimoka okuyaE rituko rinene,'Gotimoka okuya.
2. Gatokorigi' obuya,'S'Erieta ri'OmotoriaTworoki' obosio bwao,Torusi' ebibe bionsi
'Maboko atimoke,Totimoke as'ore'Maboko atimoke,Totimoke as'ore.
3. Tobak' Erieta Riao,Nay' obe ang'e naintweBonene toborore,Gatore nyomba mwao
Omonene tomenie,'Ndagera y'obogimaOmonene tomenie,Eya kare na kare.
4. Ng'an' ekune ababe,Eremie abachenuObuchi' obuya bwao,Ogweni' abachandeku
Chisabato chibe bo,Goika togambe n'AyeChisabato chibe bo,Goika togambe n'Aye.

title: 125 Rituko Riao Richenu
content:
# 125 Rituko Riao Richenu

 1. RituKo riao richenu,Kobua ayande,Titorengereria ense,Tatiga Nyasae.
2. Ribaga ria ogosaba,Tonyare kwaberwa,Tokwane na oboremu,"Tat' ore Igoro".
3. 'Mang'ana ay'omorembe,Ere atotebie,Koraa omoonchoki,Aike Igoro.
4. 'Bibe biaito biaberwe,Tosibore buya,Ere bwanchete enkoro,Natoe obuya.

title: 126 'Meremo Yaerire
content:
# 126 'Meremo Yaerire

 1. Meremo yaerire,'Sabato y'Omonene,Twasoa ogotimoka,n'Omorembe chinkoro.
2. Namany' as'okwegena,'Sabat' as'obotongi,N'ogwancha kway'Omotoria,N'omochengo chinkoro.
3. Korigereria ng'umbu,As'amais' atarore,'Buya bwaye bw'ogokumia,Sabato chinkoro ime.
4. Togosoa ens'enyia,'S'obuya bwonsi bore,'S'Esabato etaere,Tomenye goika kare.

title: 127 'Monen' Obuya Bwao
content:
# 127 'Monen' Obuya Bwao

 1. 'Monen' obuya, Bwao bw'ogokumia,Ogatong'ense, N'ebinto bionsi;As'amatuko, Atano na rimo,Ogatimok 'Esabat'enchenu;
2. Chinyoni chionsi, Chiter' obuy' obo,Ebitunwa n'amagoko boigo;'Banto bonsi baitaberi' as'eriogi,Ogatimok' Esabat' enchenu.
3. Ase tore n'omogok' omonene,Esabat'ekoret' Ogosanga;Abanto twacha, Amo gosasima;Ogatimok 'Esabat' Enchenu.

title: 128 Rituko Richenu Mono
content:
# 128 Rituko Richenu Mono

 1. Rituko richenu mono,Riatongetwe na Nyasae,Totimoke rituko riaye,Natosesenigwe mono.
2. .Twatimokir' Esabato,Twagokire gosasima;N'ogotera tomobake,Ase obwanchani bwaye.
3. Tobake Nyasae mono,Ase Yeso Omotoria;Ase amanyinga aye,Twanyorire okwabera.
4. 'Kina ki'ebibe nogokwa,Atokweret' Omotoria;Tobwat' amachiko Aye,Titosari' amang'an' Aye.

title: 129 Ika Ang' Omokubio
content:
# 129 Ika Ang' Omokubio

 1. Ika ang' omokubio,Boitongo ase ense;Kun' enkor' enyororo,N'amasaria Igoro.
2. Rituko gotimoka,Ngaki yao ngoet' ere;Neriogo 'S' obororo,Goik' emeremo eere
3. Erituko richenu,Gotogia na gosaba;Gosemia abororo,'Bisio biao ebinge.
4. Ika ang' omokubio,N'omong'us' Omochenu;Sesenia chinsa chiao,Nkoro yan' eganyete.

title: 130 Ker'Emambia
content:
# 130 Ker'Emambia

 1. Ker'emambia nobwanchani,Torenda rituko rionsi.Gatwarendirw'obotuko,Meber' ere nechinguru.
2. Kabogokia n'amabera,Se tore gatogosaba;Mechand'eete twaberwe,Tosemeretie igoro.
3. Emeremo ye rituko,Toisa koyerengereria;Bond'oboyia, nib' enene,Nyasaye nerue ekengwanso.
4. Bimoremo bisinini,Mbitotange titosaba;Na kwang'enchera endonge,'Gotoiki' ase Nyasae
5. S'obwanchani bwao Tata,Tobwenere gotimoka;Tokonye rero botambe,Tobe buna togosaba.

title: 131 Omonene Ka Bogokia
content:
# 131 Omonene Ka Bogokia

 1. Omonene kabogokia,Noigw' eriogi riane;'S' ore inche ningosabe,Ninkogaramere.
2. Igoro Kristo achiete,Gosaber' abaye;Komworokia Tata oye,Ebirero biaito.
3. Omoika oo andae,Chinchera chindonge;Rongeyia ker' omoremo,As'obosio bwane.
4. Abanchet' erieta riao,abasemeretie;Monguru obaetanane,'Buya bun'eng'aya.

title: 132 Rituko Riaerire
content:
# 132 Rituko Riaerire

 1. Rituko riaerire,Tata mbuya mono;Chinsa chia omosuntetichib' echi'ebibe.O Yes' ototengerere,Torend' as' obotuk' obo.
2. 'Megoko yaerire,Toiranie mbuya;Chinsa chi' omosuntetichitobera chimbe.Yeso tomorekere,Torend' as' obotuk' obo.
3. 'Meremo yaerire,NatogoterereChinsa chi'omosuntenchib' echi' emechando.O Yes' ototengerere,Torend as' obotuk' obo.
4. Tokanyekie chinkoro,Nyasae kwamanyire,'Mechand' eng'aki eng'anaetoganyet' ense.Yes' omwanchwa otoigwe,Otorend' otorusie oo.

title: 133 Kabe Nainche
content:
# 133 Kabe Nainche

 1. Kabe nainche mbwango bokoira,Mosunte oichoire kabe nainche;Abande basinyirwe kondemia,Mokonyi bw'aboro, Kabe nainche.
2. Bogima bwane bwaeta bwango,'Mogoko bw'ense nig'ogoeta,Ebinto bionsi biaonchokire,'Yotagoonchoka, menya nainche.
3. Ninkoganetie ekero gionsi,Buya bwao mbobu' omobisa;Ng'o bun' ay' oranyare kondaa,S' obuya n'obobe, menya nainche.
4. Amo naye tindi n'okoiroka,Marwair' obororo bionsi mbosaNonya nogokwa tikori kende,Nabuire onye kore nainche.

title: 134 Ker' Erioba Riagure
content:
# 134 Ker' Erioba Riagure

 1. 'Ker' erioba riagure,'Mosunt' otubir' enseChing'enang'enit kobaraMotogie Omotongi bw'obotuko.
'Mochenu Nyasae,bw'emegandaGwaichoire Igoro n'ense,Bionsi bikobak' AyeTat'o Igoro.
2. Omonyen' obogima,'Menyet' oboiko bwonsiTosangereri' abao,Ase riicho riao, ng'ang'e ore.
3. Bwanchani bwa' obonge,Bobe naintwe botukoGator' ase chitoro,'chiche im' as' omoika, Togosaba.
4. Kero ching'enang'eni,Rituko n'obotukoBiaetire korw' ense,Monene nabonkiere, Botaire.

title: 135 'Mobaso Bw'enkoro Yane
content:
# 135 'Mobaso Bw'enkoro Yane

 1. 'Motori' omobaso one,Botuko mbori koreo'Mechando y'ense tetoka,Gontanga korw' amais' ao.
2. Konanyorire chitoroNg'ichori' ebirengererioNaki ere buya ndare,'Gekuba kiao botambe.
3. Kabe nainche kobogokia,Otaiyo tinkoba moyoKabe nainche kobokoira,Otaiyo nigo ndakwe.
4. Onsesenie gankoboka,Ntarasoa ase ense'Bwanchani bwao bombue,Goika ntoke Igoro.

title: 136 'Megondo Yamire Mono
content:
# 136 'Megondo Yamire Mono

 1. Megondo yamire mono,'Ndagera yarabire,Ande onsi yarabire,'Magoko n'ebirubo.
'Monene tom' abagesiigw' ekerero giaitoBasangererie rigesa,Emeremo eere.
2. Bagende kero bogokia,Na mobaso bagende,Goika erioba rigwe,Basangererie onsi.
3. Abamwatomirwe Retaokwama kwain' okuya,Mogoroba so' asareN'omogok' omonene.

title: 137 Igwa Ring'ana Ria Nyasae Oito
content:
# 137 Igwa Ring'ana Ria Nyasae Oito

 1. Igwa ring'ana ria Nyasae oito,Reta chitaisi as'emonga;Karue chinkoro chiano chionsi bori,mwegen'eira y'ebisio.
"Morete chitaisi as'emonga,Montem" Otebir 'Omenene;"Nimbatwererie ebisi'ebinge,mono goetani'ebi moganetie.
2. Norigeti' omanye 'nguru chi'omoika,Reta chitaisi as'emonga;Menya n'Ere buya chingaki chionsi,Gakoru'eira y'esbisio.
3. Kwamocheir' Omonene oo gose?Reta chitaisi as'emonga;Reta bun'erikir'ime y'ebuku,'re nagoiterer'ebisio.
4. Mosabe ner'Omonen' Omorwoti,Kamokoreta chitaisi asare;Egen'eir'okobaka koigweke,Korw'enkoro y'omwegeni.
5. 'Mater'aigweke 'goro as'amare,Kamwaretire chitaisi emonga;Amatera y'omogok'aigwekane,Ntore neira Y'ebisio.

title: 138 Nki Keransibi' Ebibe?
content:
# 138 Nki Keransibi' Ebibe?

 1. Nki keransibi' ebibe?Namanyinga aye Yeso;Nki keranchene ime?Namanyinga aye Yeso.
Ogoitek' okuya,Kogonchena bori;Nsoko ende teiyo,Tatig' amanying'a Yeso.
2. Kegochena tikeiyo,Tatig' amanying'a Yeso;'S'okwaberwa ninsabe,Amanyinga aye Yeso. 
3. Kende ngekombwataniaTatig' amanying'a Yeso;Tindakora ekiyaTatig' amanyinga 'Yeso.
4. Tindi n'ogosemeriaTatig' amanying'a Yeso;'Buya gos'oborongeTatig' amanying'a Yeso.
5. Obonene! nintere,Amanyinga aye Yeso;Nintere na kobaka,Amanyinga aye Yeso.

title: 139 Ngakoa 'Bogima
content:
# 139 Ngakoa 'Bogima

 1. Ngakoa' bogima,Ngaiter' amanyingaOb'omoborigwa,Korw' as' abakureNgakoa ngakoa obogima,Aye nki kwang'eire?Ngakoa ngakoa obogima,Aye nki kwang'eire?
2. Natigete Tata,N'obonene bwayeNechandete ense,Ase omosunte'S' engencho yao nkabitiga,Nki gwantigareirie?'S' engencho yao nkabitiga,Nki gwantigareirie?
3. Nkagochandekera,'Monwa otakwane'S'oboror' obonge,Gokorusia aabeNgakobogoreria bionsi,Nki kwambogoreirie?Ngakobogoreria bionsi,Nki kwambogoreirie?

title: 140 Rigi 'Abasiru
content:
# 140 Rigi 'Abasiru

 1. Rigi'abasiru obasoror'aba-sireir'ebitunwa igoro;Na kobatebi'amang'ana aye,'inchwo ase nde nimbanchete.
(Bass)Nindagende are gochi 'ebitunwa,mbairani 'abasiru'se riicho,Ase obweri bw'Omoboria one,Yes'okweret'abanyabibe.
(S.A.T.)Nindagende gochi 'ebitunwa,Nimbairanie 'basiru gocha;As'obweri bw'omobori'one,Yes'okweret'abanyabibe.
2. Rigi 'abasiru borokie Yeso,Abwo barosire chinkoro;Nakobar' as'ogotoreka,boroki'enchera y'obogima.
3. Ningende naki Yes'ondangeirie,motunyane kera ritukoNdend'abagokwa moki'abakogwa,Mborokie Yeso ner'enchera.

title: 141 Yes' As' Obworor' Okorangeirie
content:
# 141 Yes' As' Obworor' Okorangeirie

 1. Yes' as'obworor' okorangeirie,Eri' oche nka, oche reroNaki ogotayaya korw' asare,Gokogend' are mono?
Inchwo rero(Inchwo rer'okorangeirie)Inchwo rero(Inchwo rer'okorangeirie)Inchwo rero(Inchwo rer'okorangeirie bono)Okorangeirie n'obwororo.
2. 'Rangeiri' omorosu otimoke,oche rero, oche reroRet' egurube nagosesenie,Ere takogoseria.
3. Yeso nakoganyete ochiche,koganyete, aye rero,Inchw' omworokie ebibe biao,Totebana nchuo bwango.
4. Yeso ogosoroire omoigwe,Igw'eriogi riaye rero;Abegeni baye nabagoke,Imoka genda bwoye.

title: 142 'Mogeni Ngesieri Are
content:
# 142 'Mogeni Ngesieri Are

 1. 'Mogeni ngesieri are, Igora;('Motori' asoe 'Motori' asoe)Nao are botambe, Igora;('Motori' asoe 'Motori' asoe)Igor' ataragenda Igorer' OmochenuYeso Kristo O Nyasae Igora(Motori' asoe Motori' asoe)
2. Igor' enkoro yao, Igora;(Motori' asoe Motori' asoe)Gokoganya nagende, Igora;(Motori' asoe Motori' asoe)Igorer' Omosani,Arende nkoro yao;Nabe naye botambe, Igora(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)
3. Origw' eriogi riaye, Igora;(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)Mochore ab'oyoo, Igora(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)Ngesieri ateneine,Omogoko nonyoro'Rieta riaye ribakwe, Igora(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)
4. 'Mogeni korwa Igoro, Igora;(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)Omoyega arosie, Igora.(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)'Bibe biao biaberwe,K'ebiense bikoeraNakoire Igoro, Igora(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)

title: 143 Nkorangeri' Are Ng'ora
content:
# 143 Nkorangeri' Are Ng'ora

 1. Nkorangeri' are ng'ora n'obwanchani,Korangeri' aye nainche,Aganyete egesieri gi'enkoro,'koganyet' aye nainche.
Nchwo nka . . . Nchwo nka . . . ,Mwarosire moche nka;'Sogosorora Yeso okorangeirie,Monyabibe nchwo inka.
2. Titotebana, Yeso osoroire,Inche amo naye bo;Nase ki togochay' obuya bwaye?Arure ase tore.
3. O engaki ngoeta ere bwango,Ngotoetanie ere;'Mosunte n'amakweri ngocha bire,Bigotochera twensi.
4. Borengererie obwanchani bwaye,Bw'Eira ase tore;Nonya twamochire natwabere bo,Aye nainche bori.

title: 144 Nkaigwa Yeso Ogokwana
content:
# 144 Nkaigwa Yeso Ogokwana

 1. Nkaigwa Yeso ogokwana"Ninchwo otimoke;Ikaransa kwarosire,Bweegek' ase nde."Inkamochiera ndosete,Nde n'omoichano!Akang'a obotimoko,Ere ongokirie.
2. Nkaigwa Yeso ogokwana,"Nigo nkorua bosa;Amache ya Obogima,Yanywe obe moyo".Ngacha ase Yeso nkanywa'Nsoko y'obogima;Erang'o yan' egasira,Nigo nche nde moyo.
3. Nkaigwa Yeso ogokwana,"Ninche Omobaso;Ondigererie Orabe,Orabe botambe".Nkamorigereria Yeso'kang' eng'enang'eniNintare as'oborabu,Nkore orogendo.

title: 145 Yes' Omorisi' Omuya
content:
# 145 Yes' Omorisi' Omuya

 1. Yes' Omorisi' omuya,Okorangeirie,Gocha ase riicho,Otimoke nyomba;Nchwo bori nechinguru,kore omosae,Soa ase riicho,Enchera endonge.
Nkorangeria are,nobwanchani;Omotari inchwo ase Yeso,Nateneine akoganyete,Namororire Ere.
2. Yes' Omorisi' omuya,Akerua as'ore,Bono nkorangeri' are,Omotari inchwo;Karue as' emechando,Yeso otebire,Soa ase riicho,Soa motimoke.
3. Koganya noboriri,Chisese nchireo,Gochirigia ching'ondi,Chinsiru chichirie,Yeso Morisi' Omuya,Otebire oche,Soa riicho riaye,Erio otimoke.

title: 146 Igwa Eriogi Ria Yeso
content:
# 146 Igwa Eriogi Ria Yeso

 1. Igwa Eriogi Ria Yeso,Rikorangeria iga,"Ing'o bwanchire kogenda,Korem' omogond' one?"Botambe nkorangeri' are,'Ng'eria yaye nenene;lng'o bwanchire atebe,"Naond' alga, ntoma".
2. Onye tokwambok' enyancha,goiker' abasiruMbare bataraonchoka,ang' as'ore bakonye'Takwane buna Paulo,gos' abamalaikaRandi' obwanchani bwa Yeso,buna abakwerete.
3. Onye tokob' Omorendi,'S' orwaki rwa ZayoniKorag' enchera ya igorona kwerua ase bonsiAs'ogosaba n'enibo,nokore aya igoro,'Mwegenwa buna Aroni,akonyet' Omobani.
4. Kabant' abange bagokwa,Yeso okorangeirieToigwek'aye kogoteba;"Kende nkeri ndakore".Bwata emeremo eye,Yekor' as' omogoko;Korarangerigwe teba;"Naond' aiga ntoma".

title: 147 Twarigure  Ring'ana
content:
# 147 Twarigure  Ring'ana

 1. Twarigure ring'ana:Yes' er' Omotoria;Randia ring'ana onsi:Yes'er' Omotoria.Morarie ring'an' eri,Ense nonya n'enyancha,Igwera ogochika:Yes' er' Omotoria.
2. Rigende ande onsi;Yes' er' OmotoriaAbanyabibe manya:Yes' er' OmotoriaEbisinka bitere,chindiba chitaberie,Ense echenge mono,Yes' er' Omotoria.
3. Motere as' esegi:Yes' er' OmotoriaAgakwa akaboka:Yes' er' Omotoria'Bachandegete tera,Gokoromwa enkoroTera nonya embera:Yes' er' Omotoria.
4. 'Mwaga noro orarie:Yes' er' OmotoriaEbisaku bigoke:Yes' er' OmotoriaBitunwa n'amagoko,Eriogi riigwekaneOgotera kw'obobui:Yes' er' Omotoria.

title: 148 Oyoraigwe
content:
# 148 Oyoraigwe

 1. "Oyoraigwe" aake eriogi!'Tom' amang'an' amaya ense yonsi;Ens' eye yonsi banyore ring'ana;"Oyorigetie, nache!"
"Oyorigetie, Oyorigetie"'Bitunwa n'amagoko rirandigweNtat' omwanchi okorangeri' omosiru"Oyorigetie, nache!"
2. "Onde bwensi" ogocha tatebana;Bon' egesieri ngiasie tig' asoeYeso ner' Ekeene n'er'enchera;"Oyorigetie nache!"
3. "'Yorigetie" ache, nero eira;"'Yorigetie" 'remererie botambe"Oyorigetie" Bogima bwa kare;"Oyorigetie, nache!"

title: 149 Geita Giasie Botambe
content:
# 149 Geita Giasie Botambe

 1. 'Geita giasie botambe,Natosoe bisieri,'Masase y'Omosalaba,'Bwanchani bw'Omotoria.
O amabera amange!Egeita ekio giasieInche . . . (inche)nsoe . . . (nsoe)Egeita giasie.
2. Egeita nigo giasie,Bonsi nabatorigwe;Omoke nomonene bo,Nakera egesaku.
3. Tokore omokia mono,Egeita kogiasie;Bogoria omosalaba,natonyore egutwa.
4. 'Kero twambokire ng'umbu,Totig' omosalaba;Natonyore obogima,Na komwancha Igoro.

title: 150 Omogwenia Ore Ang'e
content:
# 150 Omogwenia Ore Ang'e

 1. Omogwenia ore ang'e,Yes' omonyamaberaAgosasokia chinkoro,Igw' eriogi ria Yeso.
Ter' abamalaika,Erieta riogwatora;Ogotera okuya,Rieta riaye Yeso.
2. Obonene as' Engondi,Namwegenire YesoBono nanchir' Omotoria,Nanchir' erieta riaye.
3. Riet' erio riseri' obwoba,Rieta rinde tiriyoNaki nkogokigwa koigwa,Erieta riaye Yeso.
4. Gakoretana egutwa,Egutwa y'obogimaToikaranse amo nere,Togan' okoborigwa.

title: 151 K'ebibe Bire 'Birito
content:
# 151 K'ebibe Bire 'Birito

 1. K'ebibe bir' ebiritoNchwo ase Nyasae;Keene nagotimokie,Koregen' Eng'ana.
