Mwanche rioka,mwanche rioka,Mwanch' Ere bono,Nagokonye, nagokonye,'Gokonye bono.
2. Agaitera amanyinga,Tonyore ebisioBwetobek' amanyinga ime,orabe kegima.
3. Yes' enchera, ekeene,'koru' ogotimokaMomwegene timonyorwa,Namoseseneke.
4. Nchwo moso' as'omoganda,Mogende IgoroKomenya ense engiya,Mogoko botambe.

title: 152 Yeso Ngoet' Are
content:
# 152 Yeso Ngoet' Are

 1. Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,'Meuko nchwo monyor' amaiso;Yeso bwanchire nabagwenie inwe,'Maiso ain' aramokie, morore;Inchwo Yeso aba' okorora.
2. Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,'Nchw' ebirem' as' omogweni'o bonsiManying' agaiteka abatorie,Naigw' okorangeria gw' ekeremaBono ngoet' are ase bonsi.
3. Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,'Nchw' abataka namoigotigweNabarae inwe, nabaragerie,Yes' obachikire moigote'Nchwo Igor' as' ebiage bichire.
4. Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,Inw' abamochi, moche asareTwabasoroire, mwanche rero iga,Moche bwango GakorangeriaInchw' abamochi, nomwanche Yeso.

title: 153 'Bogim' Obuya  Mbweng'e
content:
# 153 'Bogim' Obuya  Mbweng'e

 1. 'Bogim' obuya mbweng'ebuna rito rikogwaBun' ebigar' ebiom' obe ang'e.Matuko nkoer' arenababe batugutwe;Mabera nkoer' ar' obe ang'e.
Ob' ang'e, ob' ang'eYeso gakorangeria obe ang'eGoteban' as' ebibegesieri nagesiekweBirero biao mbosa ob' ang'e.
2. Bisicha biya bisira basae bagota,Tori n'engaki entamb' obe ang'e;Nyasae okorang'eirie tiga ogotayaya;Karwe as' obosiru obe ang'e.
3. Bwang' engaki neete,emechando echiche,Tama goch' ase Yes' obe ang'e;Kab' aye omong'ainitosiekerwa isiko;Erio oche gosir' obe ang'e.
4. Aye omonyabibe Igw'eriogo ria Yeso,Aba Igoro bagok' obe ang'e;Tama korw' omosunteBweoroki' ase Yeso,'Chak' orogendobon' obe ang'e.

title: 154 Tiga Yeso Ach' Enkoro
content:
# 154 Tiga Yeso Ach' Enkoro

 1. Kwarosire n'egurub' endito,Tiga Yeso ach' erkoroKoganeti' obogima oboyia,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.
Tiga chitang'utang'u,Bono, takomokanaBono igor' enkoro,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.
2. Onye nobochenu oganetie,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoroEnsoko y'ogosibia nereo,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.
3. Kore namatemwa otanyare,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoroKore nokogani' ens' etabue,Tiga Yeso ache nkoro.
4. Gotegeneti abasani bao,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoroMorore Mosani ki arabe,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.
5. Koratere amo nababui,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoroKorasoe as' obotimoko,Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.
Ntige chitang'utang'u,Bono tinkomokanaNaigoire enkoro,Yeso ache nkoro yane.

title: 155 Ir' Obogima Bwane
content:
# 155 Ir' Obogima Bwane

 1. Ir' obogima bwane,Bochene bob'obwao,Ir' amaboko naro,'kore bun'origetie,'Kore bun'origetie.
2. Ira amagor'ane,'B' amang' as' emeremo,Ira n'eriogi riane,Nter'ase Nyasae oka,Nter'ase Nyasae oka.
3. Ir' ebikoba biane,Bikwan' ay' ar' ayao,Ir' amo n'echinibo,Tindigetie kobisa,Tindigetie kobisa.
4. Ira chingaki chiane,chikobake botambe,Ir' obong'aini bwane,korer' ay' origetie,Korer' ay' origetie.
5. Ira Ogwancha kwane,Gokore kob'okwao,Ira n'enkoro yane,Eb' obomenyo bwao,Eb' obomenyo bwao.
6. Ir' obwanchani bwane,Nib'as' amagor'aoIr' omobere bwensi,noyoo bono bori,Noyoo bono bori.

title: 156 Inchwo Bono
content:
# 156 Inchwo Bono

 1. Inchwo bono,inchwo bono,Ase Yeso bono;Bono natochiche,ase Yeso bono.
2. Nagotorie, Nagotorie,Nagotorie bono;Bono OmoneneNomotoria bono.
3. Nanyar' Ere,Nanyar' Ere,Omonene Yeso;Bono nanyar' Ere,Omonene Yeso.
4. Mwegen' Ere,Mwegen' Ere,Omonene Yeso;Bono mwegen' Ere,Omonene Yeso.
5. Morangerie,Morangerie,Omonene Yeso;Bono Morangerie,Omonene Yeso.
6. Nakoigw' Ere .............
7. Rota Yeso .............
8. Nakwabere .............
9. Takomwanga .............
1. 0Halleluya, Amen,.... Bono .............Amen

title: 157 'Bwanchani Boria Bwakare
content:
# 157 'Bwanchani Boria Bwakare 

 1. Yes' Omonen' agatebarandi' ogokonyeka,Abanto bonsi bamanyeYes' osire gocha.
'Bwanchani boria bwa kare,'Bwanchani nobuya;'Bwanchani bwa kareYeso bweka.
2. 'Mont' oyom' okaagacha's' amarab' amaya;Omwag' ogacha omotindi"Okayeiyeria".
3. Oyond' er' akaagachaegetare igoro;Oboroso bwar' obuy'omwaga toyeiyeria.
4. 'Bonyansi bwonsi naboyie,'Bonyansi bosire,Emete yonsi nesire,Igena ritigare.
5. Toagach' as' oboros'obuya nere Yeso;'Merindo yense neb'emenge tegotobua.

title: 158 Yeso Menya Ime Yane
content:
# 158 Yeso Menya Ime Yane

 1. Yeso menya ime yane,'ye 'mogambi omuyaObe amairaneri',as'okogania kwane;Yeso menya ime yane,Kor'ayorigetieNche nimboorokie,Obonene bwao.
2. Nayerure ekaru,yasibigwe bori,Tig'oborabu bwaobomese korwa ime;Ense yonsi ekire,nonya nomobere,Eri 'omosob'oo,atar' as'ore rioka.
3. Ebimo biaye bionsi,Biaigw'eriogi riao,Mbire ang'e bionsi pi,Gokor'emeremo yao;Gose tibiri korosa,tibiri kogania,Nony'eubi mbibwati,biarurue pi as'ore.
4. Nenyango gekong'uswa,Teri gwanchereria,'Ganyet'eki' oratebe,'Ker 'orayerangerie;Yeso menya ime yane'ye 'mogambi omuya,Obe amairaneri' as'okogania kwane.

title: 159 Nkoro Yan'eyasiboirwe!
content:
# 159 Nkoro Yan'eyasiboirwe!

 1. Nkoro yan'eyasiboirw'emotogie Nyasae,Nyigwe omoy'on'amanying' ari'aitegete.
2. Ekweru'as' obokanyekuAsor' Omoboria,'Nkoro ekoigw' eriogiria Krist'agambe ime.
3. Nkoro eyakorirw'enyiayaichoirw' obwanchani,'Ng'ikeranu, endonge,'nchenu, 'ngiya buna ore.
4. Chimbwa chiao aye ong'e'Monene nchwo bwango,Rik'erieta ri' enkoroyane ri'obwanchani.

title: 160 Ner Ensoko Y'amanyinga
content:
# 160 Ner Ensoko Y'amanyinga

 1. Ner'ensoko y'amanyinga,Aya Imanweli;'Banyabibe bay'esibie,Bacheneke bori;Bacheneke bori,Bacheneke, bori;'Banyabibe bayesibie,Bacheneke bori.
2. Omoibi ore gokwa'Karora ensoko;Nainche nimbe omobe bo,Ninsibigw' ebibe,Ninsibigw'ebibe,Ninsibigw' ebibe;Nainche nimbe omobe bo,Ninsibigw' ebibe.
3. Ay' Emanwa manyingaoTakoera nguru;Goik'ekanisa enchore,Yaborigwe bori,Yaborigwe bori,Yaborigwe bori,Goik'ekanisa enchore,Yaborigwe bori.
4. 'S' okwegena nkayarora,Manying' agoiteka,'Bwanchani n'eganga yane,Rioka goik' ogokwa;Rioka goik' ogokwa,Rioka goik' ogokwa;'Bwanchani n'eganga yane,Rioka goik' ogokwa.
5. Omonene negenire,kwang'eire inche,Ekeegwa kiagorirwe,Ase amanyinga!Ase Amanyinga!Ase Amanyinga!Ekeegwa kiagorirwe,Ase Amanyinga!
6. Ase ogoter' ogwansu,Ntere nguru Chiao;Ker'oromem' or' orobe,Rwaborigwe boriRwaborigwe bori,Rwaborigwe bori;Ker'oromem' or' orobe,Rwaborigwe bori.

title: 161 Yeso Nche Nindigeti' Ogosibigwa
content:
# 161 Yeso Nche Nindigeti' Ogosibigwa

 1. Yeso nche nindigeti' ogosibigwa,Nindigetie ay' omenye ase nde;Okeiyerie keria kegwekinia,Onsibie bono imbe omorabu.
'Morabu pi, nimb' omorabu,Aye koransibie nimb' omorabu.
2. Aye Yeso ondigererie bono,Erio mbe ekeng'wanso kere moyo;Narure bionsi as'ore, n'omoyo,Onsibie bono imbe omorabu.
3. 'Monen' one inche nagosoroire,Ninkoganyete as' amagoro ao;Onsibie bono n'amanyinga oka,Onsibie bono imbe omorabu.
4. 'Monene nigo nkoganyete aye,Nyasae ontonger' omoy' omuya;Abakogochera tori kobanga,Onsibie bono imbe omorabu.

title: 162 Ngocha Nd' Omosalaba
content:
# 162 Ngocha Nd' Omosalaba

 1. Ngocha nd' Omosalaba,Inch' Omwor' omouko;Natigire bi'ens'eye,Ntunyan' Omosalaba.
Nagwanchir' aye Yeso,Eng'ondi ya Kalwari;Nakunamir' as'oreOnkonye Omotoria.
2. Nakorereira mono,Nabuirwe n'ebibe;Yes' otebire bori,"Nindabitinyie bionsi".
3. Bionsi narur' as'ore,Ribaga ne chinguru;'Nkoro yane narure,Bibe biao botambe:
4. Yeso nache naende!Naisanek' as'are,Ker' oyor' omochenu,Motogie Omotoria.

title: 163 Omonene Ndigeti' Eke
content:
# 163 Omonene Ndigeti' Eke

 1. Omonene ndigetie eke,Kiagera nakomocheire,As'omorero n'amache,Onsibie mono kegima.
Onsibie ime naisiko;Gos'as'omorer' onsibie,'S'encher' ende yonsi nsibie;'Bibe bikwe ime yane.
2. Koranyoroki' oborori,Ninyare kogoko mono,Kondabe n'enkor'enchenu,mbuy' ase nde,mbuy' ase nde.
3. Bun'enkor' ey'er'enchenu,mbe n'oborori obonge;Naki as' obogima bwao,Ndor'ebinto ebichenu.
4. Omonene natemire,gotanga ay'ar'amabe;Korende tinkonyara pi,gwechena nche omonyene.

title: 164 Gwachir' Ase Yeso?
content:
# 164 Gwachir' Ase Yeso?

 1. Gwachir' ase Yes' as'ogosibigwa?Gwasibigwe n'amanying' aye;Mbwegenete obuya bwaye bono?Gwasibigw' as' amanying' aye.
'Manyinga y'eng'ondi'Gwasibekir' as' amanyinga?Ngobo chiao tichiri na kemoa?Gwasibigw' as' amanying' aye?
2. Ngotar' ore botambe n'Omotoria,Gwasibigwe n'amanying' aye?Ngotimok' ore as' oyobambetwe,Gwasibigw' as' amanying'aye?
3. Chingobo chiao nchirab' Ere kagocha,chichenek' as'amanying' aye?Mbwebeke ang'e ase obomenyo,N'osibigw' as' amanying' aye?
4. Rusia chingobo chire na ebibe,Osibigw' as' amanying' Aye?Ensoko ner' egosibia enkoro,Osibek' as' amanying' Aye.

title: 165 Natayayire Kegima
content:
# 165 Natayayire Kegima

 1. Natayayire kegima,Nkoirana nde;Natebanire ebibe,Nkoirana nde.
Nkoirana, gocha nka,Intatayaye;As' obwanchani Bwao,Ong'iranie nka.
2. Nasiriri 'emiak'emenge,nkoirana nde;Neitirie n'amariga,Nkoirana nde.
3. Narosire as' ebibe,Nkoirana nde;Nyegen' engan' obwanchani,Nkoirana nde.
4. Nakw' ogosemeria kwane,Nkoirana nde;Ing'a Yes' er' onkwerete,Nkoirana nde.
5. Ninganeti' amanying' ao,Nkoirana nde;Onsibie ndabe kegima,Nkoirana nde.

title: 166 'Motori' Agantebia
content:
# 166 'Motori' Agantebia

 1. Motori' agantebia:'Nguru chiao chinke,Renda na gosaba,Nko' ebinto bionsi.
Agaakana, esira yonsiEbibe bigansiria,Er' akabisibia.
2. 'Monene nanyora'Nguru chiao chioka;Chionchor' omobe're n'enkor'enkong'u.
3. Timbwati ekiya,Ndanyorer' obuya,Nsibie ngobo yane,S' amanying' eng'ondi.
4. 'Bosio bw'ekerogo,Nintenene buya,Ebiegwa bianeNimbek' ase Yesu.

title: 167 Yes' As' Omosalaba
content:
# 167 Yes' As' Omosalaba

 1. Yes' as' omosalaba,Nensoko engiyaEkogweni' oborwaire,Korw' ria Kalvari.
Kalvari, Kalvari,'Gotogia botambe,'Nkoro yan' etimoke,As'oroche ng'umbu.
2. Agw' as' omosalaba,Nkanyor' amabera;'Ng'enang'eni ya mambia,'Ndaberi' amasaria.
3. Ang' as' omosalaba,Ng'ondi ya NyasaeNkonye ntare botambe,'S' ekiriria kiao.
4. Ang' as' omosalaba,Nganye, nsemeretie,Goika ng'ike ens'eria,As' oroche ng'umbu.

title: 168 Bionsi Namoeire Yeso
content:
# 168 Bionsi Namoeire Yeso

 1. Bionsi namoeire Yeso,'Moyo bwonsi narure;Mwanche amatuko onsi,Meny'asare botambe.
Bionsi as'ore,Bionsi as'ore,Bionsi as'ore,'Motoria, Narure bono.
2. Bionsi namoeire Yeso,Natung'amir' as'ore,Nyetig' emegoko y'ense,Yeso ng'ire as'ore.
3. Bionsi namoeire Yeso,Nimb' oyoo botambe;Tiga nyigwe ay'Omoika,Manye Aye noyone.
4. Bionsi namoeire Yeso,Bono namororire,'Mogoko bw'ogotorigwa,Ntogie Erieta riao.

title: 169 Nosiboke Korwa As' Ebibe
content:
# 169 Nosiboke Korwa As' Ebibe

 1. Nosiboke korwa as'ebibe?'Manyinga nare ne chinguruNobibue ebib' ore nabio?Amanyinga ye chinguru.
Ne chinguru chia ogokumia;'Manyinga y'eng'ondiNe chinguru chia ogokumia;As' amanyinga y'eng'ondi.
2. Nosiboke korwa ogochaya?'Manyinga nare ne chinguru'Nchw' osibigwe aria Kalwari;Amanyinga' Aye chinguru.
3. N'ocheneke na koraba mono?'Manyinga nare ne chinguruEbimoa bi'ebibe bisire,Amanying' Aye chinguru.
4. N'omokorer' Omogambi Yeso?'Manyinga nare ne chinguruKera rituk' aye n'omotogie?Amanying' Aye chinguru.

title: 170 Nareo Onyanchete
content:
# 170 Nareo Onyanchete

 1. Nareo onyanchet' agakw' agantoriaInch' omonyabibe mbe moyoNchera Y' omosalab' akerua gotachaBibe biane bionsi biaberwe.
Bionsi biabambirwe,Bionsi biabambirweAgancha ere kobogoriaN' oboror' obongeYeso anyoreteKabibogori' ebibe biane.
2. Nig' are omworor' omoremereriaOgochena enkoro yane,Tindi na ekina n' omosibore nde,Kebibe biane biabambirwe.
3. 'Menye as' Omotoria tinkomotiga,Ntare n' omogoko botambe,Nintere n'omonwaGoter' as' enkoro,Ebibe biane biabambirwe.

title: 171 Kwarosir' Aye?
content:
# 171 Kwarosir' Aye?

 1. Kwarosir' aye na gochandeka?Motebie Yeso, Motebie Yeso;Gwechander' ayakona goeta?Motebie Yeso bweka.
Motebie Yeso, Motebie Yeso;N'omosani 'manyire,Tori na Mosani onde bun' Ere,Motebie Yeso bweka.
2. Nig'okonakoiyeri' amariga?Motebie Yeso, Motebie Yeso;Nobwate ebibe bia bobisi?Motebie Yeso bweka.
3. Kwoboire emechand' emenge,Motebie Yeso, motebie Yeso;Nig'ogwechandera aya ankio,Motebie Yeso bweka.
4. Nigo kwarengereirie ogokwa?Motebie Yeso, motebie Yeso;Kwaganiri' obogambi bwa Kristo,Motebie Yeso bweka.

title: 172 'Bogima Mbore Omosalaba
content:
# 172 'Bogima Mbore Omosalaba

 1. Bogima mbore Omosolaba,Yes'ateba "Ndigererie"'Nibo y'ense nig'ere bosa,Enibo engiya nase Yeso.
Rigereria Kalwari(rigereria kalwari),Onyore obogima(onyore obogima);Obogima bwa bosa(obogima bwa bosa),Rigereria kalwari(rigereria kaiwari rigereria).
2. Nkarigereri' Omotoria one,Nere agansasokera;'Ker'amatemw' agonchichera,Nindigererie Omosalaba.
3. Ndigereri'Omosalaba rioka,Nyegen'eira ya Nyasae;Onde takogw' as' amatemwa'yo bwegenete nguru chia igoro.

title: 173 Korabe Nyancha Ime
content:
# 173 Korabe Nyancha Ime

 1. Korabe nyancha ime as'omwaga,Aroro okage gwaisire gokwa;Chaka kobara ebisio obwate,Nokumie mon' obuya bwa Nyasae.
Bar' ebisio, 'kemo ekemo,Many' eki Nyasa' atomire,Bar' ebisio, 'kemo ekemo,Nokumie 'buya bwa Nyasae mono.
2. Korabe kwarosire n'egurube,Gokwarengereirie kwabuirwe,Chaka kobara ebiso obwate,'Mogoko ay' ogotera nonyore.
3. Ker'okorora enibo y'abande,Inyor' eira y'enibo ya Kristo,Bar'ebisi' otagore ne chibesa,Ng'eria yao nenka ere igoro.
4. Igo as'esegi tagoichana,Nyasa'ere bwanchire gotokonya,Bar'ebisio 'malaika mbabeo,Mbagokonye goika omoerio.

title: 174 Namwanchire Yeso Bweka
content:
# 174 Namwanchire Yeso Bweka

 1. Namwanchire Yeso bweka,Naigur' amang'an' AyeTinkoiroka gento kende konamwanchire Yeso.
Namwanchire, namwanchirenanchir' amang'ana 'yeNamwanchire, namwanchirenanchir' amang'ana 'ye
2. 'Bibe biane moe Yeso'nsibirie n'amanyingaNandende amatuk' onsi'kong'iki' ase Nyasae.
3. Bono tinkoiroka kende,'nkoro yakwegenireNchera neba omosunte,Yeso omorekire.
4. Nkoro namoeire Yeso,nomober' one bwonsi'Matuk' onsi nanganyete,ang'ire omochi' oye.

title: 175 'Gosemeria Kw'Omokristo
content:
# 175 'Gosemeria Kw'Omokristo

 1. Gosemeria kw' Omokristo,'Kero are ense.Koremia enkoro buya,Ense y' obororo.Koremia enkoro buya,Ense y'obororo.
2. Gotworokia ens' engiya,'Baya baramenye.Toumerane n'abaya,TotatananekeToumerane n'abaya,Totatananeke
3. Ens' ebibe bitachiche,Amatemwa taiyo,Omogoko nomenyeo,Otaere rindeOmogoko nomenyeo,Otaere rinde
4. Amariga takobao,Amakweri taiyoAbamenyi bagwekaneAbamalaikaAbamenyi bagwekaneAbamalaika
5. Amatuko era bwango,'Motoria nchwo bwango!Ntoganetie gokorora,Buna ore aye,Nagoika nka Igoro,Enka y'omogoko.

title: 176 'Mbura Netwe Korwa Igoro
content:
# 176 'Mbura Netwe Korwa Igoro

 1. 'Mbura netwe korwa lgoro,Neira y'obwanchani;Eyekomenta chinguru,chikorw' as'Omotoria.
Mbura y'ebisio,nero ntwe toganetie;Nonya gwatoir'amabera,ko nembura twasaba.
2. "Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"Ekobokia chinkoro;'S'amagoko n'ebitunwa,'riogi ri'embur'enyinge.
3. "Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"'Monene toyetwerie;Erio tonyore chinguru,Oikeranie eira.
4. "Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"Tagototweria rero!Twatore amamoch'aito,Tokorangerie Yeso.

title: 177 Kemechando Eragoetanane
content:
# 177 Kemechando Eragoetanane

 1. Kemechando eragoetanane,'nchera 'sobosio bwao nomosunte;'Borabu bosesenirie na Yeso:Koraborore nobue amatemwa.
Rora 'borabu bokobara,Oborabu boseri'obwoba;Rora Yeso 'mosunt'otame:Omwegene Yeso ng'ang'ar' as'ore.
2. Nony'aye tomanyeti egurube,'Chandete bogima bwao as'ense;Beka omosalaba bosio bwao:Mwegene Yes'ase chinchera chionsi.
3. Genda nokwegen'obu'amatemwa,Manya Yeso 'motoria nkomo more;'Segi neb' enkong'u tokwa omoyo:'Motori' orire eira yobobui.
4. 'Segi neba ndoro yogoichania,'Matemwa amanene arakobue;'Monene ng'ang'ar' akoe chinguru:Chiokobua 'matemwa 'racha 'sore.

title: 178 'Ker' Arache
content:
# 178 'Ker' Arache

 1. 'Ker'arache, 'Ker'arache'sangereri abaye;Abare abana baye,Abanchwa baye.
Buna ching'enang'eni,mbarab' as'egutwaBamekameke buya,'s'egutwa yaye.
2. Nasangereri' Ere bwango,Abanchw' as'obonda;Chilulu 'kobara monoAbanchwa baye.
3. Abana bonsi abake,'Banchet' Omotoria;Nabwo chilulu chingiya,Abanchwa baye.

title: 179 'Nkoro Yao Yamigirwe
content:
# 179 'Nkoro Yao Yamigirwe

 1. 'Nkoro yao yamigirwe,'baga ndiy'ase Yeso?Gwasibirwe n'ebi'ense,'baga ndiy'ase Yeso?Ngesieri ateneine,Gotur'omoigorere,Igwa ngosoror'are,'baga ndiy'ase Yeso?
2. Gwasiria nsa chingiya,chiogokor' emeremo?Nakoe chinguru,chiogokor' emeremo.Takobugwa nebibe,bakony'abasaririe,Barigie abasiru,Kae Yeso ribaga.
3. Ay'okorigi' ebi'ense,Kae Yeso ribaga;Tori na ibaga rinde,Komokorera Yeso.Emegoko n'enibo,Ebinto bi'ense mbosa,Gwechand' as'okwegokia,kae Yeso ribaga.
4. Ekero totameti,chimbusuro chia Yeso;'Maboko are bosa,Rituko rie rigesa.Ntori na gento kende,'meremo yaito mbosa;Ntokonyora kogoka,Gatoramoror'Ere.

title: 180 Engaki Engiya Mono
content:
# 180 Engaki Engiya Mono

 1. Engaki engiya mono,Bachenu bacha amo;K'Omotori' ar'eganga,'Kero bakomotera.
2. Totere obwanchani,bwamosugetie Tata;Aroch'ens'etaraba,Akamoru' Omwan' oye.
3. Ter'ogwancha kw'Omwana,bun' atigete igoro;Akaba buna tore,Agakwa atotorie.
4. Obwanchani bw'Omoika,kwororobia chinkoro;Kero tware nobwoba,Gatoa Omotoria.
5. Engaki engiya mono,'Bachenu baumerane;Yeso nabe eganga,Bamotere botambe.

title: 181 'Monen'Omobas' One
content:
# 181 'Monen'Omobas' One

 1. 'Monen'Omobas'one, nki ndairoke?Mobaso, botuko nare nainche;Ner'ogontoria korw' as'emechando,Nogosorora kw' Omoik' aretire.
'Monen' Omobaso, mogok'one;'Mobaso, botuk'ere nandae,'Manen'Omobaso, 'mogok'one,'Mobaso na botuko nandae.
2. Monen'Omobaso'one, 'mare nacha,As'okwegena, nindore igoro;'Se Yes' Akogamba as'obonene,Naki ndatigar' Omosunte ime.
3. Monen'Omobas'one, 'nguru chiane;Ase chinguru chiaye nimbue;'Maber' atubir' oboreu bwane,'S'okwegena ntare nere ker'ensa.
4. Monen' Omobas'one, mbionsi ase nde,As'are ere mosunte toiyo;N'Omobori'Omogambi one,Nche ninkobake n'abachenu bande.

title: 182 Yeso Nkwegenete
content:
# 182 Yeso Nkwegenete

 1. Yeso nkwegenete,'Manwa ya Kalwari,Omotoria:'Gw'ogosaba bono,Onsibie ebibe,Mb'Oyoo kegimakorwa rero.
2. Buya bwa' obonge,bomente chinguru,'Nkoro yane;Buna gwankwerete,Bwanchani as'ore,Bob'obochenu pibore moyo.
2. Naetananire,ime y'emechando,Ay'ondae;Seria Omosunte,Ontinyi' amariga,Tontiga ntayayekorw' as'ore.

title: 183 Tat'O Igoro Namanyete
content:
# 183 Tat'O Igoro Namanyete

 1. Tat'O Igoro namanyete,'Merind'eratange nchera;Naserie chitang'utangu,'Mosunt'obe omobaso,'Mosunt'obe omobaso.
Omanyir' emerind'erantangen nchera;(Omanyire, ekeen'emerind'erantang'enchera yane)Omanyire, Atang'embeo kogusa,(Omanyire, ekeene,Atange embeo ekogusa)
2. Tat'O Igoro namanyete,'Riogo rikogweni' obobe;N'ogokuna kw'obwanchani,Agweni'enkor'eye yane,Agweni'enkor'eye yane.
3. Tat'O Igoro namanyete,Buna ntabu' ababisa;Narend' Okwegena kwane,Andende goik'omoerio,Andende goik'omoerio.
4. Tat'O Igoro namanyete,K'orogendo rokoera;Tiga eker'ekio Tata,Ntoke nyebiset' as'ore,Ntoke nyebiset' as'ore.

title: 184 Nimba Omobe Mono
content:
# 184 Nimba Omobe Mono

 1. Nimba omobe mono,Yes'ere nankwerete;Agakwa inkonyeke,Agakwa imbe moyo,Buna rit' as'omote,Imbe nere botambe.
2. Obwanchani bwa Yeso,Botambe gochia igoroBwaetania chindiba,Boreo korwa kare,'Bwanchani bwanyorete,'Kero nche nasirete.
3. Nimba omobe mono,Kristo mbionsi ase nde;Omanyir,Okogania,Biane bionsi nebiaye,Nandende korwa ense,Ongacheir' Obogima.

title: 185 Nche Ninkoganetie
content:
# 185 Nche Ninkoganetie

 1. Nche ninkoganetie, 'Kero gionsiRiogi rinde ndiri, Ri'omorembe.
Yeso nakorigirie, Nkorigetie riokaNsesenie Omotoria, Nagocheire.
2. Nche ninkoganetie, Omber' ange''Matemwa tambua, Ker' or' ange'.
3. Nche Ninkoganetie, 'S' obororoNchwo bwang' obe nainche,'Rio tinsara.
4. Nche ninkoganetie, Onyorokie,Ne chiira chiao, Kor' ase nde.
5. Nche ninkorigetie, OmochenuOnkore mb'oyoo, Yes' omuya.

title: 186 Ekero Nkoba n'Omorembe Nchera
content:
# 186 Ekero Nkoba n'Omorembe Nchera

 1. Ekero nkoba n'omorembe nchera,'Bororo bun' emerindo'Se kende gionsi aye kwanyorokirie,Goteba nga Mbuy'as'enkoro.
Imbuya . . . 'S'enkoro;Imbuya Imbuy' as' enkoro.
2. Nonya Saitani naisa gontema,Ninyeremie ekiageraKristo ororir' obwororo bwane,Okure as' ebibe biane.
3. 'Bibe biane bionsi gose tai bike,Biabambirw' OmosalabaTinkoragererigwa as'ebibe,Motogi' Omonen' Omoy'one.
4. Omonen' ayereri' ogocha kwao,'Goro rioba ndimanoke,'Konu nebug'ogocha Kw'Omonene,Nonyaigo mbuya as'enkoro.

title: 187 Gotara Na Yeso
content:
# 187 Gotara Na Yeso

 1. Gotara na Yeso,as' eriarakwane,Enchera yaito morekire;Gokor' ayanchete,Namenye naintwe,Na baria, bonsi baregene.
Okwegena, encher' ende teiyo;Y'omogok' ase Yeso: Egene oigwere.
2. Ntori n'omusunte,Nony' amare taiyo,Ere bweka obirusirie;'Tang'utang'u nchiyo,Nonya n'amariga,Gatoregene na Koigwera.
3. Ntori n'egurube,n'obororo bwonsi,'Meremo yait' atoakane;Emechando teiyo,n'ogweitia nkoiyo,Nogosesenia 'S' okoigwera.
4. Titokoenekia,obwanchani bwaye,Goika twerure Kegima;As'ogwanchereria,n'omogok' arure,Nebiab' abaramoigwere.
5. As' okobwatana,toikarans' as'are.Gose totare amo nere;Kor'ekiaratebe,Gend'as' arachike,Toirok' egene, n'oigwere.

title: 188 Mbuya Komwegena Yeso
content:
# 188 Mbuya Komwegena Yeso

 1. Mbuya komwegena Yeso,Ase ring'ana riaye,"Gwanch' eira na komanya",Otebir' Omonene.
Yeso naki mwegenete,Moenekie botambe;Yeso, Yes'Omuya Yeso,Nimente komomanya.
2. O mbuya kwegena Yeso,'S' amanying' agosibia,'S' okwegena nantobeke,'S' amanying' okogwenia.
3. Mbuya komwegena Yeso,ntig'ebibe kegima,'Se Yeso nyor'obogima,motimoko mogoko.
4. Nagokire nkwegenete,'Muya Yes' Omosani,Namanyire nore nainche,Nobe nainche botambe.

title: 189 Naki Yes' Ar'omosani
content:
# 189 Naki Yes' Ar'omosani

 1. Naki Yes' ar' Omosani,Koimoki'ebibe biaito!Ngesio ki koa Nyasae,Bionsi as'ogosaba.Morembe ki togosiriaBirukunyo twaimokia,'Kiagera titomoetiNyasa' as'ogosaba.
2. Gose ntore n'amatemwa?Mochando nore ande?Ntokw' omoyo toirere,Monen' as' ogosabaNtonyor' Omosani omuya,Torasang' obororoYes' omanyir' oboreu,Moe as' ogosaba.
3. Ntor' aboro n'egurube,Gochandwa n'okogania'Motoria nobotamero,Moe as' ogosabaBasani mbagotamire?Motebi' as'ogosabaNakoagat' agokenge,Nonyor' omosasoko.

title: 190 'Monene Tari Ebi' Ankio
content:
# 190 'Monene Tari Ebi' Ankio

 1. 'Monene tari ebi'ankio,IngosabaNyasae ndende timocha,Rero riokaNkonye nkore emeremo,Na gosabaNkwane na oboitongo,Rero Tata.
2. Tinkor' okogania kwane,'Mwango koigwaOnkonye inyare koigwa,Rero TataTinkwana ayan' amabe,Bwango bwangoMbwate ebikoba biane,Boire pi.
3. Kero kende mb' omokiru,kende ngokeNyegene obuya bwao,Rero TataMonene tari ebi'ankioIngosabaNdende, Ondae, Onyanche,Boire pi.

title: 191 Monen' Omorisia
content:
# 191 Monen' Omorisia

 1. Monen' Omorisia tinkoremerwa;Antimoki'as'obonyansi obobese;Ondair' ensemo amach' amaya;Nigo akong'irania na komboria.
2. Ning'et' ase rigoko ri' amakweri;Aye nomorendi, tindi n'obwoba;Nondisie n'enyimbo buya kegima;Tinkoba n'obobe, Kor' amo nainche.
3. Nondageri' ekero nden' emechando;Ninyore ebisio ebinge mono;Nong'ak' amaguta omotwe one;Tinkoboria kende biaisanire.
4. 'Buya n'amabera kwabing'eire;Bimbwatie botambe erio nkorore;Mbwati' encher' abakoro baetete;Goik' ens' engiya, bogambi bwao.

title: 192 Rigi' Ob' Omochenu
content:
# 192 Rigi' Ob' Omochenu

 1. Rigi' ob' omochenu,'Kwane na Nyasae,'Be Nere na koria,ring'ana'riaye;Okor' obosani,okony'aboro,'Tari kweba kende,origi' ebisio.
2. Rigi' ob' omochenu,'Nse nkoagag' ere,Obe aye bweka,Amo na Yeso;Komoroche Yeso,Nomogwekane,'Banto mbamorore,'Se chimbwa chiao.
3. Rigi' ob' omochenu,'B' Omorai oo,Tomotang'anerakende na keba;'Mogok', obororo,Mobwatie Yeso,Komoroche Yeso,'Ncha ng'ana Yaye.
4. Rigi' ob'omochenu,Otoerere,Ebirengererio,biragwe Nere;Oragwe n'Omoika,As'obwanchani,Bwango nogwenere,'Meremo Igoro.

title: 193 Igwa Amang'ana A Yeso
content:
# 193 Igwa Amang'ana A Yeso

 1. Igwa amang'ana a Yeso,'Mang'an' obogima boriOtari gosaba, igwa inyora,Basesenigw' abagokora.
Ababwatete amachik' Aye,Mbare negesio negesioAbabwetete amachik' Aye,Mbuya, mbuya, mbuya bare.
2. Koigwa bosa nkori kende,chiira nachibe bosaKobigwa, kwoboa, mbigototoria,Basesenigw' abagokora.
3. Baso' omochie n'omogoko,Abachenu abaseraBasibekire bare n'obonene,Barie Omote bw'obogima.

title: 194 Tar' Enchera Y'Omonene
content:
# 194 Tar' Enchera Y'Omonene

 1. Tar' enchera y'Omonene,'Korae botambeOmoik' oye korwa igoro,Oseri' omosunte
Tar' enchera, Tar' enchera(Tara ase oborabu bwa Nyasae,Tara ase oborabu bwa Nyasae)Tar' enchera(Tara ase oborabu bwa Nyasae)Tar' enchera ya Nyasae.
2. Tar' omobaso bw'Enjili,okorwa igoroOkorae kor'omoke,'Mwegeni o Nyasae.
3. Tar' omobaso, 'mosunte,Noribia boeto;Omosunte norasireEmiaka n'emiaka.
4. Tar' omobaso omanye,Nyasa' Omwanchani;Obwanchani nabokine,Igoro bokume.

title: 195 And'onsi Na Yeso
content:
# 195 And'onsi Na Yeso

 1. And'onsi na Yeso nigo ndagende,Karantang'an' and'onsi as'ens'eye;Mogoko tori Monene ataiyo,And'onsi na Yeso tindi nche bweka.
And'onsi, and'onsi tindi kwoboa,And'onsi na Yeso nigo ndagende.
2. And'onsi na Yeso tindi nche bweka,Basani mbantiga Ere noyone;Karanda' ase chinchera chinkong'u,And'onsi nimosasim' Omotoria.
3. And'onsi na Yeso ningende ndare,'Mosunte nimoinyore Omonene;Tingosira korwa enchera yaye,And'onsi na Yeso nimenye n'Ere.

title: 196 Yeso N'Omosani Omuya
content:
# 196 Yeso N'Omosani Omuya

 1. Yeso n'Omosani omuya,Ekero okobugwa n'enseNakogwenie omoyo,Nagokoa chinguruYeso n'Omosani omuya.
Yeso nomosani omuya(Yes' omosani, Omosani omuya)Yeso nomosani omuya(Yes' ornosani, Omosani omuya)Nagokonye gokogwa,Nakoigwe gokorangeriaNomosani obuete bonsi.
2. Yeso n'Omosani obuete!Andemia na kong' omorembe;Ambwate n'okoboko,Tinkoiroka kende,Yeso n'Omosani omuya.
3. Nimba nomoichan' omonge,Nonya namakweri nachicha,Tinkoigwa kende,Omotoria ng'ang' areYeso n'Omosani omuya.

title: 197 Kae' Mbeo' Bwoba
content:
# 197 Kae' Mbeo' Bwoba

 1. Kae'mbeo 'bwoba,Rema osemeria,Tat'omanyir' obororo,Nakoimokie igoro.
2. Goet'emechando,'Koroseri'enchera,Gany'engaki yayebotuko bob'omobaso.
3. Tiger'Omoneneanche na gochikaMotayayi nob'oyoye,Ere nomong'aini.
4. Ogosemia kwaye,nokonene monoGakorire emerem'eyio yakwoboetie.

title: 198 Yes' Omorisi' Oito
content:
# 198 Yes' Omorisi' Oito

 1. Yes' Omorisi' oito,Tinyi' amariga;Gatore as'are,Nki toroboe?Tomotunye rioka,'S' aratorae;Gochia as' eroro,Gos' oborisia.
2. Yes' Omorisi' oito,Twamany'eriogi;Okomanya kwaye,GwatogokirieNig' akogorora,As' obwororo;Ner' oratorae,Nabaye tore.
3. Yes' Omorisi' oito,Otokwerete,Gaiter' amanyinga,'Se ker' eng'ondiKer' eyem' abeka,Kemanyererio;'Tebir' "Ab' Omoika,Abwo nabane".
4. Yes' Omorisi' oito,Otorendire;'Bibengi nabicha,Tibigotora'Mwenya bw'amakweri,Ogotwoboyia;Ntokwobo' obobe,'Babui b'embera.

title: 199 Ens' Engiya Y'ogosaba
content:
# 199 Ens' Engiya Y'ogosaba

 1. Ens' engiya y'ogosaba,Kondusi' ense y'emechandoNakong'ira ase Tata,Motebie kogania kwaneEkero nde n'obororo,Moy'on'onyor' okoremiaErio mbua omotemi,Ens' engiya y'ogosaba.
2. Ense engiya y'ogosaba,Ira gosorora kwaneGochi' as' Ere omwegenwa,Oyokoru' ogosesenia'Ntebirie morigererie,Nyegene 'Ng'ana n'obuyaNimoe ker' ogwechanda,Nganyet' Ensa y'ogosaba.
3. Ens' engiya y'ogosaba,Nyore okoremia kwaoKorw' egetunwa gia Pisga,Ndor'enka yane ndagende'S' obogima nintenene,Mbwat' ekeegwa gia kareNg'ak' eriogi as' embeo,"Mbuya Ensa y'ogosaba".

title: 200 'Nsa Ngiya Y'ogosaba
content:
# 200 'Nsa Ngiya Y'ogosaba

 1. 'Nsa ngiya y'ogosaba,'Mioyo koyanchire';Twach' ase YesoOmotoria Mosani;Togocha n'okwegena,Ere natorende;Riogo as' omorosu,O mbuya kobao.
Ensa engiya,Nsa y'ogosaba,Riogo as'Omorosu,O mbuya kobao.
2. .'Nsa ngiya y'ogosaba,'Motoria kar' ang'e;As' amabera abaigw'abana baye;Atotebia tomoe,Ogwechanda gwaito;Riogo as' omorosu,O mbuya kobao.
3. .'Nsa ngiya y'ogosaba,Ker' abatemirwe';Bakoretera Yes'obororo bwabo;N'enkoro y'amabera,narusie mochando;Riogo as' omorosu,O mbuya kobao.
4. As' Ensa y'ogosaba,Twegenir' as'are;Ebisio toganetie natobinyore;Ase oboikerenu,Tosirie mechando;Riogo as' omorosu,O mbuya kobao.

title: 201 Ningotunye Omotoria
content:
# 201 Ningotunye Omotoria

 1. Ningotunye Omotoria,And' ons' as' okong'iraAs' ogochia ninkobwatie,Monene ningotunye.
Ningotunye Omotoria,Ogankwer' as' omoteBanto bonsi mbagotiga,'S'obuya ningotunye.
2. Nonya n'enchera erembe,Bun'emerindo nyanchaGwatang'anire enchera,N'omogoko ngotunye.
3. Nimba n'emechand' emenge,Nintemwa mono monoNainyoir' Aye ngwatemetwe,'S' omochengo ngotunye.
4. Nimba n'oboror' obonge,Ntigire omotakaNomanyet' emechand'ense,Nindigetie ngotunye.
5. Ning'eta as' amatemwa,Aye nig'okondaaNgwaetet' as' emechando,Nche ningotunye rioka.

title: 202 Ntererie Roik' Abaminto
content:
# 202 Ntererie Roik' Abaminto

 1. Nterene riok'abaminto,Mang'an' obogimaNdore obosera bwaye,Mang'an' obogimaAmang'an' amaya,Nyegeri' okwegena.
Namasera, y'ogokumia;Mang'an'obogima,Mamasera, yo'ogokumia.
2. Yes 'omuya otoeire,Mang'an'obogimaMonyabibe tegerera,Mang'an' obogimaOtoeire bosa,Tong'uswe gochia nka.
3. Tiga bono toyarandie,Mang'an' obogima'Korua kwabera, Morembe,Mang'an' obogimaYeso Omoboria,Tochene botambe.

title: 203 Buna Nde
content:
# 203 Buna Nde

 1. Tindi na egetamero,Manying'ao 'ngitekera,Gwantebirie nchich' as'or'Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.
2. Buna nde intaganyetiGwetinyi 'Omoy'on' ekebe,Manyingao 'tinyi 'ebibeEng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.
3. Buna nde nkorutwarutwa,Nechitang'u tang'u chionsi,'Segi ime bwoba 'sik'Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.
4. Nd'Omotaka omouko,Kogweni' ebirengererio,Nakwo nganetie as'or'Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.
5. Buna nde Aye nong'ire,Ondosi 'onyaber 'onsibie,Negenir'eira yaoEng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.
6. Buna nde Bwanchani bwao,Bwatagoire Ker'etoto,Bono mb'oyoo kegim'Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.

title: 204 Naigw'eriogi Riao
content:
# 204 Naigw'eriogi Riao

 1. Naigw'eriogi riao,Kondangeria nchiche,Nsibigwe n'amanyinga o'Tegete Kalwari.
Ngochand' as'ore,Ngocha nde bono,Onsibi' as' amanyinga,'Tegete Kalwari.
2. Nonya nche nd'omworo,nomente chinguru,Nonsibi 'obobe bwane pi,Goika mb'omochenu.
3. Yeso ondangeirie,mb'omoikeranu,Gosemeria n'omorembe,As'ense na Igoro.
4. Goker'amanyingaBuya bw'okoboria,Gokera Yes'Ekeegwa,Oboronge bwaito.

title: 205 Nche Nomwan'oo
content:
# 205 Nche Nomwan'oo

 1. Nche nomwan' oo kwandangeirie,Many'obwanchani bwao;Ko nindigetie as'okwegena,Kong'uswa ang'e n' Aye.
Ng'usa ang'e (ang'e)ang' Omonene,Ase gwatokwerete;Ng'usa ang'e, ang'e,ang'Omonene,Nimbe naye botambe.
2. Onchene bono as' emeremo,'S' okobua kw'obuya;Nkogaramer, erio ngosemerie,Kogania kob' as'ore.
3. Mogoko bw'eng'aki er'enk as' ore,As 'ekerogo kiao;'Kero nkogosaba Nyasae One,Nkwana bun' omosani.
4. N'obwanchani obonge nche ntamanye,Goika ng'amboke nyancha;Noreo mogoko nche ntamanye,Goika ntimok 'as'ore.

title: 206 Ira Ense Yonsi Ong'e  Yeso
content:
# 206 Ira Ense Yonsi Ong'e  Yeso

 1. Ira ense yonsi ong'eYes' omogoko one;'Bwanchani bwaye tiboriGoonchoka nonya ng'ake.
'Maber' ay'ogokumia;Bwanchani bwaye obonge;Gotorigwa gw'ekeene,Kw'obogima botambe.
2. Ira ense yonsi ong'eYes' Omoremia one;Omotoria karandende,Ninter' as' emechando.
3. Ira ense ong'e YesoNdor' omosasok' oye;Ase orogendo rwane,Amoreker' enchera.
4. Ira ense yonsi ong'eYes' Omosalab' one;Goik' Omonene ogocha,Morore as' obosio.

title: 207 Ir'obogima Bwane
content:
# 207 Ir'obogima Bwane 

 1. Ir'obogima bwane,Bochene bob'obwao,Ir'amaboko naro'kore bun'origetie.
Nsibi' as'amanying'Omotoria (Manying'aye),Nsibi' as' amanying'agochena (Agochena),'Monene narure bionsi as'ore,Bib'ebiao botambe.
2. Ira amagor'ane,'B' amang' as'emeremo,Ira n'eriogi riane,Nter'ase Nyasae oka.
3. Ir' ebikoba biane,Bikwan' ay'origetie,Ir'amo n'echinibo,Tindigetie kobisa.
4. Ira chingaki chiane,Chikobake botambe,Ir'obong'aini bwane,Korer' ay'origetie.
5. Ira Ogwancha kwane,Gokore kob'okwao,Ira n'enkoro yane,Eb'obomenyo bwao.
6. Ir' obwanchani bwane,Nib' as'amagor'ao,Ir' omobere bwensi,noyoo bono bori.

title: 208 Ens'enyia Y'Omwando
content:
# 208 Ens'enyia Y'Omwando

 1. Yes'Omonene,Er'otoriereir' eira;Eira y'obomeny'Atoroseirie aria Igoro;'Mochie bw'abaya,Enka y'omwando twaeirwe;As'ebibe n'emechandon'amakweri bitabe.
Ens'e ----- nyia, y'omwando;('Nse y'omwand'ekare gocha) x 2Yes'A ----- toroseirie;('Mochie Yes'Atoroseirie) x 2Tome ----- nye, botambe;(Tomeny'aroro botambe) x 2Tomenye n'omorembeas'ens'eria botakoira.
2. As'ens'eyi'enyia,Botuko mbokob'aroro;Yeso ner'orab'omobasoirumbe ritatube;'Botaka mboiyo,gose kende kiogoichania;Tomenye nomorembe,N'Omotori'oito botambe
3. Ntoumerane n'abasanitwatiganete;Baria bonsi bararet'aseYeso nababeo;Ne chintakananchinyor'abaibori babo;'Bororo bw'amakwerititokoboinyora rinde.
4. 'Basani baito,rigereria bosio rioka;Intwe nabaeti,bamint'ens'eye teri seito;Titweb'eira, Y'enseYes'Atoroseirie;Intwe n'abanyamwandob'obogima botakoera.

title: 209 Ong'use Ang'e N'aye Tata
content:
# 209 Ong'use Ang'e N'aye Tata

 1. Ong'use ang'e n'Aye Tata,Nganeti'onyagate,Ang'e ase amabok'ao,Nyare gotimoka.
Ong'use n'obwanchani,(Ong'us' ong'use n'obwanchani),Ng'us' ang'e, Igor'as'ore(Ong'us n'obwanchani,Goch'as'ore Igoro,)Ng'usa ange Gocha as'ore.
2. Ong'use ang'e Omotoria,Timba inche bweka,Ombwate n'okoboko kwao,Erio nintimoke.
3. Ong'us' as' Omoik omuya.Erio nkogwekane;Onsibie, onchene, nindabe,Goika mbe omuya.

title: 210 Aye Nobe Buna Yeso
content:
# 210 Aye Nobe Buna Yeso

 1. Aye nobe buna Yeso Omochenu pi?Notare n'Ere nchera enyerere?Aye nomoe chigurube chiao chionsi?Ancha agotang'ane.
Chinguru chiaye nchibe as'ore,Amanyinga aye nagosibie;Obwanchani Bwaye nobonyore,Ng'a mbuya, bwanche akorae bo.
2. Nabwanche agosibore omotunyane?Nomanyete omoremb' okonyora?Nabwanche agokony' erio tocha gosira?Ancha agotang'ane.
3. Nonyore obomenyo as' obonda Bwaye?Nabwanche komanya chinguru Chiaye?Botambe nokor' emeremo ne chinguru?Ancha agotang'ane.

title: 211 Yes' Omosalaba One
content:
# 211 Yes' Omosalaba One

 1. Yes' omosalaba one,Bono naywetwekire;Ngotunyan' Omonen' one,Natigir' ebiens' eye.Tindengerereti enibo,Enibo y' ense eye:Inche nomonguru' as'ore,Monyamwando o Nyasae.
2. Nonya ngochandek' ens' eyeNingaramere Yeso;'Mechando neba emenge,Nindemereri' as'ore.Emechando teri gento,Ninde n' obuya bwao,Nairaneirie mbuya mono,Ninyore bions' as'ore.
3. 'Nkoro ira obogima,'Konyek' amatuk' onsi;Obue ebibe n'obwoba,Gendereria emeremo,'Moika nore as'ore,N' Obwanchani bwa Tata,Omotoria nere oyoo,Ogokweret' omote.
4. Oyominto ayerera,Bweboe okwegena,Bwebo' ebinto bi'esegi,Toraika ense enyia;Yeso nomotang'ani oo,Sab' asare botambe,'Ker' oraike Igoro,Nomogok' omonene.

title: 212 Nanchire Koba Omwan' Oye
content:
# 212 Nanchire Koba Omwan' Oye

 1. Nanchire koba omwan' oye;Imanye enchera;Nkor' emeremo y' Omotoria,Onkonye bono.
Noyoo (Yeso), Noyoo (Yeso),Noyoo eye neira;Noyoo (Yeso), Noyoo (Yeso),Noyoo nde kegima.
2. 'Nibo y'ense ig' ere bosa,Otari aroro;Natigire bionsi kegima,Naye enibo.
3. Kondatugut' ebinto bi'ense,Ika ang'e  nainche;Ebigochia kare as'ore,Binkonye inche.

title: 213 Okogacherwa Yeso
content:
# 213 Okogacherwa Yeso

 1. "Okogacherwa Yeso,"Na nguru chia NyasaeNdendwe korw' ebimoa,Ntare buna Yeso.
Ndendwe as' Omonene,Ngw' as' amagor' AyeTingwenereti, kende, kende,Obe bionsi Ase nde.
2. "Okogacherwa Yeso,"Nkore bun' ancheteImbe oyoye bori,nkore emeremo.
3. "Okogacherwa Yeso,"Ngachwe korwa enseMoitongo as' omoika,'Mochenu as' enkoro.
4. "Okogacherwa Yeso,"Nimb' oyoye boriMbe oyoye botambe,Mbe oyoye bweka.

title: 214 Bono Ngocha Nde
content:
# 214 Bono Ngocha Nde

 1. Natayayire ar'Omonene,Bono ngocha nde nka;Nganetie ng'irane as'obuya,Bono ngocha nde nka.
Ee ngocha nde,Tata ngocha nde,Bono ngocha nde nka;Ee ngochande,Tata ngocha nde,Bono ngocha nde nka.
2. Narosire n'ens'eye y'ebibe,Bono ngocha nde nka;Omotoria nang'ariganie nka.Bono ngocha nde nka.
3. 'Manyir' Omotoria nantimokie,Bono ngocha nde nka;Ko nganetie gotimok'as'are,Bono ngocha nde nka.
4. Nasabire nonya nobosomba,Bono ngocha nde nka;Gicha nyor'obuya bw'Omotoria,Bono ngocha nde nka.
5. Togi'Omonene Omotori'one,Bono ngocha nde nka;'Ganyet'ang'ariganie nch'omobe,Bono ngocha nde nka.

title: 215 Kwarure Ebinto Bionsi Ekeng'wanso?
content:
# 215 Kwarure Ebinto Bionsi Ekeng'wanso?

 1. Kwaganirie omorembe, n'okwegena,Gwasabire as'ogweitia?Kotogotimoka; gos'osesenigwe,Goika bono bweru'ekeng'wanso.
Kwarure ebinto bionsi ekeng'wanso?Omoika ngokoraa Are?Norasesenigwe, onyor'omorembe,Koramo' omobere n'enkoro.
2. Nobe n'Omonene 'se Ringana riaye,Obe n'omoremb 'oisaneke.Korer'ogochika, Ob'omochenu pi,Oru'ebiao bionsi ekeng'wanso.
3. Titokomany' eki Omonen 'atoeire,As'ebisi'ebi twasabire.Mebere, chinkoro, goik 'abigambere,Bionsi torue as'ekeng'wanso.
4. Mbori gotebek' obwanchani-atoeire,Chinkoro chiaito na chigoke,'Buya bw'ogosanga tosange Nere,Gatwarure bionsi ekeng'wanso.

title: 216 Buna Nde Nachire as' ore
content:
# 216 Buna Nde Nachire as' ore

 1. Buna nde nachir' as'ore,Inche tingwekor' omuya'Manyinga oka ngosaba,Ntorie as' amaber' ao.
Buna (Buna inde),inde (Buna inde)Buna nde nachir' as'ore(Buna inde)Nyingw 'Onsesenie onkonye,Buna nde nachir' as'ore.
2. Buna nde ko namanyire,"'Manyinga ok' aisanire"Gonsibia ndabe kegima,Erio nkwegene kegima.
3. Buna nde nachire rero,"'Moy'one okorereire"Tinkomenya are naye,Noyoo nganetie koba.
4. Nkoro yane n' obogima,Gotimoka nyor' as'oreGantayayete ndosete,"Ntimok 'obwanchani bwao".

title: 217 Tata Nachire As' Ore
content:
# 217 Tata Nachire As' Ore

 1. Tata nachire as'ore,Nay' ogotoreka,Korantige inche bweka,Kai nche ndagende?
Namanyire, negenire,Yes' Otokwerete,As' omote amanyinga,Akang'itekera.
2. Nanchire Omwana oo,Ng'a chinguru chiao,Ong'isanekie na bionsi,As'engaki eye.
3. Omochaki bw'okwegena,Nakorigereirie,Nyore ekeegwa kiao,kebe obogima.
4. Togontiga inche nsire,Kwana erio menye,Ntimoke ntari korosa,Goik'ong' Omoik' oo.
5. Naki Omoy'on 'oragoke,Kondakoror' aye,Tiga nyigw'eriogi riao,Nyaberw' as' obuya.

title: 218 O Yeso Narire Eira
content:
# 218 O Yeso Narire Eira

 1. O Yeso narir' Eira,Kogokorera,"Kabe nainche", Botambe,'Monen' omosani.Tinkoiroka esegi,Korabe ase nde,Tinkorw' as' enchera,'ker'orantang'ane.
2. Nkoigwe ang'e ase nde,Ense ng'ang'e ere,Tindi korora buya,"'Mariogi agontema".Babisa ng'ang'e bare,Bang'etananire,O Yeso inchwo ang'e,Ntange korw'ebibe.
3. "Yeso kwarir'eir'as 'abakogotunya"Agw'or' as' obonene,Mosomb'oo nabe,Yeso narir' Eira,Kogokorer' Aye,Ng'obuya 'nkobwatie,'Monen' omosani.

title: 219 Tokwan' Amang'an' Amabe
content:
# 219 Tokwan' Amang'an' Amabe

 1. Tokwan' amang'an' amabeKorw' oromeme rwao;'Nkoro eyarengererieAtararwa omonwa.
"Anchana inwe", Er'otebire;"Bana igw'amachiko a Tata""Anchana inwe", Er'otebire;Abana igw' amachiko.
2. 'Bwanchani obochenu mono,Amo n' obosani bo;'Boriri bw' egek' egeke'Go borasarie bionsi.
3. 'Mang'an' amabe namangoNa ebirengererio;'Kegosaria obosaniRing'an' erimo ribe.

title: 220 Ondaire, Ondaire
content:
# 220 Ondaire, Ondaire

 1. Ondaire, ondaire,n'amang'ana okoremia,Ase onsi ense eye,Omonene ondaire.
Ondaire, ondaire,Omonene ondaireNokoboko kwaye igo,Omonene ondaire.
2. 'Kero kende nomobaso,'Kero kende nomosunte;S'amache na ase ense,Omonene ondaire.
3. Tinkonyara gotogonya,As' emeremo ndaegwe,Ekiagera namanyire,Omonene ondaire.
4. Koyaerir' emeremo,Konabuire ebibe,Nony'ogokwa tinkoiroka,Omonene ondaire.

title: 221 Ang'e N' Aye Nyasae
content:
# 221 Ang'e N' Aye Nyasae

 1. Ang'e n'Aye Nyasae,Ang'e kobua,Omonene one,Ang'e kobua.Amatuko onsi,Nimbe ang'e naye,Ang'e n'aye Nyasae,Ang'e kobua.
2. Nonya nagendire'Mosunte ime,Nay' obotameroEmiaka yonsiAse okorotanindigetie kobaAng'e naye Nyasae,Ang'e kobua.
3. Bionsi Aye kwang'eire,N'amaber' ao,'Malaika bonsiBandangeirie,Korwa ense eye,As'ore IgoroAng'e n'aye Nyasae,Ang'e kobua.
4. Ne chinguru chiane,Ninkobake,Egetare kianeKia obuyaEmechando yonsi,Twaretir' as'ore;Ang'e naye NyasaeAng'e kobua.

title: 222 Ekerengererio Kiang'iranereire
content:
# 222 Ekerengererio Kiang'iranereire

 1. Ekerengererio,Kiang'iranereire;Naikire ang'e na seito,Kobua riria kare.
Ang'e seito,Ang'e seito;Angie seito rero, rero,Kobua riria kare.
2. Ang'e nka ya Tata,'S'obomeny' obonge;Ase Yeso akogamba,Nyancha y'ekerore.
3. Ang'e goika seito,Ntore chigurube;K'emechando yaerire,Mbek'egutw' engiya.

title: 223 Goika Nche Mbe N'Omotoria
content:
# 223 Goika Nche Mbe N'Omotoria

 1. Goika nche mbe n'Omotoria,Tingotara nche bweka,'Moigwe ore ang'e nainche'Mabok' ay' amboanie.
Moy'one tokwoboa (tokwoboa),'S' arandae ningende (ningende)Gose tinkwemurungania,Mbwatie chinchera chiaye.
2. Goika nche mbe n'Omotoria,'Kiagera nd'omoreu;Nanyare kong' oboremu,Ond' atanyare bori.
3. Goika nche mbe n'Omotoria,As' orogendo rwane;'S'emechando n'as'obuya,Nonya nase chisegi.
4. Goika nche mbe n'Omotoria,Ab'Omorai nchera;Goika ngik'ekiambokero,Nsoe as'ens'eri'enyia.

title: 224 Omotoria Ondaire
content:
# 224 Omotoria Ondaire

 1. Omotoria ondaire;Ninki rende mborire?Tinkoba na tang'utangu,Ere n'Omorai one;Nere okong'a omorembe,Nimenye ime Yaye;Kende nagecha ase nde,Ere nandende buya;Kende nagecha ase nde,Ere nandende buya.
2. Omotoria ondaire,Nony' enchera er' embe;"Ng'obuy' ekero ngotemwa",Ndagera y'obogima;Kondagochwe amagoro,Na korang'a kegima;Korwa ase egetare,Narorire ensoko;Korwa ase egetare,Narorire ensoko.
3. Omotoria ondaire,As'obwanchani Bwaye!Ninyore ogotimoka,As'omochie o Tata;'Kero keria ndabokigwe,'Moerio bw'orogendo,Nyare gotera botambe:Yeso ndae enchera;Nyare gotera botambe:Yeso ndae enchera.

title: 225 Nda' Omonene Yehova
content:
# 225 Nda' Omonene Yehova

 1. Nda' Omonene Yehova,'Moeti bwens' ey' embe,Nd' omworo, Ay' Omonguru,mbwate as'okoboko,
Endagera ya Igoro,Ondagerie nyigote, (nyigote)Ondagerie nyigote.
2. Tubora Ensok' engiya,'Sok'Amach' okogwenia,Tiga rire ri'omorero,Rinda' as'orogendo,
Omoboria Omonguru,Obe chinguru chiane, (nyigote)Obe eng'aya yane.
3. Ngoik' engegu ya Yordani,Osiri' obwoba bwane,Ong'etie as'omorindo,Ng'ike ng'umbu Kanaani;
Amatera y'okobaka,Ningoterere Aye, (nyigote)Ningoterere Aye, Amen.

title: 226 Nkonyeget' Ase Yeso
content:
# 226 Nkonyeget' Ase Yeso

 1. Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,'S' egekuba kiaye,Gakonyoroki' ogwancha,Nintimok' omoyo.'Gw' eriogi ri'amalaika,Banterera buyaBitii bi' obonene,'Nyancha y'ekerore.
Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,'S' egekuba kiaye,Gakonyoroki' ogwancha,Nintimok' omoyo.
2. Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,Korwa ogwechanda,Korw' amatemwa y'ense,'Bibe mbikombua.Tinkoba n'obororo,'Bwoba, tang'utang'u;Amatemwa make Igo,'Mariga make igo!
3. Yeso, obotamero,Yeso onkwereire,Nimbek' ogosemia,'S' Egetare ki' Emiaka;Nganye ntari korosa,Nd' obotuko boere;Goika ndore emambia,'Gonkiera igoro.

title: 227 Yeso Nakire?
content:
# 227 Yeso Nakire?

 1. Yeso nakir' as' obororo,Ntagoke gose gotera'Gurub'endito birengererioOrogendo rokondosia.
Nkondend' ar'amaene igoOigure emechando,Mobaso ndosa Botukong'iroka Omotoria ndenda.
2. Yeso nakir' as'omosunte,Konde nobwoba obonge;Omobas'ore botuko bocha,Ere nkomber'are ang'e.
3. Yeso nakir' as'amatemwa,Ekero nche nasinyirwe;Boror' obonge ntatimogeti,Marig' akonagoiteka.
4. Yeso nakire kamakweri,Agwatanana abanchwa;Omoy'oichana ang'e n' ogwoka,Tagokira atandore.

title: 228 Namanyire Oyokondaa
content:
# 228 Namanyire Oyokondaa

 1. Kemerind' eng'etanaine,'Bis' enchera y'obogima,Tinkwoboa ekiageranamanyir' oyokondaa.
Namanyir' oyokondaa,As' enyancha y'emechandoEmerindo y'emechando,Yes' andae onsi mbuya.
2. Kemerindo ekonucha,'Se bitarre bi' emechando;Tinkwoboa ekiageranamanyire oyokondaa.
3. Kamatemw' agonchichera,Nyancha neba embe mono;Korende ning'ike ng'umbu,Namayire oyokondaa.
4. Obwanchani bw' Omotoria,Bontang'aine as'enchera;Nimwegene goika ng'ike,Namanyire oyokondaa.

title: 229 Omotoria  Ntang'ane
content:
# 229 Omotoria  Ntang'ane

 1. Omotoria ntang'ane,Ase chinchera chionsi,Nde buya kond' as'ore,Mb' as' obwanchani bwao.
Ndae, ndae,Omotoria tinsira;Ndae amatuk' onsi,Ndae chinchera chionsi.
2. Naye obotamero,'Kero emechand' ere,Nde buya kore ang'e,Nsemeretie as'ore.
3. Ndae goik' omoerio,'Mechando yaerire,"Ngik' as' ense botaire,Marig'aratinyigwe.

title: 230 K'emechando Y'ens' Egocha
content:
# 230 K'emechando Y'ens' Egocha

 1. K'emechando y'ens'egocha,'Segi nyancha na ense;Nindigi 'as' obotamero,'Se kiriri kia Nyasae.
Nambise nche, Nambise ncheAse ntanyor' emechando,Nambise nche, Nambise nche'Se kiriri kia Nyasae.
2. Karandeter' emechando,Ninsemerie Igoro;'S' obwanchani, nandongeyie,Takworoki' endamwamu.
3. Ababisa bakondigia,Saitani ondigetie;Yeso aonchor' amabe,Kob'omogok' omonge.
4. Kobogori' omosalaba,Ndor'emechando y'ense;Yes'orendet 'Omoy' one,Tagontiga nche nsire.

title: 231 Ande Onsi Gantangaine
content:
# 231 Ande Onsi Gantangaine

 1. Ande onsi gantang'aine,Nindagende mwegenete;Nkoinyora bun'ankwerete,Akabambw'aria Kalwari.
Yeso nandae botambe,Yeso nandae and'onsi;Omosani bw'Ogokumia,Agankwer 'ase Kalwari
2. Nagokire komoigwera,Nagokire gantangaine'Gwancha kway'ogwansu ase nde,Gochenire na Kalwari.
3. Nindagende tinkoiroka,Ngoke Kristo kare ang'e;Nsemeretie komorora,Yes'Omosani onkwerete.

title: 232 Nay' Enchera
content:
# 232 Nay' Enchera

 1. Nay'enchera togotanierakorw' amakweri;Noyokorigia Tat'amorigie goeta as'ore.
2. Nay'ekeene ng'anayao eru' obongaini;Naye okoru' obonga'ininagochen' enkoro.
3. Nay' Encher', Ekeene,'bogima many' enchera;Torend' ekeene naki'omogoko botambe.

title: 233 'Monen' Emerindo Nere
content:
# 233 'Monen' Emerindo Nere

 1. 'Monen' emerindo nere!Nig'ekogusa mono!'Mare a igoro amwamire,Boigamo mbori ang'e.'Gokirete togosira?Ng'aki orarare!Kera etageka gekogosa,Gototindeka nyancha.
"Mbeo n'emerindo mbinyigwe,'morembe,Neba endamwamu y'enyancha,Gos'ebirecha,gose monto onde,Mache takomera bwato as'Omonene bw'enyanchan'ense are,Ng'a bigwer' okogania kwane,'Morembe,'Morembe Ng'a bigwer'okogania kwane Omorembe"
2. Monen' nigo ngweitia,Nyekany' as 'obororo,'Nkoro yane yachandekire,O! boka na Ontorie.'Merindo y'ebib'ebinge,Yambuir' enkoro;Nasirire Nasirir'Omonen' ayerera onkonye.
3. Yes'obwoba bwasirire,'Morind' okanyekire,'Mobaso ororekanire,Im'as'enkoro yane.Ganya Omoboria one,Tontiga nche bweka;Ntimoke as'ore n'omogoko,As' engegu y'ebisio.

title: 234 Mogambi Ngoch'are Bwango
content:
# 234 Mogambi Ngoch'are Bwango

 1. 'Mogambi ngoch'are bwango,'Ri'okweret' abanyabibe,Nache kwoyia abachenu,Abaire Igoro.
Ngoch'Are, ngoch'Are,Ogocha kwaye ng'ang'e kore;O! Nachiche, O! Nachiche,Nachiche gototoria.
2. Twaror'ebimanyererio,Bikworoki' ogocha kwaye;Matuko bwango naere,Natogende Igoro.
3. Amatuk' onsi nesegi,Titori n' ogotimoka;Goik' Omotoria asirie,'Bibe n'amakweri.
4. Ens'eyio ya Igoro nenyia,Toraikaranse botambe;Toboyigwe Ogotakwa,Tomenye botambe.

title: 235 Mboare Ki Erio Ng'ike Nka?
content:
# 235 Mboare Ki Erio Ng'ike Nka?

 1. Mboare ki erio ng'ike nka?Ner' omorendi akairania;"Botuko bono bwaerire,Ang'e bokiamoke.Tagoichana ayerera,'Gosemeria gokorae;Goik' onyore obonda,Bw' obarabu Igoro.
2. Nkamoboria omorwani,Naboigo n'er 'akandemia;"Bwata mono okorwana,Gwaisire koeraTagoichana remereria,Kor'emeremo eere,Twatebigwe ekeegwa,'Kero torabue".
3. Erio nkaboria naende,Ense yonsi ekairania;"Orogendo rwaerire,Nka teri are mono,Tagoichana twakureirwe,N'ebimanyereri' ebinge;Ebitongwa mbiganyete,'Riogi ri' Omonene".
4. Tari are goika nka bori,Ekerengereri'ekiya;Kegotogwenia chinkoro,'Gotiny 'amarigaTagoichana ntoumerane,'Se totatayaye rinde,Tobe n'omogoko bori,As' omochie o Tata.

title: 236 Amang'an 'Amay' As' Omogendi
content:
# 236 Amang'an 'Amay' As' Omogendi

 1. Amang'an 'amay' as' omogendi,'Yotayayete korwa nka;Omotoria mbwang'arairan'ense,N'obonda bwaye boche.
Ngoch' are, Mbwang'arairan'ens' eye;Namanya nairane bwango,N'abagendi bonsi, baegw'obonene,'Ker' Omotori'aragambe.
2. Chimber'as' abachenu baraire,Nachimanorwe kegima;Baria bonsi baraire mbaboke,'Rio naende bamenye.
3. Ntoumeran' as'enka y'omogoko,Toter' ogotoreka;Korwa chinsinyo chionsi chi'ense'eye,Tomosasim' Omogambi.
4. Haleluya amen Haleluya nabo,Gatoregene ntoike nka;Tosabe mono torendete,Ntobek'egutw'enyia.

title: 237 Abachenu Bono Renda
content:
# 237 Abachenu Bono Renda

 1. Abachenu bono renda,Igoro yanyegerigwe;Mochiokie chitaya chiaino,Chibe ang'e kagoch'Ere.
Ngoch' are, Ere Yeso;Ig' agocha n' obonene;Erio agambe botambe,Ngoch' are, Ere Yeso.
2. Eira ya Omotoria,Nwe mwabeirwe kegima pi;Chianga chiasibigwe bo,Tebi' aband' okoborigwa.
3. Amagambi agure pi,Yeso mbwang' agocha bono;Morandie obuya bwaye,Amatuk' ataraera.
4. Ebisaku nabisire,Yeso nachiche bwango bo;Onsi ay'ense naete,Tera Yeso ngocha are.
5. Abamochi, inchwo bwango,Amatuko ng'ang'e are;Ayerer' atarasieka,Monyore obuya bwaye.

title: 238 Bugi' Engoma
content:
# 238 Bugi' Engoma

 1. Bugi'engoma twora n'echinguru,Yeso nache naende;'Bagendi goka, tera mochenge,Yeso nache naende.
Nkoiran'are, Nkoiran'are'Yeso nache naende.
2. Chisororo chiarw' as'ebitunwa,Yeso nache naende;Ngoch'ar'ere n'obonen' obonge,Yeso nache naende.
3. Ndirandigwe n'emerindo nyancha,Yeso nache naende;Rirandigw' as' abanto bonsi pi,Yeso nache naende.
4. Chiburuburu chiatworokirie,Yeso nache naende;Mechando yabeire 'nsinyo chionsi,Yeso nache naende.
5. 'Bisaku bionsi biabeanire,Yeso nache naende;Rora chisemi chiamentekire,Yeso nache naende.

title: 239 Rituko Rinene Ngocha Rire
content:
# 239 Rituko Rinene Ngocha Rire

 1. Rituko rinene ngocha rire,Yeso nachicheKoira abana abageni,Enka y'omwando.
Natorore ogokia kw'emambia,Kogoseria OmosunteNatorore ogokia, Kw'emambia,kogwata chimbera.
2. 'Mang'ana yenchilinarandigw' ebisaku bionsi,Monene bw'enyangitateban' amarandi abuge.
3. 'Ba igoro bonsi bamokobenamar' agwoka,Omogambi ache abair'abayease batakwe
4. Bari' abasani twatiganete,Natororane,Baria barosir' emioyobatinyigw' amariga.

title: 240 Eira Yarurw' As' Abegenete
content:
# 240 Eira Yarurw' As' Abegenete

 1. Eira yaruru' as'abagenete,"Ngocha nde bwangombair' abar'abane;Morende mono goika nachire,Timorara buna abande renda".
"Morende mono goika nachire,Nimbae ense" N'eira yaye;"Soa 'mogoko, namotimoke,Monyore chigutwa,mobwate mono.
2. Torende mono as'ogosaba,Nacher'abande buna omoibi;Twamanyire nigo are ang'e,Ko titomanyeti rituko renda.
3. Ee! ntore na ogosemeria,Ng'a Yeso Omonene oito nache;Chiira chiaye nechi'ekeene,"Mbwango ndach' aseigomobwate mono".

title: 241 Ntomanyeti Ere Kagocha
content:
# 241 Ntomanyeti Ere Kagocha

 1. Ntomanyeti Ere kagocha,Mambia na mobaso gati;Ande nachiche mogoroba,Gose nobotuko gati;Otebire torende mono,Titochirimia chitaya,Erio Er' ekero agochaAtonyore toganyete.
Ntokoganyete(Ntokoganyete' Aye, Ntorendete)Ntokoganyete(Ntokoganyete' Aye, Ntorendete)Ntokoganyete(Ntokoganyete' Aye, Ntorendete)Nigo tokoganyet' Aye.
2. Nainyoire amaber' Aye,Ageret' agatokwera;Agatig' obonene bwaye,Gokwera abasirete;Kero kende nache kogoka,Arore abw'akwerete,Bagokeret'ogocha kwaye,'S'okoganya n'okorenda.
3. Yes' Omwanchw'Omoboria one,kwamanyire ningwancheteNasemeirie ninkoror',Aye, Erio ong'arigani' as' ore;Korache konacha ekina,Ase baria baratame,Ningokwani' erio Omosani,Nkoganyete nakorenda.

title: 242 Gok'ens' Omonene Nache
content:
# 242 Gok'ens' Omonene Nache

 1. Gok'ens' Omonene nache,Rotot' Omogambi,Ker'oyomo amoganye,Ere kagochicha,Ere kagochicha,Ere, Ere kagochicha.
2. Gok'ens' Omonene agambe,Banto bamotogie,Bonsi na bionsi Motogie,Motogie kobua,Motogie kobua,Moto-motogie kobua.
3. Nagamb' ense as' obuya,Bisaku bimanye,Obonene bwaye bori,Obwanchani bwaye,Obwanchani bwaye,'Bwanchani 'bwanchani bwaye.
4. 'Bib' obororo mbikoba,gos'amagw'as'ense,Naretan' ogosesenia,gotub' amab'onsi,'Y' okoragereria,'y' oko-'y' okoragereria.

title: 243 Nore Ang' Omonene Bw'enyangi Kagochicha
content:
# 243 Nore Ang' Omonene Bw'enyangi Kagochicha

 1. Nore ang' Omonenebw'enyangi kagochicha,Nore ang' Omonenebw'enyangi kagochicha,Ngoch'are, Ngoch'are,Kabe ang'e,Bweboyi'obe ang'erekagocha.
Ror' Omonenebwe'nyangi ngoch'are,Ror' Omonenebw'enyangi ngocha'are,Ngoch'are, ngoch'arekabe ang'e,Bweboyi'obe ang'Ere kagocha.
2. Chitaya chiano ngwokachire Ere kagocha,Chitaya chiano ngwokachire Ere kagocha,Nachiche bwango,Nachiche bwango,Orotot' Omonenekagocha.
3. Togende tomorototekagocha, kagocha,Togende tomorototekagocha, kagocha,Togende tomorotot' ekero,Omonene bw'enyangiAgochicha.
4. Natotere haleluya,kagocha kagocha,Natotere haleluya,kagocha kagocha,Tera huleluya! haleluya!Omonene bwenyangingoch'are.

title: 244 Toiroka Ababisa
content:
# 244 Toiroka Ababisa

 1. Toiroka ababisa,Nyasae nakorende;Ins'ase chimbaba chiaye,Nyasae nakorende.
Nyasae nakorende,'Kero gionsi nchera chionsi,Igo nakorende,Nyasae nakorende(nakorende)
2. Kero ki' amatuk'amabe,Nyasae nakorende;Nony' as' obororo bwonsi,Nyasae nakorende.
3. Nako' okogania kwao,Nyasae nakorende;Takwang' ogosaba kwao,Nyasae nakorende.
4. As' amatemw' ande onsi,Nyasae nakorende;'Morosu eegek' asare,Nyasae nakorende.

title: 245 Gose Mambia Erioba Rikooroka
content:
# 245 Gose Mambia Erioba Rikooroka

 1. Gose mambia erioba rikooroka,'Mobas'oseri' omosunte n'ekiriri;Yeso narache n'obonene bwaye,Kwoyia abanto baye.
O! Yeso Kristo ndiriri,Natoak'eriogi?Yes'ochire, haleluya,haleluya naboHaleluya Amen.
2. Gose mobaso gati gose ko bwaira,Gose nebe obotuko bw'ekeigoro,Neb'omobaso korw'obonene bwaye,'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.
3. 'Buya n'omogoko titogokwa rinde,'Borwair' obororo n'ebirero mbio;Kobogorigwa as'obonene bwaye,'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.
4. Emeganda yaye etere Hosana,Amalaika n'abachenu mbabeo;Obuya nabobe as' obosio bwaye,'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.

title: 246 Yeso Ngochich' Are
content:
# 246 Yeso Ngochich' Are

 1. Yeso ngochich' are,kwoyi' abanto baye,Abachenu baye bonsi,Baikarans' as'are;Rigereria Igoro,Goka na gotera,Nache n'obonene bwaye,Yeso Omogambi.
2. Ense netengecheigoro neete,Omobe ng'ai-orabe ase rituk'erio?Botamero mboiyo,nonya n'oboigamo,'Ndamwamu erorekane,Kamaber' aerire.
3. Amais' ay'agwoka,Nasambe ababe,Onde tagwator'erieta,ria Yes'eker'ekio;Y'okogecha, taiyo,As' Abakrist' erio,Ogosaba n'ebireroNabibe bos'erio.

title: 247 Rigesa Ri'ense Riabeire Ang'e
content:
# 247 Rigesa Ri'ense Riabeire Ang'e

 1. Rigesa ri'ense riabereire ang'e,Omonene narigeti' abagesi;Bagese endagera yomire pi,Omonene ayegache kagocha.
Angoa . . . bwango . . .(Angoa abagesi, Angoa.Ira rigesa kiage, are nka)Angoa . . . bwango . . .Angoa . . . bwango . . .(Angoa abagesi, Angoa,Reta igesa nka).Toire nka.
2. Rituko erio rigiya botambe,Ngocha rire bwango,bwango kegima;Ebibe biasiareire rigesa nchuo,Ayerera gesa ribaga ndire.
3. Togese tore n'obwanchani mono,Ogokonywa nkorue aaria igoro;'Bwanchani bwatorangeirie togese,Rigesa nditoganyete togende.

title: 248 Ko Rirandi Rikobugigw' As'omoerio
content:
# 248 Ko Rirandi Rikobugigw' As'omoerio

 1. Ko rirandi rikobugigw' as'omoerio,Natorore omobas' obarire;N' abatorigwe korw'ensebaumeran'aria ng'umbu,Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.
Gakorangeri' amarieta,Gakorangeri' amarieta,Gakorangeri' amarieta,Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.
2. Rituk'erio n'omogok'abachenu bakoboka,Nabakwete kare nababoke pi;Abachore nabagendena Nyasae igoro,Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.
3. Natokore emeremoya Nyasae eere,Tokwan'obwachaniobo bw'ogokumia;Eri' emerem'ekoeranatogende Igoro,Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.

title: 249 Tindigeti Obonda
content:
# 249 Tindigeti Obonda

 1. Tindigeti Obondagose obonene,Tatiga mb' omochenuing'ike igoro;'Getabu ki'obogimakerikire buya,Erieta riane rende,Naki ndirikire'?
'Rieta riane gose,ndirikir'aroro?'S'egetabu Igoro,naki ndirikire?
2. 'Bibe biane nebingebuna omokenye,'K'amanying' Omotorianar' ang'isanire,Kwabekire eira"mbib' ebibariri,Nabirabe kegima,kegima naende".
3. Ror'omochie omuya,chinyomba chinene,'Bamenyi babegetechianga chindabu;As'obobe botachegosaria amaya,Erieta riane rende,Naki ndirikire?

title: 250 Otorangeiri' Omogambi Oito
content:
# 250 Otorangeiri' Omogambi Oito

 1. Otorangeiri' Omogambi oito,Toikarans' as' enyangi yaye;Naki erabe ase tore,Ere kagocha.
Ere kagocha minto,'Mogambi kagocha,Naki erab' ase tore,Ere kagocha.
2. Nabekerw' obonene bwaye,Egutwa ribaga ri'amagwa;Kororekane ogosikwa,Ere kagocha.
3. Bun'ekomesa engaki eyio,'Bia bobisi birorekane;Tororekane buna tore,Ere kagocha.
4. Nagokere abatorigwe,Babegete chianga chi'enyangi;Naki ere buy' as' ababui,Ere kagocha.

title: 251 Ekero Toragambigwe
content:
# 251 Ekero Toragambigwe

 1. Ekero toragambigwe,'Bogima gos' ogokwa;Natobe bun'edhahabu?Gose bun'amabiria.
Kwarengirwe n'Omonene,Kwarengirwe;Kwarengirwe nering'ana,Kwaremeirwe.
2. Toigw' amang'an' amaya;"Omosomba omuya,"Gose nayare amabe,Kwaremeirwe omobe.
3. Ntomoigwere Omoika,Tonyore amabera;Gose tebana ekina,Kia Nyasae kenachwe.

title: 252 Rituko Rinene Ngochicha Rire
content:
# 252 Rituko Rinene Ngochicha Rire

 1. Rituko rinene,Ngochicha rire,'Go rikonagosuka gocha;Abachenu n'abanyabibembaatananwe,Nore ang' ase rituk'erio?
Nore ang'e, Nore ang'e,Nore ang'e rituko ri'ekina?Nore ang'e, Nore ang'e,'Se rituk'erio?
2. Ituko rikomesa,Ngochicha rire,'Go rikonagosuka gocha;'Borabu bwaye bocher'-abanchet'Omonene,Nore ang' ase rituk'erio?
3. Ituko ri'omoichano,Ngochicha rire,'Go rikonagosuka gocha;'Ker'ababe baraigwe"Genda timbamanyeti",Nore ang' ase rituk'erio?

title: 253 Ekina Giachakirwe Igoro
content:
# 253 Ekina Giachakirwe Igoro

 1. Ekina giachakirwe Igoro,Naki ntwe torateneneo;Anache Nyasa' Omogambi,Ker'ogokora n'enchera.
Naki ntwe torantenene,Rituko riria rinene;'Go toratoke twaremeirwe,Gos'ebibe biatinyigwe?
2. Abakure banacheirw' ekina,Erio nyuma abare moyo;Bonsi nabanyorerw' ekina,'Kina getari mabera.
3. Naki torabe ase ekin' ekio,Ebibe bikoorokigwa;Kogiaikire konachwa,Kina getari goochoka.

title: 254 Ntomanyeti Ensa
content:
# 254 Ntomanyeti Ensa

 1. Ntomanyeti ensa'Ker' Omonen' agoeha;Twarori' ebimanyererio ebinge;Twamanyire Ere nachiche,Korende ntomanyeti ensa.
Nachiche, Torende tobe ang'e,Nachiche, Omotoria haleluya;Nachiche, as' amare a Tata,Ko ntomanyeti ensa.
2. Borabu mboreo 's'abagotoreka,'Keene nker' as' ebuku ya Nyasae;'Ker'obobani bwaraga ng'a ngoch'are,Ko ntomanyeti ensa.
3. Torende, tosabe chitaya tochiokie,Tokor'emeremo goik' Omonen'ache;Natotere, togok'ere kagochicha,Ko ntomanyeti ensa.

title: 255 Tenen' As' Ekeene
content:
# 255 Tenen' As' Ekeene

 1. Tenen' as' ekeeneGwer 'Omonene,Basike bari 'abake'Mogand' o Danieli.
Mobe buna Danieli,Tenena mweka,Mobe n'ogwanchaokonge timoiroka.
2. Bant' abange basir'as' obwoba bwabo,Ng'a mbab' abakong'ubabe buna Danieli.
3. Bant' abanene monobare im'as'ense,Mbagwe bakoumer'omogand' o Danieli.
4. Imoki' ebenderamobue 'babisa,Moserie Saitanias'eriogi ria Danieli.

title: 256 Nyasae Karache Kogambia
content:
# 256 Nyasae Karache Kogambia

 1. Nyasae karache kogambia,Ebisaku bi'ense eye;Gatwarangerigw' ekin' ekio,Nkogamba ki toragambwe.
Nabobek' obori bwaye kiage,N'omoiruro nayotugute;Naki torab' as' ekin' ekio,Rituko ri' okobokigwa?
2. Toigwe Yeso ogorotebia,"Mbuya mon'omosomb' one";Gose toserigwe kegima,N'abanto ababe bonsi.
3. 'Gok' eker'aror' abaye,Babwat' ekemanyererio;Babeke chianga chindabu,Batenene ang'e nere.
4. Tosabe rigoro twaganya,chitaya chiaito chiogete,Ker'omonywomi akorangeria,Ntobe ang'e kogenda nka.
5. Natomenye na gosemeria,'S' okogany' engaki eyioKer' orogendo rwaerire,Toikarans' as' obonene.

title: 257 Ko Rirumbe Riasirire
content:
# 257 Ko Rirumbe Riasirire

 1. Ko rirumbe riasirirekorwa as'ebitunwa,Omobaso okobaraogotongia emambia;Natosome rirube riayeri'obwanchani bwaye,Tomanyane twensi buya,rirumbe rigosira.
Tomanya --- ne buya pi,(Tomanya ---- ne buya pi)Totare ----- amo twensi,(Totare ---- amo twensi)Bogokia --- moka igoro,(Bogokia ---- moka 'goro)Rirumbe---- rigosira,(Rirumbe ---- rigosira)Bogokia ----mokaigoro,(Bogokia ---- moka 'goro)Rirumbe -----rigosira,(Rirumbe ----- rigosira)
2. Tokomocha koinyorabuna intwe namaroba,Togosaria amachikona gochandeka tweka;Chimbaba chiaye chindabuchitub' ebibe biaito,Okorenda gokoera,rirumbe rigosira.
3. Rirumbe rigototuba,Tata natomanyete,'Bosi' as'obosio tomanyane,na baria twanchete;Korwa ng'umbu yabarire buya,yakiamokire,Ekiriri kegoeta,rirumbe rigosira.

title: 258 Natororane Na Yeso
content:
# 258 Natororane Na Yeso

 1. Natororane na Yeso,Obosio as' obosio;Nomochengo rituk' erioKondaror' Omotoria.
Natororan' as'amaiso,aria seito Igoro;Nase obonene bwaye,Nimorore botambe.
2. Tinkonyara komomanya,Buna are Ere bori;Korend' ekero arache,Nimorore bun'are.
3. Biserigwe korw' as'are,'Mariga n' omoichano;Egesiru nakeirane,'Bobisi bomanyeke.
4. Bosio as'obosi' ekeene!Omogoko nobeo;Nimbe n'omogoko bori,Kondaror' Omotoria.

title: 259 Ntoumeran' Aria Roche
content:
# 259 Ntoumeran' Aria Roche

 1. Ntoumeran' aria roche,'S'Amalaik'amenyete,Morind'omokenonoku,Okorw' ase Nyasae.
Toumerane twensi roche,As' agay'oroch'oruya mono;Toumerane n'abaye bonsi,'S' oroche rwa Nyasae.
2. 'S'engegu y'oroche roria,Rw'amache akomesa;Totere na gosasima,Botamb' as' omogoko.
3. Gator' ang'e goika roche,Totige chigurube;'S' obuya natotorigwe,Aru' eyanga n'egutwa.
4. Bwango ntoik' aria roche,Tokore orogendo;Chinkoro chigoke mono,Totere n'omorembe.

title: 260 Emeremo Ekoera
content:
# 260 Emeremo Ekoera

 1. Emeremo ekoeratwamboke nyancha ng'umbu,Nindor' emambi'engiya y'obonene;Nimomany' Omotoriako ndaike aria Igoro,Nankwanie n'omogokoOmonene.
Nimomanye, nimomanye,Ko ndatenene ang'e as'are.Nimomanye, Nimomanye,Kondarore amabok' aye.
2. Naki ndagoke monoko ndarore Nyasae,Kondaror' obosiobway'obwororo;Nimobake as' obwanchanin'obuya bwonsi,Bwandoseiri' obomenyoaria igoro.
3. Abanchani baito bonsiabakure as'ens'aye,Bakwete n'okwegenakwa Nyasae,Natogoke mono koumeran'aria igoro;Ko ninganie kororaYeso kubua.
4. Kondasoe omochienechianga chindabu,Nandae as'emechando etari;Nintere n'omogokon'ababuir'ebibe,Ko Ninganie kororaYeso koua.

title: 261 'Mosalaba Togoetera
content:
# 261 'Mosalaba Togoetera

 1. 'Mosalaba togoetera,Gochia nka igoro;Ntokwobo' emeganda y'ebibe,Tat' otorendire.
Nka, nka, nka,Gochia nka igoro,Mosalaba togoetera,Enka y'obwanchani.
2. Mosalaba togoetera,Yes' otang'anire;Ntomobwatie chimbaratero,Nka engeg' engiya.
3. Mosalaba togoetera,'Nchera neba embe;Nare' oratorae buya,Nka 'Monen' as'ore.

title: 262 Ntenen'engegu Yordani
content:
# 262 Ntenen'engegu Yordani

 1. Ntenen'engegu Yordani,Na korigereria;Kanani engiy'omogoko,'S'enibo yan'ere.
Natomeny'ens'engiy'omogoko, Aria ngumbuas'engegu eri'engiya.Toter' ogotera kwaMusa n'Eng'ondi,Tobe na Yeso botambe.
2. Ens'eri'engiy'erandete,Nomobaso rioka;Krist' agamba goika kare,Aseri' omosunte.
3. Ndi ndaike as'agiya,Na gosesenigwa;Ndore obosio bwa Tata,Ntimoke botambe.
4. Nkor' eichorwe n'omogoko,Tingoteban'ense;Nony'emerind'ekogusa,Ningendeo rioka.

title: 263 Eker' Emerem' Ekoera
content:
# 263 Eker' Emerem' Ekoera

 1. Eker' emerem' ekoera,Abagesi nabairane;Bakoretana rigesa,Goika Yerusalemu.
'Mogoko nabayorore,'Mogok'otari koera;'Mogok' ekiagera bono,'Meremo yaerire.
2. Rituko riria natotere,Komosaba, Komotogia;'Monene Yes' Omotoria,Aria Yerusalemu.
3. Natobe n'omogok' aroro,As'obomenyo bwa Tata;Obwo bwabekirwe ang'e,Aria Yerusalemu.

title: 264 Nere Ens' Engiya Kobua
content:
# 264 Nere Ens' Engiya Kobua

 1. Nere ens'engiya kobua,As'okwegena twayerora;Tata nigo atoganyete,Gotoroseria obomenyo.
'Ns'engiya ---- botambe ------('Ns'engiya bota - botambe)Toumeran'engegu-engiya(botambe)'Ns'engiya ---- botambe ------(Ns'engiya bota---- botambe)Toumeran'engegu engiya.
2. Natotere ari' as'engegu,Amater'amay' abachenu;Ntokoba nobororo rinde,Gose kogania gotimoka.
3. Ase Tat' omuy'ore igoro,Natomobake tomotogie,As'ekeegwa ki'obwanchaniN'ebisio atosesenirie.

title: 265 Ntomeny' As' Amach' Obogima
content:
# 265 Ntomeny' As' Amach' Obogima

 1. Ntomeny' as' amach' obogima,Nsok'enchenu engiya;Yes' atoganyet' atorosie,Korosigw' okuya.
Ntomeny' as' amach' obogima(Ntomeny' ase amache y'obogima)As' amache y'obogima(As' amache nsoko y'obogima)As' amache y'obogima(As' amache nsoko y'obogima)Ensoko y'obogima.
2. Tokorosa as' orogendo,Mbuya totimoke;Ase amache akwongora,Igo akogokia.
3. Aye nore n'erang'o gose?Inchwo ase Yeso;Yeso namache y'obogima,Oyanyw' otoreke.

title: 266 As' Ens' Eyio Engiya
content:
# 266 As' Ens' Eyio Engiya

 1. As' ens' eyio engiya,Nor' omochi' omuya;Orabeo botambe,N'omosunte toiyo.
Totinyigw' amariga,Obororo bosireMbari kobara engaki,'Mosunte toiyo.
2. Bisieri bie chilulu,As' omochi' omuya;Chinchera chi'edhahabu,N'omosunte toiyo.
3. Bisieri bitasiekwe,Gochi 'omochi' omuya;Mach' obogim' asoka,N'omosunte toiyo.
4. Tibaganeti isase,As'omochi' omuya;Ng'ondi ner' omobaso,N'omosunte toiyo.

title: 267 Ngokor' Emeremo n'Amatemwa
content:
# 267 Ngokor' Emeremo n'Amatemwa

 1. Ngokor' emeremo n'amatemwa,Nimb'as'engegu ekomekameka;Mb'ang'e n'Omonene ngosasima,Miaka yonsi n'obonen' ase nde.
Ig' erabe, obonene,obonene, obonene'S'obuya nimorore obosioNeb' obonene, 'bonen' ase nde.
2. As' ekeegwa ki'obuya bwaye,Naeirwe ribaga aria igoro;Kobao ndore obosio bwaye,Miaka yonsi n'obonen' ase nde.
3. Basani mbabe' aba nanchete,Mogok' omonge ong'etanane;'Manyir' omogoko bw'Omotoria,Miaka yonsi n'obonen' ase nde.

title: 268 Twaboigure Obuya Bw'Ense
content:
# 268 Twaboigure Obuya Bw'Ense

 1. Twaboigure obuya bw'ense,Engiya echabeire,Obuya bwaye bw'ogokumia,Ng'aki erabe kobao!Chinchera nechia edhahabu,'Magacho ye chilulu,Tibogotebeka obuya,Ng'aki erabe kobao.
2. Ntosiboke korw' as'ebibe,'Matemwa, n'obororo;Mechando ende tekobao,Ng'aki erabe kobao.Obwanchani Obonge mono,Tobek'eang'endabu,'Kanisa y'Omotangi o Igoro,Ng'aki erabe kobao.
3. Mechando yaito yonsi eere,Rituko ri'omogoko;Torore omochi'ogoika,Ori'ochabeire mono.Buya buna omoriakari,Kourner' Omonene;Goichana tigokobao,Mosunte tokobao.
4. Ninchandeka ime as'ense,Nindengererie igoro;Bwango nainche nimanye onsi,Ng'aki erabe kobao.Ntororane aase agare,As'obonen' obonge,Abachenu bonsi mbabeo,Yeso nere nabeo.

title: 269 Titori Na Obomenyo
content:
# 269 Titori Na Obomenyo

 1. Titori na obomenyo;Omochie tori aiga:Toremigw' as'eng'an'eye,Togany' omochie ogocha,Togany' omochie ogocha.
2. Titori na obomenyo;Torigi' omochie orache:Zayoni nka y'Omonene,Okomeka, miaka yonsi,Okomeka, miaka yonsi.
3. Obomenyo bw'omorembe;'Batorigw' batimoke;Onye nabwate chimbabaNkoiruruka narenge,Ing'iruruke ntimoke.
4. Omoy'one kira igo!Omonene omanyire;Konda' nkor'obuya bwaye,Ner' ogonchorer' engaki,Ey'ogotimoka kwane.

title: 270 Bagendi Ng'ai Mogochia?
content:
# 270 Bagendi Ng'ai Mogochia?

 1. Bagendi ng'ai mogochia,Nechinyimbo koboko?Na togende orogendo,'As'ogochika Kwaye.Ebitunwa n'amagoko,Nkogenda tore nka bwoye,Nkogenda tore nka Bwoye,Ase ense engiya x2
2. Bagendi nki morigetie,As'enseria engiya?Yanga ndabu ne chigutwa,korwa as'Omotoria.Tonyw'amache y'obogima,Tomeny' amo na Nyasae,Natomeny' amo botambe,Ase ense engiya x2.
3. Bagendi togende nainwe,Gochi' ens' eria engiya?Inchwo bono mwancheirwe,nchwo, Mosoe 'mogand' oito.Inchwo, nchwo, timototiga,Krist' oganyir' atoire.'Ganyir' atoire Bwoye,As' ens' eria engiya x2.

title: 271 Ngoika Nka
content:
# 271 Ngoika Nka

 1. Mbek'egutwa y'edhahabu ngoika nka,Ntore chigurube chiane ngoika nka;Mboyigw'obonene, Ninter'omogano,Bw'Omotoria one ngoika nka.
Ngoika nka (ngoika nka),ngoika nka (ngoika nka),Bororo bwonsi mboere ngoika nka;Ngoika nka (ngoika nka),Ngoika nka (ngoika nka)liororo bwonsi mboere ngoika nka.
2. Mosunte bwonsi noete ngoika nka,'Moerio ndor'oborabu ngoika nka;Borabu bwa igoro, Bomorek'enchera,Bondae botambe goika nka.
3. Ndor'obosio bw'Omotoria ngoika nka,Nter'obuya bw'Omotoria ngoika nka;Nintenen'as'are, Erio mosasime,Mbe nere botambe ngoika nka.

title: 272 Nayeigure Ense
content:
# 272 Nayeigure Ense

 1. Nayeigure ense, Egotoka are,Nomochi' omuya as' enkoro;Yes'oyoagachire, Aria titogokwa,Nense totakogota rinde.
Totagote totagote,'Nse ase totagote rinde;Totagote totagote,'Nse ase totagote rinde.
2. As'ens'eyi'engiya 'se totatayaye,Toigwanane rioka botambe;Totogi'Omogambi, s'ogotera rioka,Nense ase totakwe rinde.
3. 'Merem'ekoera tonyore egutwa,'Mechando n'amatemwa aere;Bororo boere, mariogi aigwanane,Nabanchwa abakwete kare.

title: 273 Nkorengereria Nde
content:
# 273 Nkorengereria Nde

 1. Nkorengereria nde Ens' eria engiya,Ndaike k'erioba rikogwa;As' obuya bwa Yeso ntenene aria,Ninyor' eng'enang'eni gose?
Ninyore eng'enang'eni as'egutwaMogorob' erioba rikogwa(rikogwa)Gonkoboka n'abachenu as'omochi' oria,Ninyor' eng'enang'eni gose?(Ninyore?)
2. Ase chinguru chiaye Yeso nindandie,Nindende mobu' omobisa;Erio ching'enang'eni nachib' echiane,Okobakwa kwaye koigweke.
3. Naki ndagok' ekero nche ndamorore,Nintung'ame komosasima;'Moy'one nogok' omochie bw'edhahabu,'Ninyor' eng'enang'eni gose?

title: 274 Nyancha Ng'umbu
content:
# 274 Nyancha Ng'umbu

 1. Nyancha ng'umbugati y'ense y'emechando,Naria IgoroEnse nere botakoira,'S'amarig' aratinyigwe
Nyancha ng'umbu,nyancha y'emerindo,naigur' abanchwabakondangeria,
(Nyancha ng'umbunyancha nyancha y'emerindo)(Naigur'abanchwa 'banchwabakondangeria)Bwango natotige emechando,Tomenye n'Omonene botambe.(Bwango, bwangonatotige emechando),Tomenye n'Omonene botambe.
2. Nyancha ng'umbu,'S'Omorembe,'Bibe n'ense biaetire,Emechando yaerire,Abarosu batimoke.
3. 'Yaetire, takoinyorwa,Emioy'enyore chinguru;Takobao amariga,Ase baria batorigwe.
4. Nyancha ng'umbu, 'motimoko,Yes'arangerie abayeEmerindo yaetire,'Malaika bagotera.

title: 275 Nchw' As' Omotoria
content:
# 275 Nchw' As' Omotoria

 1. Nchw' as' omotoria totebana,'Ngana riatworokirie enchera;Na'are naintwe aiga rero,Nkorangeri'are nchwo.
Omogoko natoyorore,Chinkoro ko chiachenekire,Natororane n'Omotoria,'S' enk'eyio botambe.
2. 'Ban' abake igw'eriogi riaye,Nkoro chichenge n'omogoko;Tomochor' ere ab'oyoito,Tagotebana nchwo.
3. Rengereria nar' amo naintwe,Igw'eriogi riaye oigwere;'Gwa ngosoror' ar' ogoteba,"'Nw'abana bane nchwo".

title: 276 Ter' Obwanchani Bwa Yeso
content:
# 276 Ter' Obwanchani Bwa Yeso

 1. Ter'obwanchani bwa Yeso,N'amabera, N'obuyaAs'omochie bw'oborabu,'Toroseri' obomenyo.
Togoi . . . ka Igoro,'Mogoko ki orab'eker'ekio;Tomoro . . . re Ye . . . so,Totere as'obobui.
2. Gatore as'orogendo,'Mare natub'erioba;Korende ko rwaerire,kweumia ngokobao.
3. Tiga tobe abegenwa,Tomokorere rioka;Okomorigereria iga,natonyor' obogima.
4. Gochia bosi' as'ekeegwa,Bwango natomorore;Egeita nakeigorwe,Totar'Omochi'Omuya.

title: 277 Naikir' Ense Y'Omwando
content:
# 277 Naikir' Ense Y'Omwando

 1. Naikir'ense Y'omwando'S'enibo nairwe bosa,Ens'eyio tibori koira,Omosunte oetire.
Ens'engiya, 'Ngiya mono,Gantenein' as' egutunwa;Nindore Ngumbu Y'enyancha,Ase ndoseiri' obomenyoNdoro'engegu Y' obonene,'Bomenyo bwane botambe.
2. Nintare n'omonen'one,tori'emes'engiya nere;'s'amaig'andae n'okoboko,chinsinyo chi'ense ya igoro;
3. Gotiok'okuya gokorwa,'s'ebisicha bitakuoma;Bi'emete Yamet igoro,'sechinsoko chi'obogima.
4. Mariogi'amaya nareo,Ay'ogotera kwa igoro;'Malaika bagotera;Amo nabwo babuire.

title: 278 'Buya Mbore Nka
content:
# 278 'Buya Mbore Nka

 1. 'Buya mbore nkak'obwachani boreo,'Mogok'oigwekek'obwanchani bore nka;'Morembe n'omoigoto,N'omogoko bibeo,Ng'aki ere buyak'obwanchani bore nka.
'Bwanchani, bore nka,Ng'aki ere buyak'obwanchani bore nka.
2. 'Mogoko nyombak'obwanchani boreo,Moko tegocha,k'obwanchani bore nka;Bisicha biam'as'ense,As'emegond'emiya,Bogima bwagokigwa,'Bwanchani nyomba.
3. lgor'egoka k'obwanchanibore nka,Ens'eichorw'obwanchaniko bore nyomba;Agansoko gatera,Igoro ner'eraba,k'obwanchani bore nka,Yes'agokigwa.
4. Yeso nkore mb'oyoobwanchani boche,Nsang'ekeng'wanso kiao,'Rio twanchane nka;Ntimoke korw'obobe, Tindengereri 'ebibe,'S'obuya nseseneke,Bwanchani nyomba.

title: 279 Tenena ase Chiira Chia Yeso
content:
# 279 Tenena ase Chiira Chia Yeso

 1. Tenena ase chiira chia Yeso,Nigo aratogigw'Ere botambe;Moterer' Omonene bw'emeganda,Tenen' ase chiira chiaye.
O-te-ne-ne(Tenen'ase chiirachi tenen'ase chiira)Tenena'ase chiira chi'omoneneo-to-ne-ne(Tenen'ase chiira,Tenen'ase chiira)Tenen' ase chiira chiaye
2. Tenena ase chiira chia Yeso,Omobe Saitani tagotema;Gochia enchera yaye eria embe,Tenen' ase chiira chiaye.
3. Tenena ase chiira chia Yeso,Mogende n' Er' esegi timorosa;Moyeb' emeganda ya Saitan,Tenen' ase chiira chiaye.

title: 280 Toumerane N'Abasani
content:
# 280 Toumerane N'Abasani

 1. Toumerane n'abasanias'ens 'engaki egoeta,Twaichana korengereriang'a, goika totigane.
Ntogotigana Igorotitogotigana.Ens'engiya y'omogoko,titogotigana.
2. Twasemeirie 'ker'emeremoy 'ens 'ekoera,Ntomeny'amo n'abasanibaito twatiganete.
3. Mang'ana y'ogotiganatakab'as'enk'eri' enyia,Toter'amatera y'omogokokare na kare.

title: 281 Gokw' Ase Yeso!
content:
# 281 Gokw' Ase Yeso!

 1. 'Gokw'ase yeso! Nokuyaond'ataboke korera;Nobotimoker'obuya,Botasarigwe n'obobe.
2. Gokw'ase yeso! o mbuyaase oy'ogosundoka;Gotimok'as'okwegena,Gosemeria 'sesenirie.
3. Gokw'ase yeso! 'Morembe,'koboka gosesenirie;'Nguru chi'omotoria nchigotangwan' obobe, n'obwoba.
4. Gokw'ase Yeso!Nobok'egetureri gekobuga;Chimbera nachimanoke,Baboke tibakwa rinde.

title: 282 Narorir' Ensok'Engiya
content:
# 282 Narorir' Ensok'Engiya

 1. Narorir'ensok' engiya,'Nsok'entamb'eng'areYes'Omonen'ogotoria,Ror'amaot'aye.
Ndoch'ensoko y'ogosibia,Nsoe im'ensibie kegima,Baka Tata yansibirie,yansibirie, yansibirie.
2. Bagim'oboyia bwachire,Manying'agokwana;Akwan'obobe bosira,Ins'as'omorindo
3. Ngotara nd'asoborabu,kobua ebibe,Nkor'enchenu, ang'endabu,Nkrist'omenyete ime.
4. 'Buya bw'ogokumi'ens'aa,Manying'aitegete,Yeso bweka namanyire,Yes'ori'onkwerete.

title: 283 Otobatise, As' Omoik'Oo
content:
# 283 Otobatise, As' Omoik'Oo

 1. Otobatise, As'Omoik'oo;As'obwanchani tobeke chinguru.
Twagosabire Yes'Omotori'oito;'S'Omoika n'obwanchani tobatise.
2. Twarer'as'ore, Ntw'abanyabibe;Tosibie, tochene korw'as'ebibe.
3. Iruma ria Igoro, Ika korwa Igoro;Twasab'ebisio, 'S'amabera nchw'ang'e.
4. Igwa eriogi, Riarwete lgoro;Ay'Omwanchw'one, Ngokiri'as'ore.
Natokobake, Eng'ondi yaitetwe;Natogosasime, Amen, Amen.

title: 284 Yeso Ng'Endagera Y'obogima
content:
# 284 Yeso Ng'Endagera Y'obogima

 1. Yeso ng'endagera Y'obogima,Buna gwakorete ang'e nyancha;As'amarik'ao ninkorigie,Nkoro nekoganetie, "Ring'ana!"
2. Seseni'ekeene namanyire,Buna gwaseseneti'omogati;'Bosomba bosire n'ebisibo,Nyore omorembe ase bionsi.
3. 'Mang'an'ao Moika n'obogima,Ko tindi na nguru chi'okoigwera;Naye ogokonywa n'obogima,Nganetie nyigwer'amang'an'ao

title: 285 Egetare Ki' Emiaka
content:
# 285 Egetare Ki' Emiaka

 1. Egetare ki'emiaka,Nyebise im' as' ore;Amache n'amanyinga,Bikorw' omober' oo;Bib' eriog' as'ebibe,Nkonye korwa ebibe.
2. Meremo y'amaboko,Tegonkorera gento;Nonya n'omokia bwonsi,'Mariga naiteka;Ase nde 'bibe mbosa,Naye bwek' orankonye.
3. Tindi koreta gento,'Mosalaba ndaimokie;Mbosa nde aye mboyie,Nakorigereire;Ay' ensoko 'bogima,Onsibie tinkwa ense.
4. Kangokor' orogendo,Mobui bw' ababisa;Ng'iruruke gochi' are,nkoror' As'ekerogo;Egetare ki'emiaka,Nyebise ime as' ore.

title: 286 Igw' Eriogi Ri'Omorisia
content:
# 286 Igw' Eriogi Ri'Omorisia

 1. Igw'eriogi ri'Omorisia,Korw'eror' Omosunte ime;Korangeria 'ng'ondi 'nsiru,Korw'obweri bw'omorisia.
Chirete, chirete,korwa rinani ri'ebibe;Chirete, chirete,chirete ase Yeso.
2. Ng'okomokony'omorisia,Korigia 'ng'ondi chinsiru;Ng'ogochiirania bweri,Chitangwe korw'obokendu.
3. Igwa chikwan'eroro ime,As'ebitunw'ebitambe;'Gw'Omonen'ogotomire,'Gend'ondigerie ching'ondi.

title: 287 Nki Twasaber' Abana?
content:
# 287 Nki Twasaber' Abana?

 1. Nki twasaber'abana,'Ba baiboirw'as'ense;'Mais'ab' akoigoka,'Nkor'emany'obwanchani.
2. Obogim'obuya,Twasabeire Nyasae;Emeremo emiya,'B' as'obogima bwabo.
3. Twasabir'obong'aini,N'ogokor'okuya;N'Omoik'omoitongo,Okoremi'abataka.
4. Chinguru as'amatemwa,chibu'oborwaire;Koma'obonda bwa Igoro,Koba omogoko.
5. Nabo twabasabeire,As'emambi'engiya;'Mogok'ob'oichore,Bun'ensoko y'amache.

title: 288 'Bwanchani Bwatogokia
content:
# 288 'Bwanchani Bwatogokia

 1. Bwanchani bwatogokia,'Toroseri' enchera;Botoinyoria kob'abaya,'S'abande botambe.
Nyasae, Ere n'obwanchani,Naintwe, Nabaye tore;Bwanchani bwatogokia,'Toroseri'enchera;Botoinyoria kob'abaya'S'abande botambe.
2. Ens' ey'omoichano,'Borwair' amakweri;'S'obwanchani natoteme,Gokonya chinkoro.
3. Amatuk'akoera,Tokoirwa igoro;Natoter'agwo botambe,'Bwanchani bwa Yeso.

title: 289 Nagokire Ng'a Tat'ore Igoro
content:
# 289 Nagokire Ng'a Tat'ore Igoro

 1. Nagokire ng'a Tat'ore Igoro,'Teb'obwanchani bway'as'ebuku;'Makumi'amange narorire ime,Kobu'onsi Yeso nanyanchete.
Nagokire Yes'Anyanchete,Nanyanchete, nanyanchete;Nagokire Yes'Anyanchete,Nanyanchete mono.
2. Nonya nkomweb'erio natayaya,'Nyanchete rioka nonya ngosira;Nimotamer'er'oyonyanchete,Gankoinyora bun'er'ankwerete.
3. Onye kore gotera ndatere,'Kero namororir'Omotoria;Nakw'oko goika kare na kare,"N'ogokumia ki Yes'Anyanchete.

title: 290 Yes'Omosani Bw'Abana
content:
# 290 Yes'Omosani Bw'Abana

 1. Yes'Omosani bw'abana,'Be 'Mosani'one;Mbwat 'okoboko mbe naye,Botambe.
2. Nyegerie nkine n'obuya,'Matuk'onsi;Aye nkwabet'omwana,Nomanyete.
3. Ndae ker'enchera,As'obosae bwane;Ng'ainie nkong'a'as'ekeene kiao.
4. Tontuguta, korend'ay'ob'omosani'one;Ninkoganetie botambeas'obogima.

title: 291 Nimorigie Yeso Genkio
content:
# 291 Nimorigie Yeso Genkio

 1. Nimorigie Yeso genkio,Nimwegere botambe,Mbwati' Amabarato Aye,Ntar'encher' enyerere.
Onyanchire Ee 'nyanchire,Namanyire 'nyanchire,Yeso 'Kanyancha 'gankwera,Naki' ekio Mwancherete.
2. As'aranchike ningende,Tindi moke ningende,'Nchera ase atang'aine,Tindi moke komanya.
3. Ingesieri ateneine,'Botamero bw'ebibe,Ninture orir' eira,Aigwe anyigorere.

title: 292 Nkwarosire?
content:
# 292 Nkwarosire?

 1. Nkwarosire, gwaichanirenagochandeka?"Nchw'ateba,Eri'aye otimoke."
2. Naki ndamomany'erionch'asar'oy'okondaa?"Nare amaot'as'ebimo biaye."
3. Ner'egutw'Omogambiabekeirw'Omotwe?"Maene negutwa,Ko neyamagwa."
4. Komonyora nagotunyanki ndanyoreo?"Obororo,'meremo namaiga."
5. Kondabwaterere nkindanyor'Omoerio?"'Bokong'u mboereng'ete Yordani."
6. Ndamobori' ang'irembe oyoye nanyange?"Takwanga igoronense nchieta."
7. Korigia, gotunya,korenda, nasesenie?"Abachenu mwensiiraneri ee."

title: 293 'Kero Yes'arwete Igoro
content:
# 293 'Kero Yes'arwete Igoro

 1. 'Kero Yes'Arwete Igoro,Gokwera abanyabibe;'S'amabera taetaneti'Abake buna nche.
2. Akabarigi' abanene,As'are kworokereria;Bakamoretera abana,Abake buna nche.
3. 'Monene tabaseretie,Nigo abatigete as'are;Tatigete ond'airane,Omoke buna nche.
4. Akarw'obogima bwaye,'Batorie korw'amakweri;Nomobui bw'ogotoria,Abake buna nche.
5. Abana momwanche bono,Mokore ogwancha kwaye;Momosabe, momobake,Abana buna nche.

title: 294 Ntwe N'Abana B'Erwoti
content:
# 294 Ntwe N'Abana B'Erwoti

 1. `Ntwe n'abana b'Erwoti,ya Igoro, ya Igoro'Ntwe n'abana b'Erwoti,Ter'as'orogendo;Yeso omotang'aniAtotebia ntoiroka,'Mobwatie ang'e ang'e,Ter'as'orogendo.
2. Twatara kogenda nka,Nka seito, Nka seito,Twatara kogenda nka,Ter'as' orogendo;Gochi'omochi'otarore,'S'obotuko botari,Yeso ner'Omobaso,Ter'as orogendo.
3. Twarara n'omogoko,'Mogoko, mogoko;Twarara n'omogoko,Ter'as'orogendo.Twatar'as'orogendo,n'echinkoro chinchenu,Goika toyeror'enka.Ter'as'orogendo.

title: 295 Rero Krist'Obokire
content:
# 295 Rero Krist'Obokire

 1. Rero Krist'obokireHa-le-lu-ya!'Goro n'ense 'tebireHa-le-lu-ya'Geturi Ki'obobuiHa-le-lu-ya!'Gor'etere 'nse itabeHa-le-lu-ya!
2. Moy'Ar'Omonen'oitoHa-le-lu-ya!Amakweri kai areHa-le-lu-ya!Agakwa atotorieHa-le-lu-ya!Mbera teri na nguruHa-le-lu-ya!
3. 'Kobori'ogoikeranuHa-le-lu-ya!'Rwanir'esegi obuireHa-le-lu-ya!Makweri tamobuetiHa-le-lu-ya!Kristo oigoire IgoroHa-le-lu-ya!
4. Toet'as' aeteteHa-le-lu-ya!Totuny'Omorai oitoHa-le-lu-ya!Korw'ense toirwe Igoro,Ha-le-lu-ya!Korw'ense toirwe IgoroHa-le-lu-ya!

title: 296 'Bana Bagater'Agwo Kare
content:
# 296 'Bana Bagater'Agwo Kare

 1. 'Bana bagater'agwo kare,'Kero Yes'arinet'etigere;Hosana, Hosana,Hosana Igoro mono.
Mater'omogoko,'Bana bater'amater'omogoko,Mater' omogoko,Yes'anchet'amatera.
2. Nanchete aigwe ogotera,Komotogi'Omorwoti O igoro;Hosana, HosanaHosana igoro mono.
3. Natoter'ogoter'okuya,Na baria Omogand'oborigwe;Hosana, Hosana,Hosana igoro mono.

title: 297 Monene Ng'Emeremo
content:
# 297 Monene Ng'Emeremo

 1. 'Monene ng'emeremo,Nkore as'omogoko;Nonya timbwati nguru,Ko ndigeti'emeremo,'Mabok'ane neng'ea,Merem'emeke nkore:
'Monene ng'emeremo,Nkore as'omogoko
2. Nyegene kand'omoke,Amang'an'a Biblia;Ntare chinchera chiao,Nkore n'ogwancha kwao,'Nkoro, 'Maboko nkoe,Ngokorer'Omorwoti:
3. Ninsimek'embusuro,Nkor'emerem'emiya;As'Obwanchani nkonya,Ng'ikeranie nkwegene,Nyorokie ngokorere,'Meremo korwa bono.

title: 298 Riogi Rie Chibesa
content:
# 298 Riogi Rie Chibesa

 1. 'Riogi rie chibesa,'Kero chikogwa;Ker'eyem'as'are,Yes'achiire.
